column3: Jesu e nâŋâcnere erâ juju-ticne qikiŋnewecko maŋjauŋte fuŋne ʒâŋitambeŋ. Eme nâŋâc iŋuc jaha âgofâc-nâŋec jaŋere erâ juju-nâŋec qikiŋnenaŋte munârekicne.

Aakic hombaŋ maickehame Jesuzi e jahacnere ʒiŋuc manawec: No mâreŋ beherâ Mamactao risie fepemurâ dameŋ bembeŋkekac. Iŋuc manarâ mâreŋko wiacfâc-ticne maŋjauŋ ejarewec, i ejare tarahuc hâmoocte muwec.
Me weni jaŋere Anutuzi maname gâpâreme jara 40 tarawec? I sâqocne bahuc mâreŋ tuhuo hâmo sipiric embiŋ jaŋere hâcne iŋuc ewec.
Anuture mume rereŋfâc ŋoŋe mârâc jaha qâpuc-ŋeŋicko sasechec jujumbieŋ, ju ju sâc ijaha ʒiŋuczia mi junʒepieŋ.
Anutu e ŋic sasawa bâturec-jopahuc qaqatarao basanaŋ-jopawec, i mâmâc sasawa buuruc-ticnao ŋec-jopaocte iŋuc ewec.
Eme no wiac jujune jaŋere ŋondeŋko ŋicmarac tinac fuarâ ʒiŋuc mume manapo: “Padi tase 2 furine 1 kina â jacgoŋ 12 iŋuc jaha furine 1 kina. Erâ saŋ hâmeŋ fâric ine akicketec fuazejec.”
Wofuŋte maio maŋhuhuŋ jupie eki bafaharec-ŋopaocmu.

E dameŋ bawec fokac, ira mâreŋne mâreŋne ŋic fuŋne-nâŋec bataniŋkerâ okacne sâckoa nâreocmu. Erâ ŋic moc e gie i hâcne baocte âkendâŋnewec, erâ mâreŋŋic sasawa e manapaŋkenaŋte hâmockonec bâɋârewec jukac.”
Qarâ muc ʒârâneheczi hendiŋ ba akic erâ qizecnao hecnepie huwec â ŋaqi bâbâroŋ mâmâc hecnepie huwec.
Irec no ʒiŋuc mukopac: Hozec sahac ɋâri jaŋe ŋic mocwâc rorâ naru motec rocjoparâ dete mamac â ro rikec qâ rikec enʒepieŋ. Iŋuc ehuc jupie kisâ jaŋe sâqocnere ojowa baniŋmurâ dâŋ basarâ behenʒepieŋ.
Mamaczi no maŋnuekac â noni Mamac maŋkeekopac, dâŋ i manapie fârine ezejec. Me miczi mupe mi sâcŋopakacko wiac bapa-nanere erâ dâŋ i mana ʒakieniŋ.
Eme hâmoc â hârâc i ʒocriqicko behepie huwec. Izi hâmoc namba tu ekac, ʒocriqic hâcne.
Kristo e iŋucnere sâc erâ muzac mâreŋ fuaweckonecteaŋ wemo afecne hâmo warehuc juzac. E ine iŋuc mi ehuc dameŋ ŋondeŋ tataranao due-nâŋec bahuc kiŋnâŋec bârârieocte fua tâcnewec.
mâreŋ burocnao gume qataŋ ejarehuc juhame jara 40 ewec.
Âgofâc-nane, ŋoŋe tiwâ wirec nâniŋte tumaŋnerâ woŋec ŋehapie fisi-fârepie fuŋkenʒepieŋ.
Eme wiac ʒiŋuc honepo: Lama e sâfâ namba 6 bâhockeme homeŋ sâko bawec. Ehame ʒoaŋ gâpârerâ kuʒi sahacne iŋucne ewec, â mosa e soc iŋucne ewec.
Ŋokac gâcne jaŋere ŋokâ hâmockonec bâɋâre-jarekicne. Ŋic tucne bâʒâic-jopahuc mâsi qâsi ejarekicne, eme “miti behepie akic-ŋopazo” jazapie, juju sanaŋte ɋâreniŋte manasuhuc qikiŋnembiŋ.

Mume Paulozi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Jaŋe Romaŋic guruonec fuakicne nâhe dâŋficko mi râec-nâfohuc ŋichofao qâtâc bâtâc-nâforâ kâpâcwâru ficko râec-nâfombieŋ. Eme ʒi wemocte kamicnea sorec-nâfoŋgopieŋ? Iŋuc aricne, jaŋac ware jowac-nâfopie razeperec.”

Sâcmutâc dâŋ ʒiŋuc mukicne: Ŋowe ŋonâŋ ŋohe bebehec mi ezepirec, go ʒika mi qazemec, go fiuc mi rozemec, go andac mi ezemec, sâcmutâc dâŋ i erâ gâcne i mâmâc sasawa qâhâckerâ qizecne ʒiŋuc mukicne: Gahacnere egareekac sâc ijaha âgogere egarezejec.
Eme moc e irec erâ worickehuc juocmuzi Wofuŋ e ɋaɋacne jukac iŋucnea juocte maŋticne emasaŋkeocmu.
No maŋwâmbuŋ-nanezi Anutu sâcmutâc dâŋticnere mana aŋac eekopac.
Ŋoŋe Wofuŋte erâ ʒeri bubiaŋ manahuc junʒepieŋ, no harierâ mupe, ʒeri bubiaŋ mananʒepieŋ.
Eme no ŋic dâŋ nazawec e honepemurâ fotikiepo. Fotikierâ lambe 7 golzi bakicne honepo.
Erâ weni jaŋere mumupaŋ dâŋ ʒiŋuc muwec: Nore jujumana hae mâreŋko mi raʒinʒepieŋ? I dâŋticne qahuc jumbiŋ jaŋere hâcne muwec.
No mi fuahape fuambiŋ jaŋe ine fiuc roro â soroŋ qaqa. Irec lama jaŋe dâŋjeŋic mi manambiŋ.
Kiŋaŋ qaqa ŋoŋe bomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic araŋ bajarehuc micjeŋic reŋkenʒepieŋ, i bomboŋ urucne â mâteŋne jaŋe sawa mâcne, ʒâʒâicne jaŋe mâmâc iŋuc ejarenʒepieŋ.
Ehuc dâŋ qanaŋ bâmockerâ âgofâc-jeŋic jarepie bajumbiŋ jaŋe ejarepie Stefanore burec ehuc ʒiŋuc mumbiŋ: “Ŋic e tiri ufuŋ â sâcmutâc dâŋnâŋec surehuc juekac.
Wiac i Anuture mâsi sasawa. Eki hâcne Kristozi jahacnehec miriŋ bacnâpowec. Erâ nâŋâc miriŋ babac biŋedâŋ mupene haŋ baocte irec gie munârewec.
Âgofâc-nane, porofete Wofuŋte micte dâŋ mumbiŋzi ʒâic busâqoc tatakic tâmiric manahuc jumbiŋ jaŋere kike hata bâjâpehuc junʒepieŋ.
Eme ira Wofuŋte ʒâŋe riwaseckeniŋmu, jaŋe sisipirickonec batarac-jopazo.’
“Jâmbomac¡ Mumuteŋ â eri qaraweŋ â maŋɋârâŋ â daŋge mumu â ʒâŋe rara â tâpiri â sasanaŋ i Anutu-nâŋec focnekaczi focne rahuc juzejec sanaŋ. Jâmbomac.”
Ŋoŋe sahacte eri, qizec ba ericko bapa, kubu wiac furi sâko qoqonaŋ, ŋaqi qâreŋ biaŋ rojuju, irec manapie jawane ezejec.

Irec go Wofuŋ-nâŋecte biŋe mutaniŋkecmurâ mimi gaŋgaŋ mi ezemec, erâ kâpâcwâru ŋicticne nore dâŋ mucmurâ acmeruŋ wâc mi ezemec. Go Anutuzi tâpiri gareme sâc no qâsuecnurâ Biŋebiaŋte erâ ʒârâ hâriŋ faio juzemec.
Jaŋe dâŋ fâri qizecnezi maŋjeŋic furu bame juniŋte no nahac wâc jaŋere erâ maŋsahac-nane bâtirirâ râekopac.
Irec go ɋârerâ ŋic gâcne hâmozo eŋgopieŋ jaŋe maŋjeŋic âke ɋârezemec. Manakic, no Anuture maio eebapage honepe mi sâckekac.
Eme aŋelo namba 3 eki râqâc-ticnaonec wiac hoŋkeme opâo â riqicko hume soc efârewec.
Jesu ekizia motâc ronârewecte akio juŋgopeneŋ wâc. Erâ juku Anuture huriri qâreŋ fua tâcneme hone ʒiziwenaŋmu irec mamanac juhuc mu ʒeri eeŋgopeneŋ.
Ŋoŋe ʒiŋuc mana sanaŋkenʒepieŋ: Boe sau ŋic â sasec mamakâchec â buchâro, nemu qaŋgec ŋic hâcne, jaŋe Kristo â Anutu uucmaŋ-ticnao ŋeŋe basaniŋmu.
Abraham e mamanasiŋhec juwecte mâreŋ-ticne beherâ moc rauckeocte irec dâŋ erao fuame reŋkewec. Erâ mâreŋ irec me irec mukicne kâuc bahuc sifu rawec.
Waiŋ opâ wiacte âmbâŋ mi enʒepieŋ, izi maŋ sisipiric gie. Mârore ine âmbâŋ enʒepieŋ.
Ŋic i jaŋe sasec gie bapie bocjahazi honerâ bâjâpec-jopaniŋmu, eme jaŋere erâ miti hata susure fuaocmu.
Erâ wâc hata bâʒâwe-nârewecte nâŋâc Mâro mocjaha rauckerâ Mamactao fisieŋgopeneŋ.
Á qâpuckonec opâ ruac jaŋe nemuɋâŋte taha bâzi, qowisoc, qowi bituakicne â sasec boe sau irec sawa bâec baniŋte mupaŋke-jarembeŋ.”
Râeme Petorozi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Anania, go wemocte Sataŋzi maŋge bâsifuckeme Tiri Mâro eatuckehuc hae mâreŋgere furi tucne hefackekomec?
Nâŋâc ɋiene hati mi ee sanaŋkerâ juhapene eeatuc ŋic jaŋe sioc enârepie gibioc dâŋ â mumusifuc-jeŋicte mâŋâŋzi ba bâsoriŋ â qac qârândiŋ moc mi enârezejec.
Sâqocne bapazi Anuture uucmaŋko raraʒine mi fokac, i mi manaŋgopieŋ me? Ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic mi eatuckeniŋ, sau bapa, me bawe qaŋgec babaju, me ŋokac ba behecne, me sasecŋic, me ŋiczia mamakâc eec eene,
Ehuc mitire tutumaŋko gâcnezi mi fisihuc qâoma eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc mi ezo. Dameŋ sâko bâqiŋ-nâpokac, iŋuc hâcne manahuc ʒoɋac erâ faŋ qaqac enʒepeneŋ.
Wiac kecʒiŋucte ine sowa juhuc sahac-ŋeŋic bâhâmonʒepieŋ: Boe sau, maŋwânâŋ, bu gâgâpâcne, sasec sâqocne, buchâro, i eocmu e sahac-ticnezi wofuŋ ecnekac muzo.
Ʒoaŋte biŋe ekicne nâŋâc ine maŋte sowa junʒepeneŋ, ehuc mamanasiŋ â maŋjauŋ izi maruku enârezejec, â bâbâpiaŋte woworiczi dunâŋec ezejec.
Ehuc ʒiŋuc manasuzemec: Anutu e hâbi-nâŋec goroŋkeocte mâro mi nârewec, tâpirihec â maŋ jauŋhec â maŋsowahec enaŋte nârewec.
Á ŋic moc e sâcmutâc dâŋticne mana rereŋ mi ehuc muocmu, “No Anutu mana maŋ eekopac”, ere burecŋic muzo, ŋic iŋucnere maŋko dâŋ fâri qizecne mi fokac.
bubiaŋ-nane ferâ foocte mamanasu-ŋeŋic qâturenʒepieŋ, erâ maŋzi ʒâʒâfic ehuc mocjaha efârerâ wiac irecteaŋ henʒiriŋnehuc junʒepieŋ.
Iŋuc mume kâpâcwâru baniŋte mumbiŋ. Erâ dameŋ-ticne mi maickewecte mejeŋic mâckeme behembiŋ.
Erâ mu jaretec buafec â bokifac erâ eehâmo gie bahuc mitire fârine bocjaha bâfuanʒepieŋ.
Eme jaŋe mumbiŋ, “E sâqocne bapa mi juzac muzac gorao mi bawarenʒapeŋ.”

Ʒoaŋ gie bapa wose bâtâc eekaczi Wofuŋte erâ eekac, â nânâ kosa nâekaczi Wofuŋte erâ eekac wâc, ehuc Anutu nânâre daŋge âzâcneekac. Á nâ bâtâc eekaczi iŋuc jaha Wofuŋte erâ eekac, ehuc Anutu daŋge âzâcneekac wâc.
Sambaŋ worickehuc bubiaŋ junʒepieŋ, â ʒâic busâqocko maŋuruc junʒepieŋ. Erâ nunumu gie i uruc ʒuhuc jaha banʒepieŋ.
Iŋuc murâ momori micne ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Ŋoŋe Paulo soŋaŋkehuc râsi ʒâŋe mi ecnenʒepieŋ, â âgofâcne fisirâ jauŋ bazo mupie mi qatara-jarenʒepieŋ.”
maŋjauŋhec e dede ââsic-ticne ɋârâŋne, mamanasiŋ-ticne ɋârâŋne, maŋzi woworic-ticne ɋârâŋne, maŋuruc-ticne ɋârâŋne.
Dâŋqâreŋ moc ʒiŋuc fokac: “No Wofuŋ manasiŋkeekopacte miti muekopac.” Eme nâŋe dâŋqâreŋ irec sâcko Mârozi esoc-nâpoha Wofuŋ manasiŋkeeŋgopeneŋte miti mueŋgopeneŋ.

Âgofâc, hazec qâuŋ dâŋ moc ŋazape mananiŋ. Ŋic kosa jujune jaŋe uŋ sawaŋ ejarenʒepieŋ, ŋic manabâcne jaŋe mu âkeriŋ ejarenʒepieŋ, betaŋkekicne jaŋe dopec-jopanʒepieŋ, erâ mâmâc hezu hemiriŋ ejarenʒepieŋ.
Eme aŋelo namba 5 eki râqâc-ticnaonec wiac qowi mimicnere ŋicwofuŋ ŋeŋeo hoŋkeme wahawec. Wahame hae mâreŋ-ticne dapâc efârewec. Eme ŋic jaŋe ʒâic serereŋ manahuc nameŋ-jeŋic kitâcnembiŋ.
Gaŋ rukec ira hâcne domaeŋgopieŋ sâc ŋoŋerao wama â buuruc fotâcnerâ fozejec, erâ Anuture Israe ŋic jaŋerao mâmâc.
Erâ Wofuŋte miti hata qazucnepie i mâmâc manawec. Miti Opâ i Johanere Miti Opâ sawa manaweczi sifu Jesure binaŋ ʒocmâsâc bâruŋhec ninic jaha ŋic jaza qazuc ewec.
Irec ŋoŋe nânâ qowi nâniŋte, me i me i eniŋte Anutu mumbiaŋkehuc enʒepieŋ.

Ŋoŋere ine ʒiŋuc mukopac, Mâro rua-ŋarewec i ŋoŋerao foocmu, irec wemocte ŋic moczi mu qazuc eŋareocmu, i aricne. Mâro ruambiŋ eki dâŋ sasawa ŋaza qazuc eekac. Eme dâŋ i burec mâcne, i jâmbomac. Eme qazu-ŋarewec iŋuc maŋnao junʒepieŋ.
Irec ʒiŋuc fokac: Sahac e mâro tâmiric erâ qâŋɋâŋ eekac, iŋuc jaha mamanasiŋzi eehâmo gie tâmiric qâŋɋâŋne jaha eekac.
Iŋuc murâ hone-fârehapie poroŋ moc rorâ Anutu daŋge âzâcnehuc bazurâ nâwec.
Jaŋe nemuɋâŋte wiac mamakâcne â sasec boe sau â qowi bituakicne â qowisoc, wiac i bâec baniŋte mupaŋkerâ papia qâreŋke-jarenʒepeneŋ.
Mume Paulozi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Maŋge tâŋzi qakicne go Anutuzi guocmu. Go sâcmutâc dâŋte sâcko norao mumutiŋ gie bazo mukiczi wemocte sâcmutâc dâŋ qâsuahuc nuniŋte jazakic?”
Eme Jesu Kristohec jueŋgopieŋ ŋic i jaŋerao sâqocnere okacne mumutara-jare moc mi fufuane.
I ʒiŋucte: Anutu e kimbeŋ-ticnere fârine hotâckenaŋte mâcne, Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore erâ bâbâpiaŋ rauckenaŋte muekac.
Wefurâ ŋicne ŋicne mâreŋ ŋifec â ŋifec, faic â juwic juŋgopieŋ maŋjeŋic bâsifuckerâ Gogo â Magogo ŋic qafeŋ-jopame râsi roroc erâ fisiniŋmu, jaŋe ʒare-jeŋic hâwec moŋgeŋ iŋucne, wowosene tâmiric.

Eme gâcne ŋoŋe mârâc sâc iŋuc hâcne jujumbieŋ ʒi ine ʒurec-ŋopakicne â maŋfuru bacŋopakicne â kiŋfâsâc bacŋopakicne. I Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore ʒâŋe bajueŋgopieŋte â Anutu-nâŋecte Mârohec jueŋgopieŋte iŋuc eŋarekicne.

No irec hâcne ʒârâ hâriŋ faio juekopac, ehuc mi mimieekopac. No manasiŋkeekopac ere maŋjahec mi eekopac, aricne, no ʒiŋuc manapaŋkeekopac, e tâpiriheczi ʒeŋaŋ-nane sâcne soŋaŋke-narehame dameŋ sâko maickezokac.
Ŋoŋe ʒâfo sâc Mârore tâpirio Wofuŋ ʒuʒuhuc jaha numucnehuc wâsickenʒepieŋ, erâ qâoma mi ehuc rucjaric-ŋeŋic banʒepieŋ, erâ hae sâc mitiŋic guru jaŋere nunumu gie banʒepieŋ wâc.
Paulo, Siliwano â Timoteo nâŋe Tesalonike haeonec kikefuŋ, Anutu Mamac â Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo ere ŋicfâc, ŋoŋere papia ʒi râeŋgopeneŋ. Aki anonoc â wama ŋoŋerao fotâcnerâ fozejec.
Wofuŋzi bâqiŋ-nâpokacte ŋic sasawa wamane ejarenʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe poroŋ â waiŋ i nâniŋmu sâc Wofuŋ hâmoc biŋe-ticne mutaniŋkehuc juhapie risieocmu.
Eme mamanasiŋko nunumu mukicne izi huchec bâpiaŋkeocmu â Wofuŋzi e ɋiɋicne baocmu. Á sâqocne bawecko i bâtâmirecneocmu.
Mamac ŋosafâc-nane jaŋe maŋfâsâc juhuc tuczi tuc Anuture kiŋaŋ qawarekupie ɋâric-jeŋic noni iŋuc jaha eekopaczi daŋge âzâcnehuc nunumuo ʒuʒuhuc ŋafe furec manasucguhuc juekopac.
“Waharâ ŋemac-nâporâ bârârâŋ-nâpopie eri ŋeŋeo ŋekac ere ʒâŋeo mi henʒepeneŋ â Lamare kimbeŋ mi honenʒepeneŋ.
Mârozi kikefuŋ dâŋ jazakac, i hazecneheczi manazejec. Moc e sasanaŋ gie baraku batarame e mana soŋne gumepemu. Erâ qânâ qaŋqaŋ râcnepemu, ira ʒâŋe qâreŋ-ticne moc fome runezia buc manaocmu.’
Erâ wâc moneŋ mafare andac ehuc maŋko fuac dâŋzi eatuc-ŋopahuc wiac-ŋeŋicte kâŋgâc gie baniŋmu. Jaŋere okacne dâŋ esecne mukicne i mi pârâwewec, â sisipiric-jeŋic i micmâŋ mi ewec.
Ŋic jaŋe iŋuc eeŋgopieŋte Anutuzi eeatuc neŋgoc qizecne sâko mume fuame burecko qohotaniŋmu hâcne.
Irec hâcne kecʒiŋuc qâreŋkekicne: “Qâpuc jaŋe ŋoŋere kiŋte erâ Anuture ʒâŋe musoriŋkeeŋgopieŋ.”
Mârâc jaha Jaŋe â Jambere jahe Mosere dâŋ bawahapic, iŋuc jaha ŋic mukopac jaŋe maŋjeŋic sifuckekicnere mamanasiŋte hata kâuc bahuc mutuc eeŋgopieŋ.
No âgo bacjopaekopac jaŋe mu bâtiŋ â qa bâtiŋ ejare-fâreekopac. Irec go ʒoɋac erâ maŋge bârisiezemec.
Nâŋâc mamanasiŋte erâ kiŋfâsâc embeŋte Jesu Kristorao qohotahuc Anuture wamao juŋgopeneŋ.

Gahacne maŋ sahac soŋaŋkehuc mitire dâŋfuŋne furu mimic foŋareocte mâmâc soŋaŋkezemec. Go i hâcne paŋʒâic bajuzemec. Iŋuc ecmuo ine dâŋge manaeŋgopieŋ jaŋe mecne â go gahacne mâmâc juju biaŋko fisiniŋmu.
Judaŋic jaŋere mitificne ficne opâ ruac jopahuc jaŋe Jesure ʒâŋe musoriŋkeniŋte wiac qacne gâpâcne ejare jupac. Erâ no momori wânʒâŋ erâ hae ʒoricko ra jopa jâpec ejare jupac wâc.
Maŋraŋɋare gie i soŋsoŋko mi foekac, i ʒiŋuc fuaekac: Boe sau, mamakâc, nâ areŋ,
Irec he sarac eekac ere mi muzo, â hofâ gie baekac ere mi muzo, jambuŋkeme fârine fuaekac, Anutu hâcne ere mocjaha muzo.
Eme mitire wiac moc mi basaeŋgopieŋ. Mâc Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo fua taniŋkeocte woŋec mocjaha jueŋgopeneŋ.
Eme sambâŋkonec dâŋfânâŋ manapo, i opâ sâro fânâŋ iŋucne â ɋuŋ fânâŋ sâko iŋucne. Erâ dâŋfânâŋ i manape musi tinac ewec, ŋic bocjaha musi bapie fânâŋkeekac iŋuc tinac manapo.
Eme e manasiŋkeniŋmu jaŋe ʒâŋe biŋe-ticnere erâ sâqocne tâmire-jareocmu, i porofete jaŋe mufua-fârembiŋ.”
Ŋic eehâmo gie paŋʒâic bahuc eri tatamac â juju saric bâfuaniŋte samarieniŋmu jaŋe juju sanaŋ jarezokac.
Johane no Asia mâreŋko kikefuŋ 7 juŋgopieŋ ŋoŋere papia ʒi qâreŋkekopac. Juweczi jukac erâ wâc wareocmu eraonec mecne, â mâro 7 eri ŋeŋefuŋ-ticnao juŋgopieŋ jaŋeraonec mecne,
Mupie Paulozi ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Johane eki ŋic jaŋe maŋjeŋic bârisieniŋte opâ rua-jarehuc ʒiŋuc jazawec: ‘Râpefuŋ-naneo warehuc jukac e manasiŋkenʒepieŋ. Dâŋ i Jesure muwec.”
Wofuŋ eki ine ŋic mitihec eesâic docko roroŋ sasapec ejareekac â miti tâmiric jaŋe okac dameŋko ʒâic gie mujareocte kâpâcwâru bacjopaekac.
Jaŋe ine hae mâreŋ biaŋ mocte maŋhâhâŋ ejarewec, sambâŋko fokac irec hâcne. Irec Anutu e jaŋere Anutu, ere iŋuc mupene maname mi sâqoreekac. Wemocte? E jahac hae sâko moc bâfua-jarewec.
Á qeŋokac qizec dâŋ wose murarane ine qikiŋnezemec. Go Wofuŋ manasiŋkehuc jucmurâ maŋzi aafec bazemec.
Fisirâ mâreŋ wâneŋ sâko ira raferâ tiriŋic toma âterâ fohapie somâc-jopambiŋ. Somâc-jopahuc hae biaŋ i mâmâc orâŋkembiŋ. Iŋuc ehapie sambâŋkonec ʒoc waharâ ʒâhâmoc-jopa-fârewec.
Iŋuc murâ mume ŋicfâcne jaŋe Jesu Kristo ere ʒâŋeo ʒuhuc-jopahuc opâ rua-jarembiŋ. Eme jaŋe Miti Opâ ruarâ Petoro sakarepie ʒoaŋ gie bapa gâcne jaŋehec ŋeŋe juju ewec.
Ehuc gahacnere ʒiŋuc muekic: “No tiŋtuŋ sâcne jowa qataŋ ejarepemu, â dapâcko juŋgopieŋ jaŋe sâcne batamae-jarepemu,
Wiac i Jesuzi biŋe qanârewec, juju sanaŋ hâcne.
Maŋɋârâŋ hata faicnec izi ine wiac ʒiŋuc bâfuaekac: Qanaŋ maŋɋaɋac, erâ wama, miriŋ, micrereŋ, uruc jauŋhec juju â mitire fârine gâcne, erâ wâc maŋguru tâmiric â siocmâc juju.
Mamac e Ŋokâ hone ririŋkehuc ere meo wiac sasawa râe-fârewec.

Wofuŋ e dâŋ muwec irec fârine bâfuaocte bititiehuc dameŋ mi bâʒoraekac, ŋic gâcnezi manapie iŋuc tinac eekac. Aricne, e ŋic gâcnezi sipirickenʒipiŋte ŋoŋere erâ woŋec juekac. E ŋic mâmâc sasawa maŋjeŋic bârisie-fâreniŋte muekac hâcne.
Nahacne maŋzi ʒiŋuc mukac: Ŋic sasawa no jukopac iŋuc jufârenʒapiŋ me. Anutu e ine tâpiri buc buc tahac-nâpoekac i hatane bârâwiŋ, moc iŋuc â moc iŋuc.
Ŋoŋe maŋjauŋhec juniŋte ɋicwânʒâŋ enʒepieŋ. Erâ miti kadahe gâcne roniŋte irec wâc ʒoɋac enʒepieŋ, ehuc Anuture micdâŋ mumufuare manapie fefene ezejec.
Anutu e mârâc jaha fuŋnao dapâc fohame hae mâreŋ fureocte mume furewec, ekizia hâcne mume maŋnâŋecko mitire tatamaczi uŋ heme Kristore ʒâŋe maio Anuture huriri qâreŋ fua tâcneha ʒâŋitambeŋ.
Ehame Efeso haeo Judaŋic moc fisiwec, ʒâŋene Apolo. E Alesandria haeo fuawec, ŋic e mamana sâkohec, miti papia woseku mana tara-fârewec.
Eme Jesu e iŋuc jaha socticnezi ŋic maŋfuru bacnâpoocte hae sahao qapie hâmowec.
Go paŋʒâic erâ dâŋ i hâcne jazahuc mu sawaŋ â mu bâtiŋ ejarezemec. Ŋic jaŋe go mi hucgunʒepieŋ.
Anutuzi Ŋokâ-ticne mocjaha e juju bâfua-nâreocte mâreŋko soreme wahawec ira hâcne maŋjauŋ-ticne nâŋâcnao fua taniŋkewec.
Mamac, naremeŋ ŋic i jaŋe no jupemuoa juniŋte mukopac. Eme mâreŋ hobeteŋne mi fuahame maŋjauŋ enarehuc sambâŋ tatamac tahacnumeŋ, i hâcne nohec juhuc hone aŋac enʒepieŋ.
Ima samaki bahuc tuhu bâfuaeŋgopieŋ.
Taha bapa sâko hahaŋnehec moc junârekac, e sambâŋ fotâcne-fârerâ fewec jukac, Jesu Anuture Ŋokâ hâcne, eme iŋucne junârekacte ʒâŋe-ticne murâ rereŋ enʒepeneŋ.
Ine Anutu Mamaczi eri mumuteŋ râcnehame sambâŋ tatamackonec erao dâŋ ʒiŋuc wahawec: “Joroc Ŋokâ-nane keci hâcne, no hone aŋac ecneekopac.”
Wiac i sasawa Mâro izia bafâreekac, ehuc maŋticnere ŋic ru sâc wiac bârâwiŋne-nâreekac.

Eme aŋelo namba 4 eki qeŋ qawec. Qeŋ qame ʒoaŋ mosa â bâpiŋ gâcne ira sâwec fuame tatamac-jeŋic pitiwawec. Tatamac-jeŋic gâkowawecte hae burec burec sawa furewec â ŋafeo iŋuc jaha mosa bâpiŋ buburecne tamaewec.
Eme jaŋe ʒeŋgoma mitificte soŋaŋ Sostene hâporâ kiare maio qa imac ecnembiŋ. Eme kiazi hone qâoma ejarewec.
Iŋuc mume kâpâcwâru bazo ehuc bârucnepie rawec.
Nâŋe ʒiŋuc manahuc mi pârâweeŋgopeneŋ: Sahac-nâŋec bâmuzuckehame maŋnâŋec ʒoaŋne ʒoaŋne soka biaŋ eekac.
Ŋehapie Mariazi kiruŋ moc opâ âsu biaŋ furi sâko jâmbâŋ i rorâ Jesu kikene ruacnerâ qizec susuc-ticnezi bâkereŋkewec. Eme fic âsu biaŋ fifârewec.
Mamanasiŋhecte mâreŋ biŋe qacnekicne ira ra fisirâ jaba juwec. Jaba juhuc bozeo sawa ŋeŋerâ juwec. Isaka â Jakobo jahe biŋe mâmâc qajactekicnezi sâc ijaha epic.
Âgofâc-nane bânie-ŋarepe honecnuhuc ijaha bâjâpecnunʒepieŋ. Á ŋic gâcne sâc ijaha juhuc bânie-ŋareeŋgopieŋ jaŋerao wâc ʒâŋe fihuc junʒepieŋ.
Wiac kihuhuŋ-ŋopaekac i nowac gowacroŋ ehuc babaficko banʒepieŋ. Iŋuc ehuc Kristore sâcmutâc dâŋ sâcne reŋkeniŋmu.
Honeŋgopieŋ, Anutu e ŋic moc mamanasiŋ-ticnere sawa mi maname kiŋfâsâc eocmu, fârine eehâmo gie bame manacneme kiŋfâsâc eocmu.
Eme irec weniŋuc muzo? Anutu erao guriŋ bapa hehesicne moc fokac me? I aric kereŋne.
Mitio gegec bititicne jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe âgo miriŋ ejarenʒepieŋ, ehuc wiac omanere memeŋgaru epie mu qâsuac mi ejarenʒepieŋ.
Eme sambâŋko ʒika fuawec. Mikae â aŋelofâc-ticne jaŋe oâ qa jâpec ecneniŋte râsi roroc embiŋ, â ŋifec oâ â aŋelofâcne jaŋe iŋuc jaha râsi roroc embiŋ.
Kimbeŋko mi sâqorenʒepieŋ. Kimbeŋ aaric mi bajuhapie ʒoaŋ ŋeutuckezejec.

Wiac sâqocne eŋarepie okacne sâqocne jaha mi ejarenʒepieŋ, sosopec dâŋ ŋazapie okacne sosopec dâŋ jaha mi jazanʒepieŋ, aricne, ŋoŋe jambuŋ hotâckeniŋte hefârec-ŋopakicnere jaŋe wâc jambuŋdâŋ jazanʒepieŋ.
Sorecnuwec e nohec juekac. No dameŋ sâc wiac epe bape maname biaŋkeekacte no mi behecnuekac.”
Ŋoŋe kecʒiŋuc domanʒepieŋ: Dâŋ fâri qizecnezi umbika-ŋeŋic eme jomanʒepieŋ, kiŋfâsâczi maruku-ŋeŋic eme rufanʒepieŋ,
Erâ mefâre-naneo bâpiŋ 7 i mecne â lambe 7 golzi bakicne mâmâc honemec, irec fuŋne gazape manac: Bâpiŋ 7 i kikefuŋ 7 jaŋere aŋelo, â lambe 7 ine kikefuŋ 7.

Jesu ine honeŋgopeneŋ, e dameŋ ŋondeŋ bembeŋne mac aŋelo jaŋere wahamicne juhuc hâmocte ʒâic manawecte tatamac â ʒâŋe biŋe tahackekicne hâporâ jukac. E Anutuzi aki anonoc enâreocte mume hâmoc hâtâne ŋic sasawa nâŋâcnere erâ manawec hâcne.
Anutu e jahac hâcne, honec-ŋopame biaŋkeocte aafecke mecne fârine bâbâfua mecne irec tâpiri ŋareekac.
Nore bubiaŋzi ŋoŋerao fotâcneme ŋoŋerezi fufusuc foocte dâŋ ʒi ŋaza-fârekopac. Erâ ŋoŋerao fohuc fua sawec ezejec.
Paulo no Anutu bâbâpiaŋ-nâŋecte micte â Kristo Jesu mamanac-nâŋecte micte Kristo Jesure aposolo juekopaczi

Á ŋokac jaŋere mukopac, jaŋe ŋaqi aickerâ rojuhuc rume rume jupie izi eri-jeŋic ezejec, â qizec susuc-jeŋicko mâsi qâreŋ ee, me eri wiac furi sâko qoqonaŋ, me ŋaqi hohonebâcne ro juju ine mi enʒepieŋ.
Iŋuc epie Jesuzi honec-joparâ repa mizeme ʒika eme ŋic mecne lama bulimakao mecne jâpec-jopame wisepie moneŋ tie-jarerâ irec tebo herândiŋkewec.
Nâŋâc Anuture metofafâc, eki Kristo Jesuo bâfuac-nâpowec hâcne, erâ hata biaŋne Anutuzi hâcne muʒâwe-nârewec i âtehuc junaŋte munârewec.
Jorocfâc-nane, ŋoŋerao hâbi qaqazure wiac micne momori fuawec fokac, eme ŋoŋe wiac ʒâŋe furu fua-nârekac muhuc bipic tatara mi enʒepieŋ.
Irec
Erâ wâc aeŋdu ʒâŋene bâbâpiaŋ hepie huzejec, â Mâroraonec ʒika, Anuture dâŋ hâcne, i bajunʒepieŋ.
Rarâ Aigita ŋic moczi Israe ŋic moc qame honerâ âgo-ticne ŋezickehuc Aigita ŋic hâmocne qawec.
Âgofâc, ŋoŋe ine eehâmo gie tatakic tâmiric banʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe rucjaric-ŋeŋic bahuc mamanasiŋko qiŋ henʒepieŋ, ehuc hâbi-ŋeŋic rorâ sanaŋkenʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe Molokore qoruc boze reŋke jumbieŋ â nemu Refaŋ ere bâpiŋ hawari bajumbiŋ. Wiac i hâcne numucneniŋte ba akic embiŋ. Irec no Babe ocniŋucnao râec-ŋopapemu.’
Eme irec âgofâc ŋoŋe sanaŋkerâ dâŋ miczi â papiazi ŋaza qazuc embeŋ i paŋʒâic bajunʒepieŋ.
Wiac biaŋ i fua-nâreocte bâmoc-nâpowec i Anutu eki hâcne, ehuc irec kifac Mâro hâcne râe-nârewec.
Ŋokac jaŋe wahamicne juhuc niniŋkerâ hazec râehuc mamana gie banʒepieŋ.
Ŋic mocjahazi soŋaŋ moc dâŋko râezo mume mi manacnezemec, ŋic 2 me 3 jaŋe mupie ine manarâ giene bazemec.
Ŋaŋac wâc mitio meo babac enʒepieŋ. Hae sâc Kristore kikefuŋ jaŋe ŋoŋere mamanac wâc juŋgopieŋ.
Manaŋgopieŋ, Mamac-nâŋec e maŋjauŋ mo iŋucne enârehuc naru motecfâc-ticne munârewec. Eme i hâcne juŋgopeneŋ. Ŋic miti tâmiric jaŋe mi ʒâŋitac-nâpoeŋgopieŋ, i Anutu e jahacne mi ʒâŋitambiŋ irec.

Ŋic socɋâri ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha ŋazakopac, ŋoŋe ŋic kâcɋene jaŋere wahamicne junʒepieŋ. Erâ mâmâc sasawa ine gie qoruc ʒâŋene maŋhuhuŋ i jomarâ kiŋaŋ qaqac enʒepieŋ. Manaŋgopieŋ, Anutu e ŋic maŋfefe jaŋe dope qatara-jareekac â ŋic maŋhuhuŋ ine dope sicne-jareekac.
I aric kereŋne¡ Anutu e buc mume sasanaŋ â ŋic ine mumu dodocne, iŋuc muzo. Miti qâreŋ moc ʒiŋuc hâcne fokac: “Go mumutiŋgezi dâŋfâri eocmu, â mumutaragezi ɋaɋacne eocmu.”
Erâ ʒira iŋuc jaha ʒâŋege riwaseckeeŋgopeneŋ nâŋe repac-nâporâ bacnâpo raocte taha bapa micne jaŋe mucnembiŋ.”

Israe ŋic jaŋerao porofete burecne i wâc mâmâc fuarâ jumbiŋ, eme ŋoŋerao iŋuc jaha qaqazu burecne fuaniŋmu. Jaŋe mitire mumusifuc bâfuapie ŋoŋerao fâfâuc fuaocmu, erâ Wofuŋ kiwiric-jeŋic rowec e mickeniŋmu. Iŋuc epie sisipiric ɋeŋfâfâc jaha fisi-jareocmu.
Eme Jesu e sabata hombaŋ hesifuckewec â Anuture Mamac-nane muhuc Anuture sâcko ʒuhuckewec, Judaŋic jaŋe wiac jajahec irec erâ mana gâpârerâ qaniŋte mumbiŋ.
Ŋoŋe wiac ebac epo Irec manasu-fârehuc mumutâc dâŋnanere sâcko jueŋgopieŋ, irec manape biaŋkekac.
Dawidizi ere hâcne kecʒiŋuc muwec: ‘No Wofuŋ hone dendeŋnehuc mi beheekopac, e fâre-naneo domahame biric boroc mi epemu.
Ŋoŋe fufua ɋâri i ukic sisirowenaonec mâcne, mi sisirowenaonec, Anuture dâŋ jujune â fofo sanaŋ, irecnec âkeʒurâ fuambiŋ.
Irec ŋoŋe ɋiɋic qaniŋte sâqocne mumufuac erâ nunumuzi dodopec enʒepieŋ. Ŋic tiŋne moczi numume tâpirinehec eocmu.
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape mananiŋ: Moc e no manasiŋnuocmuzi juju sanaŋhec eocmu.
No behec-ŋopape bekâ mâsiŋ erâ mi juniŋmu. No ŋoŋerao risie warepemu.
Iŋuc aricne. Judaŋic jaŋe wiac bocjaha tahac-jopakicne. Jaŋe hâcne Anutuzi biŋedâŋ fuŋne fuŋne jazame irec rune embiŋ.
Kiŋaŋ qaqa ŋoŋe mâreŋ ŋicbomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic araŋ bajarehuc, maŋŋeŋiczi qâzuc foha, Kristo ecneŋgopieŋ tinac, mana mezac ehuc micjeŋic reŋkenʒepieŋ.
Me Wofuŋzi buuruc â wama ruaine sâc fekicne egarehuc akicguhuc jume go wemocte manatâc qatakic ehuc juekic? Go maŋge bârisiecmurâ Anutuzi buuruc egareekac i mi mana taraekic me?
Nâŋâc ʒiŋuc muhuc Anutu bubiaŋ manacneeŋgopeneŋ: Wiac mocte, e jahac maname fokac irec sâcko râehuc numucnepene mana-nâreocmu.
Ʒeŋaŋ rune Anutu e mamanasiŋ-ŋeŋicte bubiaŋ â wama bâfua-ŋareme Tiri Mârore tâpirio ŋesiŋnepie sambâŋ ʒeŋaŋ-ŋeŋicte manariŋ qâriŋ ŋoŋerao fua ŋeiŋ ezejec.
Eme Jesu qambiŋ mâreŋ irec ŋifecnao Jufu gie moc fowec, ira hawec moc ʒâŋeruŋte biŋe gufukicne fowec. Ira ŋic moc mi ducjopakicne, furu fowec.
Ŋoŋe ine ʒiŋuc enʒepieŋ: Râsige nânâre hâmome nânâ gumezemec, opâre hâmome opâ gumezemec. Go iŋuc etecne mimiehuc ʒara marane eocmu.
Kristore dâŋzi ŋondeŋ-ŋeŋicko sawe mâririackezejec. Eme maŋɋârâŋ dâŋ fuŋne fuŋne qaqazuc ehuc faŋ qaqac enʒepieŋ. Erâ miti gae mânec i Mârozi baafec-ŋopaha maŋŋeŋiczi Anutu muteŋkehuc hecnenʒepieŋ.
Ŋic ŋoŋe ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic maŋjauŋ ejarenʒepieŋ, ʒâʒâicne ine mi ejarenʒepieŋ.
Hozec moc e miti ŋokac mocte ficko juhuc gie bafickeme ine eki bâmec bacnezejec, â qâqâhâc-jeŋickonec mi rozejec, qâqâhâc-jeŋic i hozec waha qaqane jaŋere ezejec.
Á dâŋ dopeckewec ine ʒiŋuc fuakac: Anutu e juju sanaŋ bâfua-nârewec, â juju sanaŋ irec jâcne ine Ŋokâ-ticne.
Moc e Ŋokâ rauckeocmu e juju rauckeocmu, moc e ŋokâ mi rauckeocmu e juju wâc mi rauckeocmu.
Irec Ŋokâ eki firuec-ŋopame ŋoŋe jâmbomac niŋgiŋ tâmiric juniŋmu.
Irec ʒiŋuc ŋazape mananiŋ: No ŋoŋere erâ fific guguriŋ faio jupe irec maŋŋeŋic mi wahazejec, aricne, ŋoŋe irec manapie eri qoqonaŋ-ŋeŋic ezejec.
Ŋic iŋucne jaŋe Wofuŋ Kristo mâcne, jaŋe jaŋacne hobu kiŋaŋ qacneeŋgopieŋ. Ehuc mumumbiaŋ dâŋ muhuc ŋic ŋokac omane mu bâmiriŋ ejarehuc eatuc-jopaeŋgopieŋ.
Ehuc wiac hehesicne fuŋne fuŋne hurepie fewec, sindaŋ, andac, râŋgeŋne, erâ maŋjeŋicko iiŋguuŋ â ʒika â rârâsi â eeatuc, erâ gibioc izi fusucmakicne.
Tiri Mâro maŋnâŋecko juekac eki neŋgoc ŋegarehame miti kâdoc qârârie-garekicne, i aimuŋ soŋaŋketec fogarezejec.
Moc e maŋraŋɋare gie baocmu, e juku maŋraŋɋa-ticnere fârine sisipiric bâfuaocmu, â moc e Mârore gie baocmu, e juku Mârore fârine juju sanaŋ bâfuaocmu.
Erâ Wofuŋ maŋbâiŋ wâc mi ecnenʒepeneŋ. Jaŋeraonec gâcnezi maŋbâiŋ ecnepie homazi kicjopame hâmo sipiric embiŋ.
e ʒaubac tâmiric, iiriac tâmiric, aaric tâmiric, kiŋ babaju tâmiric juocmu;
Amec-jeŋicko maro wapazi bakicne tinac fowec. Fakec fânâŋ-jeŋic ine keretac fânâŋ iŋucne, becâsic bocjaha jaŋe ʒikao raniŋte keretac gagasac jaha fâre rapie fânâŋkeekac, iŋucne tinac hâcne.
No jaŋerao mi waharâ fuŋne mi jazape muzac kiŋ tâmiric junʒapiŋ. Ʒi ine kiŋjeŋic wemocko murârâŋneniŋmu.
Qâpuc jaŋehec bâbâfuac erâ wiac mana tara-hâmohuc enʒepieŋ. Ehuc gie bapa dameŋ mi sipirickenʒepieŋ.
Ʒiŋuc manaŋgopeneŋ: Maŋraŋɋa-nâŋec Jesuhec mâmâc maripoŋko qakicne, i maŋsahac-nâŋecko sâqocnere tâpiri ŋeŋgoroŋkeocte â sâqocnere kiŋaŋ mocwâc mi qanaŋte.
Anuture naru motec â Sataŋte naru motecfâc jaŋere fuŋne ʒiŋucko hâcne taniŋkeme honezo: Moc e juju tiŋne mi juocmu, e Anuturaonec mi mucnezo, â moc e âgo-ticne maŋjauŋ mi ecneocmu, ere ijaha muzo.
Maŋraŋɋare wiacte mamanasu izi Anutu kisâ ecneekac. Ehuc sâcmutâc dâŋticne mi dapecneekac, i wemo-ticnezi sâcne ezac¡
Irec bunane biaŋkeme nameŋzi mu ʒeri ekopac, erâ sahac-nanezi wâc sâcne ŋec foc eocmu.
Iŋuc aricne. Qâpuc jaŋe tiwâ ʒepec rikeeŋgopieŋ i Anuture biŋe mâcne, i demoŋ jaŋere biŋe eekac. Eme no ŋoŋere ʒiŋuc mukopac: Ŋoŋe demoŋ jaŋehec ʒuʒuhuc mi enʒepieŋ.
Antiokia kikefuŋ maŋnao porofete â qaqazu ʒiŋuc jumbiŋ: Banaba, â Simoŋ, ʒâŋe-ticne moc Nige, â Lukio Kirene haeonec, â Manaeŋ, e ŋicwofuŋ Herode ehec mâmâc qâqârândiŋ juhuc sokapic, erâ Saulo.
Eatuc-ŋopahuc siocdâŋ ŋazapie manapie fârine mi ezejec. Sâqocne iŋucnere hâcne Anuturaonec okacne qaqatara ŋic jaŋerao fuaocmu.
Ŋic izi hâcne moneŋ mafare erâ, mumusifuc-jeŋic qatarakicne i musawehuc garikiŋ gâcne furu jaha ba sipiric ejareeŋgopieŋ; ŋic iŋucne jaŋere mic qâbâzickezo.
E doc bapa-ticne mana tarahuc ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Ŋoŋe ɋaɋacnea mi jufâreŋgopieŋ.”
Jesuzi dâŋ ʒiŋuc muwec: “No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape mananiŋ, moc e lama jaŋere sapao feocte motâcko mi raʒihuc mocko sac huckerâ huocmu, ere fiuc roro â soroŋ qaqa muzo.
Jaŋe hata dândâŋne i râpeckerâ qâsoriehuc Bileam, Beorore ŋokâ, ere kike hata bâjâpembiŋ. E sâqocnere furi roocte andac eme
Izi ʒâhecko ŋic qâpuc â Judaŋic gâcne jaŋe aposolo qânâzi he imac ejacteniŋte roroc epie

Iŋuc murâ harierâ wiocnewec: “Simoŋ Johanere ŋokâ, go jâmbomac nore egarekac me?” Ʒâʒâficte wiocneme jahec â moc eme Petoro e bune sâqoreme muwec: “Wofuŋ, go wiac sasawa mana-fâreekic, no gore enarekac i wâc manakomec.” Mume Jesuzi muwec: “Go lamafâc-nane soŋaŋ-jopazemec.
Wiac wâwânâŋhec ine moc mi raʒi-jâmbâŋkeocmu. Á ŋic moczi wiac mamakâcne me burec bajuocmu, e hae ira wâc mi raʒiocmu. Ʒâŋe-jeŋic Lamare juju sanaŋ papiao qâreŋkekicne jaŋe sawa raʒiniŋmu.
Á ŋokac e ŋaqi bâbâroŋ â âmuc âmucne rojuwec, erâ erizi kiseŋ qâseŋ kiwec. Meticnezi râqâc moc golzi bakicne badomawec, i sasec-ticnere sohoŋ mamakâczi fusewec.
Eme wiac sasawa irec fainao maŋjauŋ bajupie izi wiac bâture-fârehuc ematauckezejec.
Âzâcnepire ʒiŋuc muwec: “Ŋic Fâri Wâtuŋne huriri qâreŋ-ticne fua tâcneocte ʒâfo maickekac hâcne.
Ŋowe ŋonâŋ ŋohe bebehec mi ezepirec jazahuc gahac ŋonâŋge beheekic. Go nemuɋâŋ sureekiczi nemu ufuŋte wiac fiuc roekic.
Sâqocne e ine sâcmutâc dâŋzi ŋesiŋ ecnehame maŋnane suruckeme andac fuŋne fuŋne fuawec. Sâcmutâc dâŋqâhâc mi fome muzac sâqocnezi mâc mâteŋkerâ fozac.
No ŋicguru ʒi â ŋic qâpuc jaŋere meonec bataracguhuc jupemu.
Nâŋâc mârâc jaha iŋuc jaha maŋmutuc erâ râŋgeŋne juhuc qac qâsoric ejumbeneŋ. Erâ sasec fuŋne fuŋne irec kiŋaŋ qahuc sindaŋ â iiŋguuŋ bâfuarâ mamakâcne erâ kikisuec ejumbeneŋ.

No Anutu â Jesu Kristo ere maio â aŋelo bufuŋfâc-ticne jaŋere maio kecʒiŋuc mupaŋke-garekopac: Dâŋ gaza qâmoc ekopac i aimuŋ soŋaŋkehaŋ moc mi wahazejec, ehuc maŋgere ŋic ŋokac wiac sâctiri moc mi ejarezemec.
Eme ʒi hâbi-ŋeŋic mi goroŋkezejec, hâbihec juku furine kâcɋene rozo.
Eme soŋaŋ e ine metâne juocte mucnekicne.
Eme Petoro e ŋic moc ʒâŋene Simoŋ, becsahac bapa, ere ficko dameŋ ʒoʒoricne ŋeŋe juju ewec.
Ŋoŋe Anuture miti ufuŋ, â Anuture Mârozi maŋŋeŋicko ŋeŋe juju eekac, i mi manaŋgopieŋ me?
Âgofâc, Jesu e socticnezi motâc ronârewecte furu ufuŋko fenaŋte maŋnâŋe. afeckekac.
Eme Jesu e harierâ ʒiŋuc jazawec: “No behec-ŋopa rape ŋoŋe basacnurâ sâqocne-ŋeŋichec juku hâmoniŋmu. No ra jupemu ira wemocko fâniŋmu.”
Eme Anuture biŋefâc, e jahac maŋjauŋ eŋarehuc rowosâec-ŋopawec, ŋoŋe buuruc â buafec â maŋhuhuŋ â miriŋ â bumâteŋ izi ŋaqi-ŋeŋic eme hepie hume rojunʒepieŋ.
Moc e nore kiŋaŋ qaqa ezo murâ bâjâpecnuzejec, eme no jupemuoa kiŋaŋ qaqa-nanezi juocmu. Moc e no kiŋaŋ qanareocmu, e Mamac-nanezi erickeocmu.
e jahacne wiacfâc sâcne soŋaŋ-jopazejec erâ pectâc juhuc naru motecfâcne mu bâtiŋ ejareme micrereŋhec junʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe irec hâcne faŋ qaqac â hehe ʒakiec eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc jaha ehuc junʒepieŋ.
Mitidâŋ mana wareeŋgopieŋ i ʒiŋuc hâcne: Maŋzi Jauŋ babac enʒepeneŋ.
Dameŋ ʒiŋuczia ʒârâ hâriŋ boc fuaekacte ŋic moc ŋonâŋ tâmiric juzo mume manape biaŋkeocmu.
Farisaio ŋic jaŋere âgo moc juwec ʒâŋene Nikodemo. E Judaŋic jaŋere micne sâko wâc juwec.
Á sasec ŋokac Rahaba e iŋuc jaha mamanasiŋ-ticnere fârine eehâmo gie bame Anutuzi manacneme kiŋfâsâc ewec. E ŋic mâreŋ hone tâcnepic jahe erao fisipire âgo ejacterâ hatasoŋko râec-jofame wisepic.
Ŋokaczi motec roro-ticnere biaŋkeocmu, ine mamanasiŋhec â maŋjauŋhec erâ maŋɋaɋac juniŋmu ŋokac i jaŋe iŋuc hâcne eniŋmu.
Israe ŋic nâŋâcne Anutu eki mimi apafâc-nâŋec rowosâec-joparâ Aigita mâreŋko juhapie basawec-jopawec. Erâ tâpiri sanaŋ-ticnezi irecnec jowac-jopa warerâ
Eme Anutu e maŋ hohonezi Judaŋic nâŋâc Tiri Mâro nârewec iŋuc jaha ŋic qâpuc jarehuc fuŋne nâwotuwec.
“Ŋowe ŋonâŋ ŋohe bebehec mi ezepirec” muwec ekizia wâc “go ʒika mi qazemec” muwec. Eme go ŋonâŋge mi behecmu, ʒika ine qacmu, ine dâŋ qaqatara ŋic ecmu.
Eme juju sanaŋ bâfua-jarepe sisipiric tâmiric juraʒihuc juniŋmu. Jaŋe nore meonec moczi babatarac-jopane mi fokac.
Anutu wama rune eki mi ʒoraha Sataŋ ro bawaha âte ecneocmu. Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo ere aki anonoczi ŋoŋerao fozejec.
sahaczi miti hawari juhuc mitio sasanaŋ tâmiric juju. Iŋucne hâcne jupie honec-joparâ râpec-jopazemec.
Eme ŋifec Kristorao iŋuc jaha bocjahazi qâfâsâepene fâri ombâŋ mocjaha ekac, erâ me kikefâcne juhuc dodopec eeŋgopeneŋ.
Dâŋ i jâmbomac, eme go ɋicwânʒâŋ erâ âkendâŋnetec Anutu manasiŋkeeŋgopieŋzi eehâmo gie baniŋte ʒoɋac enʒepieŋ. I wiac biaŋne, i epie ŋic jauŋ bacjopaocmu.
Eme irec hâcne Abrahamte dâŋqâreŋ kecʒiŋuc fokac i sanaŋkewec: “Abraham e Anutu manasiŋkeme ere maname kiŋfâsâc ewec.” Eme irec ʒâŋe-ticne Anuture âgo mucnekicne
Âgofâc, ŋoŋe tatamac Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo manasiŋkeeŋgopieŋzi ŋic fekicne wahakicne wiac sâctiri mi ejarenʒepieŋ.
Marac-jeŋic i hâmoc qâŋɋâŋ bâbâfua, nameŋ-jeŋic forisieme eatuc dâŋ wefuekac, qotâ marasiŋ kisoŋnerâ jueŋgopieŋ.
Eme ŋowe jaŋe jaŋacne sahac jauŋ bacneeŋgopieŋ, sâc ijaha ŋonâŋfâc-jeŋic bajarenʒepieŋ. Moc e ŋonâŋ-ticne maŋjauŋ ecnehuc e jahacne sahac mâmâc ecneocmu.
Eme ʒi weniŋuc muzo? Kecʒiŋuc: ŋic qâpuc tiŋke biaŋ eniŋte mi fotariembiŋzi tiŋke biaŋ embiŋ, mamanasiŋte tiŋke biaŋ embiŋ hâcne.
Miti boreŋ soŋsoŋ fowarehuc juwec i maŋɋaɋacko duckepie fozejec.

Erâ bomboŋfâc-jeŋic gâcne opâ ruac jaŋe ine ʒiŋuc mi muhuc bawahac­ jopanʒepieŋ: “Mitio sâcnâŋec mocjaha eŋgopeneŋ.” Aricne, “bomboŋfâc-nâŋec jaŋe Wofuŋ manasiŋkepie âgo jauŋ ejareekacte ehâmo-nâreeŋgopieŋ”, iŋuc muhuc kiŋaŋ maŋafec jaha qajarepie sâckeocmu. Go dâŋ i jaza mutâc ehuc faŋ qajarezemec.
Eme weniŋuc? Judaŋic gâcne jaŋe dâŋte woŋec juku pârâckembiŋte ʒiŋuc muzo me? “Dodocke-jeŋiczi Anutu mume sasanaŋ-ticne bawahaocmu.”
momori moczi tambaraŋne sânduzi âke mârâŋkeme soc â opâ wahawec.
Micdâŋ-nane kecʒiŋuc ŋazakopac: Noni maŋjauŋ eŋareekopac, iŋuc jaha ŋaŋaczia maŋjauŋ eec enʒepieŋ.

Erâ wâc me sahac-ŋeŋic i hehesicte mi qikiŋnepie sâqocnere kiŋaŋ qazejec. Aricne, ŋoŋe hâmockonec bâɋârec-ŋopakicnezi Anuture gieo raʒinʒepieŋ, ehuc mesahac-ŋeŋic Anuture qikiŋnepie tiŋnere kiŋaŋ qazejec.
Nâŋâc ine docke pârâc ehuc sisipiricko rara irec biŋe mâcne, nâŋâc manasiŋkehuc maŋ qâqâtâc ŋeŋezic irec biŋe.
Raʒihapie ʒâhec Israe ŋicguru qâqâhâc biaŋke-fâreniŋmu. Ʒiŋuc hâcne qâreŋkekicne fokac: “Zioŋ haeonec Bâbâpiaŋ moc fuarâ Jakoborao jawa âsu gârec ofaŋneme raocmu.
Judaŋic jaŋe Wofuŋ Jesu â porofete iŋuc jaha qâhâmoc-jopambiŋ, erâ wâc nâŋe nâpo jâpec enârembiŋ. Jaŋe Anutu âgo mi ecneeŋgopieŋ â ŋicne ŋicne kisuec-jopaeŋgopieŋ.
Nâŋâc dâŋ fâri qizecnezi maŋnâŋec âke tamaehame sâqocne mana jaŋgeŋkehuc bapene mozi irec taha bame tâmireocmu? Aricne, iŋuc mi fokac,
E Kristo Jesuhec bâɋârec-nâporâ ehec mâmâc sambâŋte jujuo ŋec-nâpowec hâcne.
Irec ŋoŋe burec beherâ dâŋ jâmbomac sasawa nazaŋ gazaŋ enʒepieŋ, nâŋâc qoqomâ efâreŋgopeneŋte.
ŋic izi hâcne bawahac-nâpozo mupie nâŋe Biŋebiaŋzi ŋoŋerao bâbâsifucnehec ezacte moc mi docke-jarembeŋ.
Irec marac furuo dâŋ muocmu e fuŋne mana-hâmorâ ŋic ŋokac bâtikie-jareocte Wofuŋ numucneme bafickezejec.
Saulo e Wofuŋte kikefuŋ râsi ejarehuc ima bacjopaocte maŋʒoc-ticne gâmâc gâfâŋ wefuhuc domawec. Ehuc ra taha bapa sâkorao mume
Ʒi gorao fâzo ehuc ʒira mâreŋko dâŋ iŋuc gazape nore bubiaŋzi jaŋerao fotâcnerâ ɋârâŋkeme bajunʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe Kristore erâ ʒâic fâro manahuc sâc bubiaŋ bâfuanʒepieŋ, eme juku eri tatamac-ticne fua tâcneme iŋuc jaha bubiaŋ sâko manahuc ʒeri bari eniŋmu.
Wahame findendeŋnehuc hone qârâwiŋ ejarehuc honepo: Maŋnao qowi kosa, micmâŋ â micnehec, erâ homa wiac â sawa wipe fowec.
Ʒi ine wiac iŋucne sasawa hetaranʒepieŋ. Ehuc aaric, kimbeŋ, râŋgeŋ bârâŋgeŋ, dâŋ gâgâpâcne â simbiŋne i qikiŋnenʒepieŋ.
Paulo e selific bapa, â Aqila e gie ijaha bawecte ficticnao ŋeŋe juju ehuc bafickeme mâmâc bapic.
Sâqocnezi sahac-ŋeŋic sisirowenao ŋicbomboŋ eŋarezo mume mi manacnenʒepieŋ, â sahac-ŋeŋiczi sasecte suruc-ŋopame i wâc mi manacnenʒepieŋ.
Ŋic iŋucne jaŋe Wofuŋ Jesu Kristore micte uŋdâŋ ʒiŋuc jazapene mana-jâmbâŋkenʒepieŋ: Ŋezu ŋewâneŋ erâ gie-jeŋic bapie fârine fuame jaŋacneonec nânʒepieŋ.
“Eme mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec jaŋe ɋajeŋic Josefe iiŋguuŋ ecneku moneŋte qikiŋnepie Aigita mâreŋko barambiŋ. Ira ra juhame Anutuzi ehec juhuc
Ehuc jaŋeraonec moc, ʒâŋene Agabo, e Mârozi ecneme mâreŋ sâc roroc sâko fuaocte irec findaŋdâŋ muwec. Eme roroc i ŋicwofuŋ sâko Klaudio juhame fuawec.
Paulo e dâŋ iŋuc mutararâ dieŋzi herâ jaŋehec numuwec.
Kristo Jesure biŋe jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe juju raŋɋa-jeŋic sasec â sâqocnere andachec i maripoŋko qapie omaewec.
Ŋoŋerao eesâic fuŋne fuŋne fuame manapie bubiaŋnehec sasawa ezejec.
Nâŋâc dapâcko juhuc Anuturao qohotaŋgopeneŋ mupene burec eocmu â dâŋ fâri qizecne mi bajunaŋmu.
Sambâŋ aŋkeme wiac moc racsâko tinac tofane 4 ira basanaŋkehuc mâreŋko âkesuepie wahawec.
Nâŋâc ʒi Pataŋic â Medeŋic â Elamŋic, erâ Mesopotamia mâreŋkonec â Judaia mâreŋkonec â Kapadokia mâreŋkonec â Ponto mâreŋkonec â Asia mâreŋkonec

Wofuŋzi iŋuc hâcne eŋareme ju ju-ŋeŋiczi fuŋne-ticne mutaniŋkeme honec-ŋopame biaŋkezejec. Á mitio gie fuŋne fuŋne fokac, i bahuc irec fârine bâfuanʒepieŋ, ehuc Anuture fuŋne mana ɋârâŋke rahuc junʒepieŋ.
Motec-nane Timoteo, qanaŋ gore findaŋdâŋ fuawec irec sâcko dâŋ mutâcne-garekicne i hâcne râe-garekopac. Go i bajuhuc momori gie biaŋ sanaŋkerâ bazemec.
Eme no sambâŋko ŋic guru sâko jaŋere micʒonʒoŋ tinac manapo, jaŋe musereckerâ ʒiŋuc mumbiŋ: “Haleluja, bâbâpiaŋ â eri tatamac â tâpiri quŋqasaŋ, i Anutu-nâŋec erao fokac.
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha sindaŋ hârindaŋ ehuc hâmocne jujumbieŋ.
Wofuŋte râqâckonec nâhuc demoŋ jaŋere râqâckonec mâmâc nânâ i sâcne mi eniŋmu. Á Wofuŋte teboonec nâhuc demoŋ jaŋere teboonec mâmâc nânâ i wâc sâcne mi eniŋmu.
Boe sau, sasec mamakâc, buchâro, irec saŋuc wâc mitiŋic ŋoŋere ŋondeŋko mi fuazejec.

Maŋɋaɋachec jueŋgopieŋzi wiac sasaware manapie ɋaɋacne eekac. Á sâqocnezi maŋjeŋic bâbiekume mamanasiŋ tâmiric embiŋ jueŋgopieŋ, jaŋe ine mamana â maŋjeŋic mâmâc wâwânâŋhec efârewecte wiac mocte manapie ɋaɋacne mi eekac.

Iŋuc jazame manarâ quŋkecnehuc ʒiŋuc mumbiŋ: “Jerusalem haeo ʒâŋe i hâcne riwaseckepie ima bacjopaku ʒira iŋuc jaha repac-joparâ taha bapa micne jaŋerao bacjopa raocte warewec, izi weniŋuc erâ hec hetikic ekac?”
Ʒi ine Jesuzi ʒâʒâfic fekicnere jâcne juekacte taha gie fekicne jaha baekac. Ʒâʒâfic fekicne ine biŋedâŋ fekicnezi hobeteŋ ecneha bâfuakicne.
Kristozi juju-nane ekac â hâmoczi wiac fekicne bâfua-nareocmu.
Erâ ʒiŋuc manapaŋkekopac, gie biaŋ ŋoŋerao fuŋkeweczi baku bataraha Jesu Kristo fifisi dameŋ-ticne maickezokac.

Erâ ʒiŋuc wâc manaŋgopeneŋ: Anutu Ŋokâ-ticne e waharâ maŋ mamanasu bâfua-nârewecte jâmbomac rune mana maŋ ecneeŋgopeneŋ. Eme jâmbomac rune, Ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo, eki maŋnâpokac. Eki hâcne Anutu fârine â juju sanaŋ rune.
Ŋicne Ŋicne jaŋehec wamao juju i eene eme ŋoŋe hâcne irec hatane âtenʒepieŋ.
Erâ mume sasanaŋzi wiac biŋe qanârewecte biŋedâŋ i kiki papaŋ jaha bajuhuc muhaŋnenʒepeneŋ.
No merâfâc-nane wama ŋarekopac, ŋic wama mâcne, no nahacne wama jâmbâŋ ŋarekopac. Irec maŋŋeŋic mi fâfârerâ gâckezejec.
Nâŋe irec hâcne mana afeckehuc jueŋgopeneŋ. Ehuc ʒiŋuc manaeŋgopeneŋ: Mâreŋ sahaczi haefuŋ-nâŋec eha jueŋgopeneŋ, i Wofuŋ basahuc mâreŋ jabao jueŋgopeneŋ.
Moc e dâŋnane manarâ beheme okacne mi râcnepemu, no ŋic okacne jarepemurâ mâcne, bâpiaŋ-jopapemurâ wahapo.
Kaiŋte hata mi âtenʒepeneŋ, e sâqocne runere motec erâ ɋaticne qâhâmowec. Erâ wemocte qâhâmowec? Ine kecʒiŋucte: E Jahacne juju bapa sâqocne â ɋaticnere juju bapa biaŋne irec.
Erâ wâc nuc â tiki mâmâc sirowe-fârembiŋ.

Eme irec hâcne ŋic mocjaha, fua sawecte tâpiri-ticne arictac ehame, eraonec ɋâric fua sawec embiŋ jaŋe sambâŋko bâpiŋ ŋerakac irec sâc, erâ hâwecmecko moŋgeŋ forakac, ŋiczi mi wowosene, irec sâc fuambiŋ.
Juju sanaŋte Wofuŋ Sâko, mi hâhâmone â mi hohonene, Anutu sâko mocjaha hâcne, ere ʒâŋe biŋe â eri tatamac foraʒihuc juzejec sanaŋ. Jâmbomac.
Eki wiwic jaha wirahuc ʒiŋuc muwec: “Ŋoŋe Anutu araŋ bacnehuc sâsenʒepieŋ, okac dameŋ-ticne maickekac hâcne. Sambaŋ â mâreŋ, hâwec â opâ ʒâŋe bâfuawec e mu wâwâsic ecnenʒepieŋ.”
Dameŋ ira opâ ruac guru sâko embiŋte nânâ bârâwiŋne-jarehuc Grië opâ ruac jaŋere hozec bâtiric-jopapie Juda opâ ruac jaŋere manapie mi sâckeme dâŋ bâfuambiŋ.
Ŋoŋe iŋuc eniŋte hâcne muŋarekicne. Kristo e iŋuc jaha ŋoŋere erâ ʒâic manahuc bânie-ŋarewec, eme ŋoŋe kike hata-ticne honehuc ijaha âte ranʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋerao juhuc ʒiŋuc hâcne boc ŋazambeŋ: Ojoŋ juocmuzi nânâ mi nâzejec.
Anutu e ŋic ŋoŋere mo iŋucne ecnewecte Ŋokâ jâmbâŋ-ticne mocjaha e râe qikiŋ ecnewec. Eme e manasiŋkeniŋmu jaŋe moc mi sipirickehuc ju ju sanaŋ bâfuaniŋmu.
Iŋuc ehuc mupie demoŋzi dâŋ ʒiŋuc bâtikie-Jarewec: “Jesu manakopac â Paulo wâc manakopac, â ŋoŋe ine wenirec?”
Woke i Adramiteŋ haeonec, erâ Asia masunao hae biri ŋerawec ira raʒi-fâreocte mucnekicne. Woke ira hâcne ferâ Makedonia ŋic moc ʒâŋene Aristako, Tesalonike haeonec, ehec mâmâc rambeŋ.
Âgofâc-ŋeŋic kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopakicne jaŋere manasuhuc manapie mâmâc râec-ŋopakicne tinac ezejec. Erâ ŋoŋe sahachec jaha juŋgopieŋte qa imac ejarekicne jaŋere wâc manasunʒepieŋ.
Eme maŋzi me mezi wiac ezo murâ i Wofuŋ Jesu manasiŋkehuc enʒepieŋ, ehuc ere erâ Anutu Mamac daŋge âzâcnenʒepieŋ.
Miti ŋaza qazuc eeŋgopieŋ ŋic i jaŋe wiac fuŋne fuŋne boki bahuc jare gumec enʒepieŋ.
Jowa warerâ mâreŋ mi qikiŋnecneme rauckewec, aricne, moc mi râcne huŋgaŋke-jâmbâŋkewec. E â ɋâricfâc-ticne ʒâhec rauckeniŋte biŋe sawa qacnewec. I ɋâric tâmiric juha sifu iŋuc mucnewec.
Eme ŋicwofuŋ eki hâcne mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec doc bacjopahuc sipiric-jopawec. Ehuc mume ɋâricfâc-jeŋic behec-jopapie hâmocko rafârembiŋ.
Iŋuc mume Petoro â motec âgo-ticne jahe ʒâŋeruŋko rapic.
Iŋuc ehuc Anuture maio â ŋicmaio bahacmâc jupemurâ rucnane bahuc jaha juekopac.
hâwec siri ʒocnehec bazu bâfeŋ eekac iŋucne, jaŋacne sâqocne miminehec qâqâtâtiene, bâpiŋ qâsoriekicne iŋucne, duŋdapâc fofo sanaŋ i jaŋere biŋe hâcne bâfuakicne.
erâ wâc ŋiczi mi naza qazuc embiŋ, i Jesu Kristo e jahac mufua-narewec.
Juju raŋɋa jujumbeneŋ dameŋ ira sâqocnere sasec i sâcmutâc dâŋzi ʒocticne ficneme me sahac-nâŋecko gie-ticne bajujec. Iŋuc enâreme hâmo sipiricte fârine bâfuambeŋ.
No irec biŋe mumu â aposolo jupemurâ râecnukicne, erâ ŋic qâpuc dâŋ fâri qizecne â mamanasiŋte fuŋne jaza mutâc epemurâ qaqazu gie munarekicne. Dâŋ i burec mâcne, jâmbomac mukopac.
Moc e sâcmutâc dâŋticne reŋkeocmu e Anutuhec maŋmaŋ enicmu. Anutu maŋkeeŋgopeneŋ i Mâro nârewec eki mufua-nâreme manaeŋgopeneŋ.
Moc e jahacnere mi manasuhuc, âgo-ticnere manasuzejec.
Maŋŋeŋic bâturehuc wiac mocjahare henʒiriŋnehuc junʒepieŋ. Ŋaŋacnere boc mi manapie sâckezejec.
Râsidâŋ, kimbeŋ aaric, mu ojowa, susurec, erâ wiac gâgâpâcne gâcne i ŋondeŋ-ŋeŋicko mi fuazejec.
No Anutu dâŋbiri-ticnere sâcko kikefuŋte kiŋaŋ qaqa erâ ŋoŋerao micdâŋ-ticnere qaqazu gie batarapemurâ munarekicne.
Qizec-ticne â qizec susuc-ticne qaŋqaŋ jâmbâŋ, kota hâpokicne, faroqac iŋucne, â ʒâŋe jahecne ʒoc bâruŋkeekac iŋucne tinac.
Nâŋe wiac sasawa i ŋoŋere erâ kecʒiŋuc muhuc eeŋgopeneŋ: Mitizi haŋ barahame ŋic bocjahazi manahuc Anutu ʒeri mumuteŋ sâko ecnepie Izi ʒuhuckeme ʒuhuc forahuc fozejec.
Nore biuc â soc nâocmuzi no maŋnuocmu â noni e maŋkepemu.
Eme Matazi muwec: “Go Kristo Anuture Ŋokâzi mâreŋko wahaocte mukicne hâcne, i maŋnanezi mana ʒakiekopac.”
Eme aposolo jaŋe miti jaza qazuc epie mananiŋte henʒiriŋnehuc jumbiŋ, ehuc maŋzi roroc bâmbândeŋ erâ tiwâre â nunumure gâbâ tumaŋne jumbieŋ.
Go tiŋnere egareekac â hehesic ine râsi ecneekic. Irec Anutu, gore Anutu, eki ʒeri wokemaŋ rua-garewec, i âgofâcge jaŋere sâc jâuruhuc rua-garewec.”
Ehuc Johane hahac-ticne Jakobo mume ʒikazi qâhâmombiŋ.
Á dâŋ jawanere ojowane bapie mi bafic-jopazemec. Iŋuc eeŋgopieŋzi eraku miti beheniŋmu.
Moc e âgo-ticne qaisockeocmu e ʒika qaqaŋic mucnezo. Eme ŋoŋe ʒika qaqaŋic jaŋere manaeŋgopieŋ, jaŋere maŋko juju sanaŋ mi fuarâ foocmu.

Furic nânâ nâpie Jesuzi Simoŋ Petoro ʒiŋuc muhuc wiocnewec: “Simoŋ Johanere ŋokâ, âgofâcge jaŋe no maŋzi ʒâficnueŋgopieŋ, go jowarurâ sâc moc ʒâficnuekic me?” Eme Petorozi muwec, “Wofuŋ, no gore enarekac i manakomec.” Eme Jesuzi muwec: “Go lamafâc-mae soŋaŋ-jopazemec.
Moc e Mârozi ecneme miti maŋɋârâŋhec muocmu, moc e Mâro izia ecneme sâc mitire fuŋne hukicne muocmu,
Eme harierâ mocwâc rapie Josefezi hahacfâc-ticne fuŋne-ticne mutaniŋke-jareme Faraozi fufua-ticnere fuŋne wâc manawec.
“Moc e jujure aŋackekac â dameŋ biaŋ bâfuazo ecnekac, e nameŋ-ticne soŋaŋkeha sâqocne mi bazejec, â micbipic-ticne qataracneme burecdâŋ mi ezejec.
Opâ ruac guru jaŋe maŋ mocjaha ehuc ʒâʒâfic erâ jumbiŋ. Ehuc wiac fojarewec irec nore gore mi muhuc qâqâhâc mocjaha fojarewec.
Miti qizecne no narekicne ijaha ŋoŋe ŋarehuc kecʒiŋuc muhuc fuŋke-ŋarepo: Kristo e miti papiao mucnekicne irec sâcko erâ sâqocne-nâŋecte okacne hâmowec.
Iŋuc mupire qâpuc jaŋe manarâ bujeŋic biaŋkeme Wofuŋte dâŋ muac baafec ecnembiŋ. Eme juju sanaŋte biŋe eniŋte mana wosâc ejarekicne sâc jaŋe miti mana ʒakiembiŋ.
Dâŋ mufuakicne ʒi dopeckekaczi ʒiŋuc mukac: “Jâmbomac, no biac fâpemu.” Jâmbomac, Wofuŋ Jesu go warezemec.
No wiac mu qazuc â ŋaza ŋowatuc epe hone manac embiŋ, ijaha ehuc jupie Anutu wama runezi ŋoŋehec juocmu.
Râsi ecneniŋte mi mukopac, âgo-nâŋec muhuc mu bâtiŋ ecnehuc tutuc qacnenʒepieŋ.

Moczi moc ŋickonec mamana dâŋ, eeatuc dâŋ racne hâcne, qazu-ŋarehuc maŋŋeŋic bawisenʒipiŋte rucŋeŋic banʒepieŋ. Dâŋ iŋucne i mimiŋne jaŋere maŋko fuac dâŋ â mâreŋte wiac tâpirihec ira roweckehuc mueŋgopieŋ, Kristorao siŋkehuc mâcne.
ehuc Anutuzi Jesu Kristore erâ sambâŋte hefârecnuhuc mao eri râe-narewec, i bâfuapemurâ ʒâŋezi hone dendeŋnehuc gasackeekopac.
Eki hâcne nâŋâcnere due bahuc sindaŋkonec bâhoc-nâpowec, erâ fuŋfuŋfâc-ticne juhuc mitire fârine ʒoɋac erâ bâfuanaŋte ʒure bâpiaŋ enârewec.
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape mananiŋ: Moczi nore dâŋ mana maŋ ehuc, sorecnuwec e manasiŋkeocmu, ŋic e ʒiŋuczia juju sanaŋhec ekac. E okacnere biŋe mi ee hâmoc râpeckerâ jujuo raʒiwec jukac hâcne.
Aŋelo dâŋ nazawec eki gunusâc moc golzi bakicne badomawec, izi hae â motâc-ticne â sâcticne sâc bawec.
Ŋic i jaŋe hâcne sisipiric bâfuaniŋmu. Hobu-jeŋiczi wofuŋ ejareekac, â wiac mimineheczi bubiaŋ qajareekac, â mâreŋkonec wiac maŋ mamanasu-jeŋic rofâreekac.
Erâ opâ ruac ɋâricne moczi mitire micne bapa mi juzejec, iŋucnezi penaroŋ eme Sataŋzi doc bazacte.

Âgo biaŋfâc-nane, miti wirec-nâŋecte qâreŋke-ŋarepemurâ boc enareekac. Ehuc miti ŋic mamanasiŋte hata fosanaŋkeocte biricke-nârekicne i sifuckezacte sasanaŋ bâfuarâ juju gie baniŋte irec faŋdâŋ qâreŋke-ŋarepemurâ dameŋ-nane maickekac.
Jahe ŋic miti jazahuc, Jesu e hâmockonec ɋârewec, biŋedâŋ i muiŋnepire manapie sâqoreme
Eme Kana haeo Galilaia mâreŋko mârâc mume opâzi waiŋ ewec ira hâcne mocwâc risiewec. Eme Kafanaum haeo kia moc juwec, e ŋokâ-ticne hucsâko bame fowec.
Rokac bârokac tâmiric ɋicwânʒâŋhec erâ junʒepieŋ. Mârore buŋeŋic bâruŋkezejec, ehuc Wofuŋ kiŋaŋ qacnenʒepieŋ.

Ŋoŋe Jesu e hawari-ticne mi honembiŋzi sifu maŋŋeŋic qikiŋnecneeŋgopieŋ, erâ dameŋ ʒiŋucne wâc ʒâŋezi mi hohone sifu manasiŋkeeŋgopieŋ. Ehuc ʒeri bubiaŋ fuŋmoc, ŋicmiczi mi mumufuane, manacneeŋgopieŋ.
Eki nâŋâc maŋnâpoekac â nâŋâc e maŋkeeŋgopeneŋ, irec fuŋne ine Mâro-ticne nârewec ira taniŋkewec.
Eme râqâc moc maŋnao waiŋ opâ ʒaʒacne ŋewec, ira hâwec sâmbiŋ âke uruckerâ qeŋqeŋko âke kindeŋnerâ micnao iticnepie nâwec.
Anutu e dâpac runere tâpirionec batarac-nâporâ joroc Ŋokâ-ticnere uucmaŋko râec-nâpowec.
Âgofâc, ŋoŋerao fâfâuc bâfuahuc, miti qazu-ŋarekicne i bâsifuckezo eeŋgopieŋ ŋic i jaŋere ruc bahuc dic bajarenʒepieŋ.
Moc e kiŋaŋ qaqa giere tâpiri focnekaczi gie i bazejec, â moc e qaqazu gie baocmu e irec tâpiri focnekac sâc bazejec.
Eme dameŋ ira wiac mocte mi kâuc barâ wio-nareniŋmu. No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape: Ŋoŋe Mamac wiac mocte numucnepie ʒâŋe-nanere erâ ŋareocmu.

Haesac irec qânâ wâtuŋ i qânâ furi sâko fuŋne fuŋne findowakicne sasawa izi bakicne. Wâtuŋ namba 1 i qânâ ɋaɋacne kiruŋ tinac izi bakicne, wâtuŋ namba 2 i qânâ keŋkeŋne izi bakicne, wâtuŋ namba 3 i qânâ kedazi bakicne, wâtuŋ namba 4 i qânâ ârâŋ ɋâri izi bakicne,
Ŋic moc e wiac biaŋne eocte mana tarahuc sifu qikiŋneekac, e bahac bâfuakac muzo.
Eme eri ŋeŋe ŋeweckonec dâŋ ʒiŋuc fuawec: “Anuture kiŋaŋŋicfâc ŋoŋe e muteŋke-fâreniŋ, fekicne wahakicne araŋ bacneeŋgopieŋzi iŋuc hâcne eniŋ.”
Eme nâŋe irec hâcne sambâŋkonec fic i henâreme huocte aŋac-nâpome harac huacbuc ehuc jueŋgopeneŋ.
Irec moc e jahacne juju bapa hone ʒâŋitac ezejec. Eme ʒeridâŋ i e jahacnere erâ fuaocmu, ŋic mocte erâ mâcne.
Me ŋic moc e otâ-ticne ŋic roronere sâc bâfuaha sakareocte maname mi sâckeme ŋicko râezo murâ râezejec, i mi sâqoreocmu.
Jaŋe mitific sakare-ŋareniŋmu. Erâ wâc dameŋ moc maickeocmu, ira Anuture gie baŋgopeneŋ muhuc qâhâmoc-ŋopaniŋmu.
Eme sambâŋko mâsi qâreŋ sâko bipinehec moc honepo. Aŋelo 7 jaŋe wiac micne momori 7 badomambiŋ. Wiac i mimic fuahame Anuturaonec okacne fisi taraocte mukicne.
Eme Jesuzi dâŋ ʒiŋuc muwec: “Dâŋ hehesic mukopacko fuŋne mutec manape, â tiŋne mukopacko wemocte nukomec?”
Á babafic fâri-nane go ine ŋokac jahec hâcne hone maiŋ ejactezemec. Jahe mecne â Kelemento â âgo gâcne jaŋe Biŋebiaŋte giere dopecnumbiŋ. Ʒâŋe-jeŋic juju sanaŋte papia qizecko fofârekac.
Jaŋe mitiŋic â porofetefâcge jaŋere soc sipirickembiŋte soc jaha gumec-jopatec nâŋgopieŋ. Eme i sâcke-jarekac.”
Iŋuc misac¡ Sâqocne hâmocnembeŋzi wemocko irec maŋnao ʒuhuckerâ junaŋmu?
Qowi mârâc juwec, ʒi ine mi jukac, izi ŋicwofuŋ 7 jaŋere birio zuhuckehuc namba 8 eocmu, erâ sisipiricko huocmu.
Eme miti papiao dâŋ weniŋuc fokac? “Kiŋaŋ naru e ŋokâ-ticnehec jâpec-jofatec ranic, kiŋaŋ narure ŋokâzi ŋonâŋte ŋokâhec merâfâc mi rauckezejec.”
Moneŋ mafa sâko qâhâckezo muniŋmu, jaŋe eesâicte wiwiticko feniŋmu, erâ wiac omane fuŋne fuŋnere sasec bâfuarâ mana utuckehuc sipirickeniŋmu.
Erâ ʒuŋene 10 honemec, jaŋe mecne â qowi e mâmâc qaisockerâ ŋaqi wiac jâoc rofârerâ biucne nârâ siec sahacne ʒocko rikeniŋmu.
Moc e Anutu maŋjauŋ ecneocmu, e ine Anutuzi manariŋkewec.
Eme weniŋuc? Judaŋiczi ŋic gâcne jowarurâ sâc moc juŋgopeneŋ me? I aricne jâmbâŋ. Biac mumbeneŋ, Judaŋic â Grikŋic nânâc mâmâc sâqocnere kiŋaŋ qaeŋgopeneŋ.
Iŋuc murâ bulimakao qâqâtâc barâ bâzi rikecnehuc, mejeŋiczi bambiŋ wiac i mu ʒeri ecnembiŋ.

Eme ŋic tucne hâmo sipiric ehapie tucne akic-jopakicne jaŋe maŋjeŋic mi bârisiembiŋ â juju bapa-jeŋicte manapie mi sâqorewec. Aricne, jaŋe sifu demoŋ wiac bajumbiŋ. Á nemuɋâŋ golzi â siliwazi â aeŋzi â qânâzi â jâczi bakicne, hone manac eene tâmiric â rarac wawarecne tâmiric, i numu-jarehuc jumbiŋ.
Wofuŋ araŋ bacnehuc junaŋte mukicne i manahuc ŋic mu hemiriŋ ejareeŋgopeneŋ. Iŋuc ehapene Anutuzi maŋnâŋec honeekac, â ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha maŋŋeŋiczi fuŋne-nâŋec ŋazame manaeŋgopieŋ.
Nâŋâc mârâc jaha jaŋere sâc jaha jufârehuc maŋraŋɋa-nâŋecte aŋac bâjâpembeŋ. Ehuc sahac-nâŋecte â maŋ mamanasu-nâŋecte dâŋ reŋkehuc gâcne jaŋe iŋucne kimbeŋte biŋefâc embeŋ.
Petoro e iŋuc murâ dâŋ gâcne ʒuhuckerâ uŋ sawaŋ ejarehuc ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Ŋoŋe ŋic bâbâsifucne jaŋere guruonec wiserâ wefupie rocŋopazo.”
Ŋoŋe maŋraŋɋare wiacko qohotaniŋmuo sipirickeniŋmu. Á Mârore tâpirio sahacte dâŋ qaniŋmuo ine juju sâcne juraʒihuc juniŋmu.
Eme irec hâcne miti papiao kecʒiŋuc qâreŋkekicne: “E manasiŋkeocmuzi mi qurutuaocmu.”
Miti babaju-ŋeŋicte mâreŋ sâc manapie biaŋkekacte qanaŋ ŋoŋere erâ daŋge mupe Jesu Kristorao qarâ Anutu-nanerao fotâcnekac.
Âgofâc, nâŋe manaŋgopeneŋ, Anutuzi maŋjauŋ eŋarehuc rowosâec-ŋopawec.
Erâ maŋŋeŋiczi jauŋ babac ehuc junʒepieŋ. Maŋjauŋhec juhuc kiŋ bebehec sâcne ezo.
Italia mâreŋko ranaŋte dameŋ maickeme kiazi mume Roma momori jaŋere soŋaŋ moc ʒâŋene Julio, eki Paulo â kâpâcwâru ŋic gâcne rocjopame wokeo fembiŋ.
Jaŋe Anuture kiŋaŋŋic Mose â Lamare gae kecʒiŋuc muhuc heeŋgopieŋ: “O Wofuŋ Anutu bapafâre, go gie fekicne â bipinehec baekic. Ŋicne ŋicne jaŋere Wofuŋ Sâko, go hatage tiŋne â fâri fideteŋ.
Hetararâ naru motec ɋiene susure ejareekac iŋuc jaha ŋoŋe maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋicte susu biaŋ irec eŋarezejec. I nâhuc mitio soka pupuŋ enʒepieŋ.

Eme sambâŋkonec dâŋ moc ʒiŋuc wahame manapo: “Go dâŋ ʒi qâreŋkec: Dameŋ ʒi fuŋkerâ, Wofuŋtao qohotahuc hâmoniŋmu jaŋere bubiaŋ manazo. Mârozi mukac, jâmbomac, jaŋe neneŋ gie-jeŋic hetararâ ŋemanahuc biaŋ-jopaocmu. Erâ juju bapa-jeŋicte fârinezi rapie raocmu.”
Hozec bekâ busâqocko juhapie hone maiŋ ejarezo â mâreŋko sâqocne fokac izi maŋnâŋec hegâpârezacte pectâc juzo, izi Anutu â Mamac ere maio wâwânâŋ tâmiricko mitio juju ekac.
Moczi moc mu hemiriŋ eŋarehuc maŋ bâsifuc eŋarenʒipiŋte dâŋ mukopac.

Eme sambâŋko â mâreŋko â mâreŋ jujuwicnao â hâwecko jurambiŋ sasawa jaŋe kecʒiŋuc mupie manapo: “Eri ŋeŋeo ŋekac e â Lama mâmâc muac baafec â ʒâŋe biŋe â eri qaraweŋ â tâpiri focnekaczi focnerahuc juzejec sanaŋ.”
Eme aŋelo namba 2 eki qeŋ qawec. Qeŋ qame wiac moc tiki sâko iŋucne ʒocbâruŋnehec hâwecko rucnewec.
hae râpeo fisirâ qânâzi, hembiŋ. Ehuc soŋaŋ jaŋe ŋaqi-jeŋic ʒoricne hetararâ ŋicmotec moc ʒâŋene Saulo ere kikefuŋko guruckembiŋ.
Erâ moc ʒiŋuc: “Qâpuc ŋoŋe ʒeŋgoma Wofuŋ mucne bacnenʒepieŋ, â ŋicne ŋicne jaŋe e muac baafec ecnenʒepieŋ.”
Wiac sasawa eraonec wareekac â erao siŋkerâ foekac â erao rafâreekac. Mumuteŋzi mumuteŋ i erao ʒuhuckeme ʒuhuc foraʒihuc juzejec sanaŋ. Jâmbomac.
Hae fureme Jesuzi Johanerao rame taicko honerâ ŋic ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Honeniŋ, kecocni Anuture lama, eki mâreŋ sâc ŋic sâqocne-jeŋic fainao feme âsickekac.
Sasec ŋokac Rahaba e mamanasiŋhec juwecte ŋic mâreŋ hone têcnepic jahe âgo ejactewec. Eme qaqatara ŋic jopambiŋko e akickekicne.
Fiuc roro e lama qa sipiric erâ fiuc bawiseocte sawa fisiekac. No ine lama jaŋe juhâc qâhâmoniŋte nânâ bâfuape ɋaŋɋaŋ ɋâriaŋ fojareocte fisipo.
Nâŋâc ine sambâŋ hae irec fârine, eme irecnec hâcne bâbâpiaŋ-nâŋec Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo, e waharâ rocnâpoocte woŋec jueŋgopeneŋ.
Irec hâcne Anuture eri qâreŋ fuaocte Kristozi rocŋopawec iŋuc jaha ŋoŋe maŋzi roroc efârenʒepieŋ.

Eme nâŋe jaŋerao ʒuhucgupene jaŋere sâcko wiac ehuc tiwâ bâzi furine bajaretec rikerâ qizec-jeŋic bâtâcnenʒepieŋ. Go iŋuc etecne honecgurâ gore ʒiŋuc mananiŋmu: Dâŋticne wareme manambeŋ i fârimâc, e sâcmutâc dâŋ reŋkehuc juekac wâc.
Erâ mahec nâŋere micne bapa wâc ewec, erâ mahecte sawa mâcne, e ma tâmiric juhuc mamanasiŋte kike hata âtewec, hata ijaha mimiŋ qâjâpec âtehuc Abraham micne bapa-nâŋec mucnepene sâckeocmu.
Iŋuc numurâ miti ɋâsâi qapie Matia âke fuame aposolo 11 jaŋerao ʒuhuckewec.
“Bahac-jeŋic behekicne, â sâqocne-jeŋic bâtâmirekicne, jaŋere manape ʒerine ekac;
Jahe oliwa jâc â lambe iŋucne, jahe mâreŋte Wofuŋ ere maio domakopirec.
Ŋoŋe fuŋne-ŋeŋic mana tararâ ki busâqoc enʒepieŋ. Gâgâwi-ŋeŋiczi rirehame busâqoc fuazejec, â ʒeri-ŋeŋiczi rirehame ki mamakuc fuazejec.

Âgo-nane go ŋic jaŋe wiac sâqocne epie mi bâjâpec-jopazemec, wiac biaŋne epie ine bâjâpec-jopazemec. Moc e wiac biaŋne ehuc juocmu ere muzo, e Anuturaonec fuakicne. Moc e sâqocne ehuc juocmu, e Anutu mi ʒâŋitawec muzo.
E ma tâmiric juhuc Anutu manasiŋkeme kiŋticne behecnewec irec maqâreŋ ʒâhec râecnewec. Eme Abraham e iŋuc ehuc ine ma tâmiric jaŋe Anutu manasiŋkehuc kiŋfâsâc eeŋgopieŋ jaŋere micne ewec.
Moc e hâmome sâqocnere niŋgiŋ ŋetaracneocmu.
Iŋuc ehuc sahac-nâŋecko Jesu hâmoc-ticnere ma amecke jueŋgopeneŋ, i Jesu juju-ticnere ma iŋuc jaha sahac-nâŋecko fuaocte hâcne.
Ŋic gâcne jaŋe jaŋacnere sawa manasuhuc Jesu Kristo gie-ticnere mi mueŋgopieŋ.
Sara e iŋuc jaha mamanasiŋhecte tâpiri fuacneme ŋokac qizec juipiehuc kiwechec ewec. Ine ɋâricte biŋe qacnewec ere, mume fufuazi mukac, muhuc iŋuc ewec.
Mamac-nanezi norao râec-jopaekac ŋic i jaŋe sipirickenʒipiŋte hone qâzuc ejareku dameŋ sâkoo furu jaha wiwic-jopape faharenʒoŋgopieŋ; sorecnuwec ere micdâŋ iŋuc hâcne fokac.
Á nâŋâc ine Anutu Mamac-nâŋec mocjaha junârekac, eraonec hâcne wiac sasawa fua-fârewec â nâŋâc erea juŋgopeneŋ. Erâ Wofuŋ mocjaha, Jesu Kristo, ere meo wiac sasawa â nâŋâc jufâreŋgopeneŋ.

Eme ʒi Timoteo e risie warerâ mamanasiŋ â maŋjauŋ-ŋeŋicte biŋe biaŋ nâzâwec; Erâ nâŋere boc manasueŋgopieŋ, â nâŋe ŋoŋe honec-ŋopazo muhapene ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha nâŋe honec-nâpozo mueŋgopieŋ, dâŋ i nâzâ-fârewec.
Eme juku soŋaŋ sâkozi fisirâ hendiŋ huririnehec fofo sanaŋ i heŋareme hume rojuniŋmu.
Mamanac-nâŋec iŋuc fokacte gie maŋafec jaha baeŋgopeneŋ,
Ŋic izi hâcne maŋ tâmiric, qowi qa nâc ejareeŋgopeneŋ jaŋe iŋucne. Jaŋe wiac fuŋne kâuc baeŋgopieŋ i kosa musuaeŋgopieŋ; irec qowi sisipiric sipirickeniŋmu,
E dâŋ i hapetac jaŋere manasuhuc mi muwec, e moneŋ kânoŋ wirec-jeŋic bajuhuc moneŋ hume ro soŋsoŋ ejujec, irec muwec.
Anutu maŋjauŋ-ticne nâŋâcnao fuawec i hone ʒâŋitac erâ mana ʒakiembeŋ. Anutu e maŋjauŋte fuŋqizecne, eme moc e maŋjauŋhec juocmu e Anutuzi maŋkeocmu, â eki wâc Anutu maŋkeocmu.
Stefano qarâ opâ ruac gâcne jopa bâtâtiec ejarepie haha rârâwiŋ qarâ tucnezi Foinike â Kipiro nucko â Antiokia haeo rambiŋ. Ra juhuc miti i Judaŋic sawa jazambiŋ.
Miti babajuzi jâmbomac sahacte dope bâbâfua-nârene, mocjaha mukâroŋ tâmiric bajunʒepeneŋ.

Erâ Anuture tiriŋicfâc râsi ejarehuc jopa sipiric ejareocte mana fâsâecnekicne, erâ wâc mâreŋne mâreŋne ŋic sahac hawari-jeŋic â dâŋmarac-jeŋic fuŋne fuŋne jaŋe ŋicbomboŋ ejare-fâreocte tâpiri râcnekicne.
Á bahac bâfuarâ ʒika kihuc rârâŋgeŋ tâmiric jupie mozi maname biaŋkeocmu? Tiŋne juhuc ʒika kirâ rârâŋgeŋ tâmiric jupie ine Anutuzi maname biaŋkeocmu.
Irec hâcne Kristo e ʒâʒâfic ɋâricnere jâcne ewec, erâ ʒâʒâfic raŋɋanao juhuc kiŋ bâfuakicne i taraocte hâmowec, eme irec biŋefâc-ticne jaŋe juju sanaŋte merâfâc roniŋte mujarekicne i sâcne roniŋmu.
Eme weniŋuc muzo? Sâqocnere gie bahuc jaha jupene aki anonoczi fua ɋârâŋkehuc sirickezejec, iŋuc muzo me?
Dâŋ miminehec, mutucdâŋ, dâŋ simbiŋne, i epie sâqoreocmu. Daŋge mumuteŋ ine epie sâckeocmu.

Eme ʒâŋe firâ honehape mi becâsic moc sahacne gowaekicne warezejec i¡ Ŋic fainao ŋewec ʒâŋene hâmoc. Erâ hârâckoneczi bâjâpembiŋ. Eme mâreŋko rukec jahec â moc mâc fohame moc ira mume ʒikazi â roroczi â huc mimicnezi â kâte qowi momorizi ŋic sipiric-jopaniŋte tâpiri râe-jarekicne.

Irec hâcne wiac biŋe qanarekicne i mamanasiŋte erâ fuaocmu. Wemocte? I aki anonoczi feŋeŋ râecneme Abrahamte ɋâricfâc sasawa nâŋâcnao sanaŋkeocte. Sâcmutâc dâŋko roweckembiŋ jaŋe sawa mâcne, Abrahamzi mamanasiŋ hata âtewec ijaha âteeŋgopeneŋ nâŋâcnao mâmâc. Eki hâcne Anuture maio apa wirec-nâŋec ekac.
Eme Romaŋic jaŋe fuŋne-nane mu rituc ehuc nuniŋte kiŋnane basarâ firuecnuniŋte mumbiŋ.
Irec ŋicmaŋte me ŋic eebapare mi muzo, Anutu buuruc-ticnere sawa muzo.
Erâ sasec boe sau wâc mi enʒepeneŋ. Jaŋeraonec gâcnezi sasec boe sau embiŋ, ehuc ʒoaŋ gie bapa ijaha ŋic 23 tauseŋ hâmombiŋ.
Ehame me sahac-naneo sâcmutâc moc fokac izi maŋ mamanasu-nanere dâŋhec rârâsi eekopirec, ehuc niŋgiŋnume sâqocnere sâcmutâc dâŋ me sahac-naneo fic hae ewec ere kâpâcwâru ŋic eekopac

Irec nâŋâc ʒi Kristore dâŋ maine, fufuŋkeo mumune, i râepene foha dâŋ hukicne, wiac efehuc mumune, i moc ʒuhuckenaŋ. Wemocte miti hobeteŋne i hâsine râehuc maŋ bâbârisie â juju raŋɋa bebehe â Anutu mamanasiŋ,
Irec ere manapie wawahane mi ezejec. Erâ aimuŋ ecnerâ bârisiepie norao mocwâc warezejec; no â opâ ruac gâcne woŋec-ticne juŋgopeneŋ.
Âgofâc-nane, ŋic moczi “mamanasiŋhec jukopac” muocmu, ehuc eehâmo gie mi baocmu, e mamanasiŋ-ticnezi moc bafickeocmu me? Mamanasiŋzi wemocko sisipirickonec bataraocmu.
Eme Jerusalem hae rune jaŋe ʒiŋuc mumbiŋ: “Ŋic qazo mueŋgopieŋ ine hâcne ʒi.
Iŋuc murâ ficnec-joparâ muwec: “Tiri Mâro ro maŋ eniŋ,
Jaŋe Anuturaonec kiŋfâsâc eere hata fokac i kâuc baeŋgopieŋte jaŋac tiŋke biaŋ eniŋte giene baeŋgopieŋ. Irec Anutu tiŋne rune mi dapecnembiŋ.

Moc e Anutu Ŋokâ-ticne manasiŋkeocmu, e Anuture dâŋ fârine maŋkeocmu. Moc e Anuture dâŋ mi mana ʒakieocmu, i Anutu burecŋic mucnekac eocmu. Ŋic iŋucnezi Anutu e Ŋokâ-ticnere dâŋ dopeckewec i maname fâri tâmiric ekac hâcne.
“No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ mupe mananiŋ: No manasiŋnuocmuzi gie baekopac ijaha baocmu. Erâ i sawa mâcne, sâcnane jâuruhuc baocmu. No Mamactao fepemure iŋuc hâcne fuaocmu.
Kiŋaŋ qaqa jazatec bomboŋfâc-jeŋic jaŋere dâŋ reŋke-fârehuc kiŋaŋ biaŋne qajarenʒepieŋ, ehuc micjeŋicko mi ronʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi Anuture aki anonoc ririzacte soŋaŋ babac enʒepieŋ. Erâ ŋondeŋ-ŋeŋicko ʒâŋ opac moczi gitec herâ ʒacŋopame sâqorenʒipiŋte rucŋeŋic banʒepieŋ.
Ŋic ŋokac kikefuŋko mi raʒimbiŋ jaŋe wâc manacnepie sâckeekac ŋic iŋucnezi mitire micne juzejec, jaŋe musoriŋkepie Sataŋzi maŋne bâsifuckeme ere bitiŋko kizacte.
Kristo e ŋicne ŋicne mitire kâdoc nârewec sâc bajueŋgopeneŋ.
Eme aŋelo namba 2 eki râqâc-ticnaonec wiac hâwecko hoŋkeme huwec. Hume hâweczi soc tânipu tinac ewec. Eme irec hâwecko qowi hâmo-fârembiŋ.
Ŋoŋe ŋicbomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic maizi qambaraŋ ejarepie honec-ŋopapie biaŋkeocte mâcne, nâŋe Kristore kiŋaŋ qaqa, iŋuc muhuc Anutuzi hata muwec i maŋafec jaha âtenʒepieŋ.

Erâ dâŋ i urucko â acmeruŋ ehuc, maŋŋeŋiczi mumu hehec mi eŋareha munʒepieŋ. Iŋuc epie, Kristohec juhuc wiac ebac eeŋgopieŋ irec qoric-ŋopaeŋgopieŋ, ŋic i jaŋe burec-jeŋicte fuŋne taniŋkeme mimienʒepieŋ.
Ŋokâ hone dendeŋnehuc manasiŋkeniŋmu sâc juju sanaŋ rauckeniŋmu; Mamac-nanere micdâŋ iŋuc hâcne fokac. Eme noni dameŋ sâkoo bâɋârec-jopazokopac.”
Eme mi qatara-jarehuc Anutu âkehockewecte Wofuŋte aŋelozi ɋeŋnea qawec. Eme umbeŋzi nanʒaŋneme hâmowec.
Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere Mamac â Anutu muteŋkenʒepeneŋ. E buuruc Mamac â bâbâmiriŋ rune juekac.
Ŋic tucnezi ine miti hata i qâsorierâ dâŋ jawane fârimâc bâfuambiŋ bajuŋgopieŋ.
No Biŋebiaŋte manape mimi gaŋgaŋnehec mi eekac, i Anuture tâpirihec, irec mana sakac eniŋmu sâc bâpiaŋ-jopaocmu, Judaŋic hâcne, erâ Grikŋic mâmâc.
Wâtuŋ huwec domakac, Jesu Kristo hâcne, e unucke behec erâ moc râepene huhune mi fokac.
Ŋoŋe ine ŋic sasawa sahac-ŋeŋic jauŋ baeŋgopieŋ sâc ijaha ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic jauŋ bacjopanʒepieŋ. Á ŋokac ine ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic araŋ bajarenʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha ma tâmiric juhuc sâqocne kosa barâ hâmocne juhapie Anutu e kiŋŋeŋic behehuc Kristohec bâɋârec-ŋopawec.
Micne bapa jaŋe Mâroraonec dâŋ mufuahuc mejeŋic qizecgao râehuc jambuŋgumbiŋ, jambuŋ irec fârine sifucke-garezacte bâiŋ basawec ezemec.
Eme no sambâŋ ɋâricne â mâreŋ ɋâricne honec-jofapo. Sambâŋ raŋɋane â mâreŋ raŋɋane jahe ine sirowepic. Erâ hâwec iŋuc jaha arictac ewec.
Bubiaŋ faio jurâ jurahuc junʒepieŋ.
Eme dameŋ ira ŋic jaŋe hâmoniŋte biŋe muniŋmu erâ mi hâmoniŋmu, hâmoc hefâre-bipiepie sifu mi maic-jopaocmu.
Nâŋâc Jesu hâmorâ faharewec dâŋ i maŋkerâ ʒiŋuc mananʒepeneŋ: Anutu e Jesu ecneme hâmokicne jaŋe e jahacnehec amec-jopa fisiocmu.
Eme ŋic moczi Jesu e Anuture Ŋokâ jâmbâŋ dâŋ i mutaniŋkeocmu, e Anutu maŋkeocmu â Anutuzi wâc e maŋkeocmu.
Qâpuc juju râpeckerâ maŋraŋɋa-ŋeŋic burec ehuc sasecko sipirickeekac, i heunuckenʒepieŋ.
Motâc no hâcne. Moc e fotâcnurâ raʒiocmu, e mi sipirickeocmu. E raʒic wefuc ehuc nânâ mâriri bâfuaocmu.

Tucne jaŋe qânâzi hehâmoc-jopakicne, tucne jopa qâʒâic ejarekicne, tucne jaŋe segezi bâtâc-jopambiŋ, tucne jaŋe ʒikazi upe-jeŋic qâtâcnembiŋ. Jaŋe lama â noniŋ sahacne rufarâ rorocko juhuc bebekâne erâ ʒâŋ goma faio jujumbieŋ.
Anutu e tiŋne juekac, ŋoŋe iŋuc manaeŋgopieŋko ine ŋic moc tiŋnea jume honerâ munʒepieŋ, Anuturaonec fuawec.
Wofuŋ e irec hâcne kecʒiŋuc munârewec: ‘Noni go ŋic qâpuc jaŋere ʒoctamac râecgupore bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋic juraku mâreŋ qaŋeŋnao jutarazemec.”

Ehuc bahac, mimi fuazacte soŋsoŋko eene, i râpecke-fârembeŋ Me sioc faio juhuc Anuture dâŋ bâbâsifucke i wâc mi eeŋgopeneŋ, aricne Nâŋe Anuture maio miti mutaniŋkehuc ŋic jaŋere maŋ bâmiriŋkepene fuŋne-nâŋec manaeŋgopieŋ.
Eme Anutu mefârenao risie feme Tiri Mâro biŋe qanâre-kicne e hâcne Mamaczi qikiŋnecneme soreme wahame fuŋne-ticne hone manac eŋgopieŋ ʒine hâcne.
maŋɋâri-ŋeŋic hepie hume rojuŋgopieŋ. Maŋ i hâcne bâbâfuazi bâpiaŋkeme mamanahec erâ e jahacne hawari iŋucne fuahuc jukac.
Eme Jesuzi biŋe manarâ ʒiŋuc muwec: “Huc irec fârine hâmoc fuaocte mâcne, Anuture mumuteŋ fuaocte mukicne. Anutu ŋokâ-ticne ere sambâŋ qâreŋ fua taniŋkeocte hâcne.”

Biŋebiaŋko hâcne Anuture tiŋne fua taniŋkeekac, i hâcne eki mamanasiŋhec jaŋe tahac-jopaekac, ehame mamanasiŋko utuckeniŋmu. Dâŋqâreŋ ʒiŋuc hâcne fokac: “Biaŋkekicnezi mamanasiŋte erâ juju hotâckeocmu.”
Eme momori jaŋe Jesu rorâ maripoŋ râcnepie hâpome mâreŋ moc ʒâŋene Utusiec, Judadâŋko Goligata, ira barambiŋ.
Mitire tâpire fuŋne fuŋne i aki anonoc nâre tahac ekicne sâc fonâre rakac. Eme irec sâcko gie banʒepeneŋ. Irec moc e Anuture micdâŋ mumufuare tâpiri focnekacko mamanasiŋ-ticnere sâcko muzejec.
Moc e laioŋ hawari iŋucne, moc e bulimakao ŋicne hawari iŋucne, moc e ʒâŋe maine ŋic hawari iŋucne, moc ine tucwipe fahareekac hawari iŋucne.
Ŋoŋe juju bapa-ŋeŋicte ruc bahuc junʒepieŋ. Erâ mutuc matacne mâcne, maŋ mamanasuhec junʒepieŋ.
Judaŋic â Grikŋic bârâwiŋ mi eŋgopeneŋ, e mocjahazi Wofuŋ junâre-fâreekac, erâ wiac fuŋne fuŋne hezu henâreekac.
Ŋiczi mamanasiŋhec erâ kiŋfâsâc bâfuanaŋte Kristozi sâcmutâc dâŋte hata hebâzicke-nârewec.
Wiac irec me irec mana mezac mi ee maŋŋeŋicte dâŋ fuŋne fuŋne i Anutu daŋge nunumu ecnehuc mutaniŋkecnenʒepieŋ.
Jaŋerao wiac fuawec i uŋsawaŋ-nâŋec ekac, jaŋe sâqocnere andac embiŋ iŋuc jaha enʒipeŋte.
Eme hârâcte tapa rome hosâc sâko wefuwec, gie ʒame hosâc feekac, irec sâc hosâc wefu ferâ ʒoaŋ â sawa sâocke-fârewec.
Moczi moc aka huckehuc wiac iŋucnao âgo-ticne mi eatuckezejec. Wofuŋ e wiac irec okacne bazu-fâreocmu; nâŋe dâŋ i mârâc jaha mujomirerâ ŋazambeŋ.
Irec ŋic moc Kristorao ʒuhuckeekac e fuŋmoc eekac. Ine wiac raŋɋane omaewec, ŋicbureŋ, wiac ɋâricne fuawec.
Mamac e Ŋokâ honebâckeekacte gie baekac sâc jâutu-fâreekac, erâ gie ʒi honeŋgopieŋ sawa mâcne, fekicne sâko jâutume ŋoŋe honerâ wareckeniŋmu.
Fiuc rorozi fiuc qikiŋnerâ meticnezi gie ʒoɋac bahuc nânâ mafa bâfuarâ waha qaqane boki bajarezejec.
Ŋoŋe nunumuzi bataracnupie Wofuŋzi no bâriesiecnu-ŋareme fâpemurâ mukopac, eme go irec ŋeŋe hewâneŋke-narezemec.

Mu qaqazuc dâŋ kosane hazec furu ŋazapie izi maŋŋeŋic mi hesifuckezejec; maŋŋeŋic aki anonoczi keteŋneme qiŋ herâ fome biaŋkeocmu, wiac nâkicnezi sâcne mi basanaŋkeocmu. Hata i âtembiŋzi fârine mi bâfuambiŋ.
Âgo bureŋ, wiac mocte esoc-ŋopaŋgopeneŋ: Ŋoŋerao ʒâic gie baeŋgopieŋ â Wofuŋte erâ micne baŋareeŋgopieŋ â mu bâtiŋ eŋareŋgopieŋ i jaŋe sâsec-jopanʒepieŋ.
I Judaŋic jaŋere hâwic-jofame iŋuc mupic. Jaŋe dâŋ ʒiŋuc mujomirembiŋ: “Moc e Jesure Kristo mume miti sakarecnenʒepeneŋ.”
Anutu maŋzi kiŋaŋ qacneeŋgopeneŋ â Kristo Jesurao qohotaeŋgopeneŋ â mamanasiŋ-nâŋec sahacko mi râeeŋgopeneŋ, nâŋâc hâcne ma fârine bajueŋgopeneŋ.
Sâcmutâc dâŋticne kecʒiŋuc fokac: ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo ere ʒâŋe manasiŋkehuc maŋzi jauŋ babac enʒepeneŋ. Iŋuc hâcne enaŋte munârewec.
Eme mâreŋmaŋkonec qowi mimicne moc wefume honepo, e lama iŋucne ʒuŋene jajahec sawa fowec. Dâŋticnezi ine oâdâŋ.
Âgofâc, dâŋ mana wosâc eere mamana-ŋeŋiczi ɋie jaŋere sâc mi ezejec, sâqocnere i ɋiene jaŋere sâc enʒepieŋ, â mana wosâcte ine maŋ mamana-ŋeŋiczi sokakicne jaŋere sâc ezejec.
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi ʒâic busâqocko juocmu, e Anutu numucnezejec, me moczi bubiaŋko juocmu, e mumuteŋ gae hezejec.
Eme ŋoŋe meŋeŋic betaŋkekicne â hoqaŋeŋ-ŋeŋic ŋetarakicne, irec âte tiŋnehuc sanaŋkenʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe Mamac mucnehuc wâsickeeŋgopieŋ e ra rowec ware rowec mi ehuc juju bapa-nâŋecte sâcko dâŋnâŋec mutaraocmu; irec ŋoŋe mâreŋko jaba juhuc sâc e araŋ bacnehuc junʒepieŋ.
Irec ŋoŋe sasanaŋ bâfuarâ Anuture micdâŋkoa juku wiac biŋe qaŋarekicne irec fârine ronʒepieŋ.
Wiac biŋe qanârekicne i manapaŋkerâ irec woŋec juju, â wiac mi hohonene maŋzi sakarerâ babaju, izi mamanasiŋ ekac.
No Wofuŋte maio ŋaza-jâmbâŋkepe: Ŋoŋe qâpuc, maŋ mamanasu-jeŋic wiac jawanere foekac, jaŋere sâc mi junʒepieŋ.
Ŋic moczi nânâ qowi soware me sabata hombaŋ me mosa hombaŋ i me i ŋeŋere me mi ŋeŋere mu supaic mi eŋarezejec.
Irec ʒi Anutu eri ŋeŋe-ticnere maŋfuŋko juhuc ŋafe furec ufuŋ-ticnao kiŋaŋ qacneeŋgopieŋ. Ehame eri ŋeŋeo ŋeekaczi qâtec-jopahuc sâoc-jopaocmu.
Eme Paulozi hurâ motec fofackerâ hâporâ ŋic ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Ŋoŋe ki ojowa mi eniŋ, e mâro-ticne fuakac.”
No ʒâic gie sasawa i Anutu bâwosâefâc-ticne jaŋere erâ ŋetâcneekopac, jaŋe Kristo Jesure bâbâpiaŋzi ŋihe umbiŋ ejareha eri tatamac fofone mâmâc rauckeniŋte iŋuc eekopac hâcne
Ŋoŋe mitio ââgo ehuc meo babac efârenʒepieŋ. Kristohec jueŋgopieŋ ŋoŋerao wama fofârezejec.
Ŋoŋe Kristo araŋ bacnehuc micrereŋ eec efârenʒepieŋ.
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane, uŋdâŋ qanaŋ ŋazakicnere ŋic kosa jujune jaŋere mumusifuczi maŋŋeŋic bâŋgoroŋkeme dockenʒipiŋte sawaŋ-ŋeŋic qahuc junʒepieŋ.
Ŋokac ŋoŋe ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere rereŋfâc junʒepieŋ, Wofuŋte biŋe ekicnezi iŋuc epie sâckeocmu.
Moczi bahac bâfuame âgo guru jaŋere maio mu bâtiŋ ecnetec gâcne jaŋe manahuc hâwic-jopazejec wâc.
Irec nâŋâc dâŋ mumutarac mi enʒepeneŋ. Kecʒiŋuc ine ezo: Ŋoŋe âgo gâcne maŋ bâsifuc ejarehuc mamana sâqoc bâfua-jarenʒipiŋte manabâcko junʒepieŋ.
Tiŋne Juniŋmu sasawa, Judaŋic hâcne â Grikŋic mâmâc, jaŋe eri tatamac â wama fua-jareocmu.
ʒocbâruŋ fâro-ticne hemâteŋkembiŋ, ʒika faio feipiehuc ɋâricne jumbiŋ, dockekicnezi mocwâc sanaŋkembiŋ, ʒikao momori wânʒâŋ embiŋ, mâreŋ gâcnaonec râsi jopa jâpec embiŋ.
Ʒi moczi moc neneŋ gie mocwâc mi narezejec. No Wofuŋ Jesure râfu qâreŋ sahac-naneo fome bajuekopac.
Jorocfâc-nane, ŋoŋe ine tiri mamanasiŋ fârine izi ŋesiŋ ŋeŋarehame sanaŋkerâ junʒepieŋ. Ehuc Tiri Mârorao roweckerâ numuhuc junʒepieŋ.
Erâ juju bapa-ŋeŋiczi miti tâmiric jaŋere sâc mi ezejec. Ŋoŋe maŋ mamanasu-ŋeŋic bâtikiepie hawarine moc eme Anutu micdâŋ-ticnere sâcko gie biaŋne â hohone ʒiziwene â tirine irec wosâenʒepieŋ.
No aposolo waha qaqane jâmbâŋ, no Anuture kikefuŋ guru jopa sipiric ejarepore aposolo ʒâŋe munarepie mi sâckeekac.
Maŋŋeŋic mâreŋko me mâreŋte wiacko mi râepie fozejec. Moc e maŋticne mâreŋko râeme foocmu, e wemocko Mamac maŋjauŋ ecneocmu.
Irec ŋic go wemocko fuŋnege murârâŋnecmu? Ŋic gâcnezi bahac bâfuapie mana sâqore-jarehuc gahacne fuŋne bataniŋkeekic hâcne. Mana sâqore-jareekomec, go ijaha hâcne eekomec i¡

Eme Wofuŋ e gie tahacke-narewec, i Jakobo, Kefa â Johane jaŋe Jesure kikefuŋ guru jaŋere jâcne jumbiŋzi mana tararâ no â Banaba âgo bacnâfohuc menâhecko bambiŋ, erâ nâhe qâpuc jaŋerao gie bahapere jaŋe jaŋac ŋic mahec jaŋerao baniŋte mumbiŋ.
Eme momori jaŋe Jesu maripoŋko qarâ ŋaqi-ticne faine bâtâcnepie jahec â jahec eme ru sâc embiŋ. Á ŋaqi-ticne maŋne hâfâ iŋucne oorâŋ fukicnere
Go iŋuc muekiczi ŋic gâcne miti qazu-jarehuc gahacne maŋ mi qazucneekic. Go ŋic fiuc mi ronʒepieŋ jazahuc gahac fiuc roekic.
Me ŋoŋe ʒiŋuc mi manaŋgopieŋ, sahac-ŋeŋic i Tiri Mârore ufuŋ, e ŋoŋere sahacmaŋko ŋeŋe juju eocte Anutuzi râe-ŋarewec. Ŋoŋe maŋ sahac rune aricne.
Kristore maŋjauŋzi maŋnâŋec fenʒoŋkehame juhuc ʒiŋuc mana sanaŋkeeŋgopeneŋ: Mocjahazi okac-nâŋec hâmowecte mâmâc sâko hâmombeŋ ekac.
Mitiŋic âgofâc-nane, sambâŋte mâmâc hefârec-ŋopakicne, ŋoŋe miti kiŋaŋ ŋic â taha bapa sâko Jesu, ʒâŋene murâ rereŋ eeŋgopeneŋ, erao findendeŋnenʒepieŋ.

No wiac fuŋne fuŋne qaŋeŋke-ŋarepo, ehuc gie ɋicwânʒâŋ bahuc gegec dodocne jaŋe bâmec bajarezo irec hatane wâc âtehuc ŋowatupo. Eme ŋoŋe ijaha âtehuc Wofuŋ Jesuzi dâŋ kecʒiŋuc muwec i manasunʒepieŋ: ‘Bâmec ro nâc eere bubiaŋzi mâcne, bâmec babajare irec bubiaŋzi fârine jâmbâŋ eekac.”
Ŋowe ŋonâŋ jujure manapie wiac fârine eha fofo wirecko gâc mi hezejec. Boe sau â ʒuhuc bâtâc eeŋgopieŋ jaŋe Anutuzi okacne jareocmu.
Ra fisirâ hawecmaŋko mi raʒihuc mâc okarierâ fime raʒime qoruc râpâ sawa fome honewec.
Eme bâbâric â ɋuŋ parandaŋ â micfânâŋ fuawec â homeŋ kâcɋene sâko jâmbâŋ bawec, sâc iŋucne moc ŋic fuarâ juwarembiŋko mi bawec.
Nâŋe ine Anutuzi Mâro-ticne ecneme dâŋ i mufua-nârewec. Mâro e wiac sasawa irec fuŋne mana gufuc efâreekac. Anutu e jahacne fuŋne bâutuckekicne i mâmâc manaekac.
Irec fâme bubiaŋ manacnehuc Wofuŋte erâ âgo ecnenʒepieŋ. Ŋoŋe ŋic iŋucne hâcne sâsec-jopanʒepieŋ.
Naru motec ŋoŋe neŋgoc mamacfâc-ŋeŋic dâŋ mupie sâc reŋkenʒepieŋ, iŋuc epie Wofuŋzi maname biaŋkeocmu.

Nâŋe nâŋâcnere piticne mana biaŋkeeŋgopeneŋ ine kecʒiŋucte: Maŋfâsâc â mitio maŋtaniŋ jupene maŋnâŋeczi wiac mocte tutuc mi qanâreekac. Nâŋe miti tâmiric jaŋere maio iŋuc hâcne juhuc miti mamana ŋoŋere maio wâc jujâmbâŋkeeŋgopeneŋ. I mâreŋko maŋɋârâŋ dâŋ fokac ira siŋkehuc mâcne, Anuture uruc jauŋko siŋkehuc eeŋgopeneŋ.
“Moc e micdâŋ-nane bajuhuc sâseocmu, eki maŋjauŋ enareocmu. Eme moc e no maŋjauŋ enareme Mamac-nanezi e iŋuc jaha maŋjauŋ ecneocmu, â no nahac wâc maŋjauŋ ecnehuc fuŋne-nane mutaniŋkecnepemu.”
Ŋic iŋucnezi maŋɋârâŋ hawari erâ “bâtâcko â sowa juhuc sahac bâpitiwazo” iŋuc mupie dâŋ izi fârine tinac eekac. Erâ wiac iŋucnezi fârine aricne, izi sasec aka sâcne mi hecneocmu.
Ŋic jaŋe ʒira kikefuŋte maio jauŋgere mu warec embiŋ. Ŋic fâpie go Anutu ʒâŋe biŋe-ticnere erâ hone jauŋ ejarerâ râec-jopatec rapie biaŋkeocmu.
Mugufuc dâŋ mutucne â racne igockezemec, irec fârine mu qaqatarac sawa fuaekac i manakic.
Nâŋâc ine ʒâŋe mai-nâŋec foŋ tâmiric fokacte Wofuŋte tatamaczi âke tamaec-nâpome bâtikiepene wefuekac, ehuc Wofuŋte hawari sâc erâ tatamacheczi tatamachec eeŋgopeneŋ. I Wofuŋ Mâro ere mâsi.

Kristo e ine Mâro juweczi jukac eki neŋgoc ŋecneha maŋ sahac-ticne Anutu taha bâzi furu biaŋ ecnewec, eme nâŋâc eebapa aputacnezi maŋnâŋec hegâpârembeŋ i Kristore soczi sâcne ʒure ɋaɋackeme Anutu jujune kiŋaŋ qacnenaŋmu.
Eme nâŋâc Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo manasiŋkehapene wiac tahacke-nârewec, ijaha jaŋe tahacke-jareme no iŋucnezi wemocko Anutu qataracnezapo.”
Anuture Tiri Mâro mi qaisockenʒepieŋ, e hâcne roroc-nâpo dameŋko maqâreŋ-ŋeŋic eocte tahac-ŋopakicne.
Go wiac gare tahac ekicne â gaza qazuc ekicne, i heɋârerâ aimuŋ bajuhuc maŋge bârisiezemec. Mi ɋâretecne ine râsi fifisi tinac fisi-garepemu, go ʒâfo-nane moc mi manahaŋtec biac fisipemu hâcne.
Naru motecfâc-nane, moczi moc maŋ bâsifuc eŋarezo mupie mi mananʒepieŋ. Moc e tiŋne hata âteme ere ŋic tiŋne muzo, e Jesuzi juju tiŋne juekac, iŋuc jaha juocmu.
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane, mâro kosa jaŋere dâŋ mi mana ʒakienʒepieŋ. Mâro moc e Anuturaonec me mâcne, i mana taraniŋte ruc banʒepieŋ. Porofete burecne wemo afecne fuambiŋ juraŋgopieŋ.
“Qomâfâc-nane, ŋazape mananiŋ. Sâqocne bâbâtâmire i ŋic eki hâcne bâfuawecte irec dâŋzi maic-ŋopakac.
Âgofâc-nane, moc mupe. Wofuŋte erâ bubiaŋhec junʒepieŋ. Dâŋ hâsine ijaha qâreŋke-ŋarezore manape mi quŋkekac, â ŋoŋe ine hume keteŋ eŋarezejec.
Moc e nânâre boc ecneme qanaŋ e jahacne ficko nâzejec, tutumaŋ bâbâsifucne epie okacne fua-ŋarezacte. Dâŋ gâcne i no nahac fârâ mutâcne-ŋarepemu.
Mupie Pilatozi ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Ŋaŋacne sâcmutâc dâŋ sâcko dâŋticne mutaracneniŋ me.” Eme Judaŋic jaŋe mumbiŋ, “Nâŋe ŋic hâmocko rârâec-jopare aka henârekicne.”
Ŋoŋe mitire kadahe fekicne bâfuaniŋte ʒoɋac enʒepieŋ. Eme noni irec hata biaŋne jâmbâŋ ʒi ŋowatupe honeniŋ.
Taha bapa sâko-nâŋec hâcne e furu, bahacmâc, ɋaɋacne, sâqocne bapa jaŋere sâcko mi juhuc qâtâcnerâ pectâc jujune, erâ sambâŋ hucke-fârewec jukac. Iŋucnezi hâcne junâreme sâcke-hâmokac.
Tâpiri nareme sanaŋkeekopac, ere erâ jupe bape sâcke-fâreekac.
Anutu e ʒiŋuc hâcne muekac: Boe sau qikiŋnehuc maŋɋaɋac junʒepieŋ.
Paŋʒâic jaha numuhuc junʒepieŋ. Erâ rucgereŋ juhuc daŋge nunumu enʒepieŋ.
Eme Mose e dâŋ i manarâ izia wiserâ ra Midiaŋ mâreŋko ŋic furune jaŋere ŋondeŋko juwec. Erâ ŋokac bame ŋokâ jajahec fuacnepic.
Ŋic e ine qizectuc juzejec. E Anuture hawari â Anuture eri tofa bakicne irec. Ŋokac e ine ŋicte eri tofa bakicne.
Erâ Kristore wamazi maŋŋeŋicko guriŋne bazejec. Ŋoŋe wamahec erâ me sahac mocjahao juniŋte rocŋopakicne hâcne. Erâ wâc daŋge mumuteŋ ehuc junʒepieŋ.
Wiac sasawa irec rune â bâbâfua e naru motecfâcne bocjaha eri tatamac-ticnao jowac-jopaocte manasuhuc bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋicte micne bapa e ʒâic serereŋ gie baku mao fisiocte mucnewec i sâcke-hâmowec.
Ŋoŋerao ʒika â rârâsi foekac i fuŋne weniŋucte? Me sahac-ŋeŋicko andac forakac izi hâcne ʒika gie baekac.
No ʒiŋuc ine jâmbomac mupie manaekopac: Ŋoŋerao mamakâc hâhâwicne, qâpuc jaŋerao mi fufuane, iŋucne fuawec fokac. Ŋic moczi mamac-ticnere ŋonâŋhec juekac, irec mukopac.
Ŋoŋerao eesâic fua warewec i ŋic tâpiri-ŋeŋicte sâcko fuawec. Erâ Anutu e mume sasanaŋzi eesâic baafeckeme tâpiri-ŋeŋicte sâc mi jâuruocmu. Erâ eesâic fuaocmu sâc âte sâoc-ŋopame sâcne sanaŋkeniŋmu.
No manakopac, no behec-ŋopape kâte qâto mimicne ŋoŋerao fisirâ lama mi akic-jopaniŋmu,
Erâ ŋoŋe fific guguriŋ eŋarepie ʒâic busâqochec juhuc mamanasiŋ-ŋeŋic mi ŋeŋgoroŋkeha sifu sanaŋkerâ jueŋgopieŋ, irec dâŋ binaŋ hae sâc Anuture kikefuŋfâc ejareeŋgopeneŋ.
Ŋiczi Anutu hohone i moc mi ekicne, maŋzi jauŋ babac enaŋmuo ine Anutu maŋkenaŋmu, eme maŋjauŋ-ticne nâŋâcnao fua sarickeocmu.
Paulo no aposolo, ŋiczi mi sorecnumbiŋ â ŋic moczi gie wâc mi munarewec, Jesu Kristo â Anutu Mamac e hâmockonec bâɋâreweczi gie i munarewec.
Sâqocne bapa jaŋe mukac mupe mo iŋucne ecnepie mana-bipierâ sanaŋkewec, ŋoŋe ere hâcne manasuhuc mi takirepie maŋŋeŋic betaŋkezejec.
Nâŋâc hâmoc-ticnere hawari ehuc erao ʒuhuckembeŋte fafahare-ticnao sâc i jaha ehuc ʒuhuckenaŋmu.
Erâ dâŋ moc kecʒiŋuc fokac: “Ŋic qâpuc ŋoŋe Anuture fuŋfuŋfâc jaŋehec mu ʒeri enʒepieŋ.”
Mâro e qanaŋ ʒiŋuc mujaŋgeŋkerâ muekac: Juku ʒâhec ŋic tucnezi miti beherâ maŋ bâsifuc bâbâfua jaŋere eeatuc dâŋko â demoŋ jaŋere burecdâŋko qohotaniŋmu.
Go dâŋ heɋâre-jarehuc jazatec ŋic jaŋe kia gawamaî â fekicne araŋ bajarehuc dâŋjeŋic reŋkenʒepieŋ, erâ gie biaŋne fuŋne fuŋne fokac irec afeckerâ banʒepieŋ.
Jaŋe fuŋne ʒiŋuc mana-bipiehuc dâŋ i mueŋgopieŋ: Sambâŋ e mârâc jaha fuawec â mâreŋ e iŋuc jaha. I Anutu dâŋticnere opâonec fuarâ opâheckoaŋ fowec.
Kristo e iŋuc jaha tiŋnezi sâqocnere erâ arec moc hâmowec, e tiŋnezi hehesicne ŋoŋere erâ iŋuc ewec, Anuturao râec-ŋopaocte. E sahachec juwecte qapie hâmowec, â Mârohec juwecte ɋârewec.
Ŋic iŋucne jaŋe tiŋne hata kâuc bahuc mi âtepie muzac boc mi sâqorezac; â hata i âtekicnezi tiri sâcmutâc dâŋ qazu-jarekicne i mocwâc igockehuc hata raŋɋanao risiepie ine sâqoreekac.
Âgofâc, Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere micte ŋazapene mananiŋ, dâŋ qazu-ŋarembeŋ i opâ ruac gâcnezi mi reŋkehuc kosa jueŋgopieŋ, ŋic i jaŋehec mi junʒepieŋ.
Irec ʒiŋuc mananaŋ: Ŋic mocjahare erâ sâqocne mâreŋko fuawec, â sâqocnere erâ hâmoc fuawec, ehuc ŋic sasawa jaŋerao fotâcnewec. Iŋuc fuame ŋic sasawa sâqore-fârembiŋ.
Jaŋe mamanasiŋhec jumbiŋte ŋic guru sâko bawahac-jopambiŋ. Bâbâtiŋ gie bâhâmombiŋ, wiac biŋe qajarekicne irec fârine rombiŋ, laioŋ micjeŋic bâbâzickembiŋ,
fific guguriŋ faio juipiehuc sifu mamac babasa mi eeŋgopeneŋ, qa imac enâre-bipiehapie sifu hâmo sipiric mi eeŋgopeneŋ.
Oi, ʒâʒâfic hehetâc ŋic ŋoŋe¡ Mâreŋko wiac fokac irec biŋe juocmuzi Anutu râpeckeocmu, i mi manaŋgopieŋ me? Irec moc e mâreŋkopec wiac kosa âgo ecneocmuzi Anutu kisâ ecneocmu.
Eme Asia mâreŋko miti murazo mupie Tiri Mârozi hecke-jareme Frigia â Galatia mâreŋ fotâcnehuc rambiŋ.
Á mamanasiŋte tiŋke biaŋ eere dâŋ ine kecʒiŋuc fokac: “Go maŋgezi ʒiŋuc mi muzemec: Mozi sambâŋko ferâ Kristo bawahaocmu,

Eme aŋelo namba 1 eki rarâ râqâc-ticnaonec wiac hoŋkeme mâreŋko huwec. Hume ŋic qowi mimicnere ʒâŋe qâreŋ bajumbiŋ â hawari-ticne dieŋzi hecnembiŋ jaŋe wicʒâhâc ʒâic sisiac-ticnehec mâretec fua-jarewec.

Papia foforiŋ rome wiac jujune 4 â ŋicqizec 24 jaŋe Lamare maŋfuŋko fodapembiŋ. Jaŋe musi-jeŋichec sasawa, â râqâc golzi bakicne i mâmâc barâ fombiŋ. Râqâc maŋkonec hosâc âsu biaŋ wefuwec, i Anuture tiriŋicfâc jaŋere nunumu.
Ŋic moczi Jesu e Kristo muhuc mana ʒakieocmu, e Anuturaonec fuakicne muzo. Eme moc e mamac bâbâfua maŋjauŋ ecneocmuzi ɋâricfâcne mâmâc ejareocmu.
Sahaczi fecko fec ehuc hehesuac mi enʒepeneŋ, erâ wâc iiŋguuŋ mi eec enʒepeneŋ.
Ŋicqizec moc dâŋ âzâcnemurâ fâfâcnehec mi ecnezemec, mamac-nane muhuc urucko mu tutuc ecnezemec, ŋicmotec hahac ɋafâc-nane muhuc sâcjeŋicko jaza bâtiŋ ejarezemec.

Ehuc qâpuc jaŋere ŋondeŋko juju tiŋne junʒepieŋ. Iŋuc jupie qâpuc jaŋe fuŋne-ŋeŋic hone mana tarac erâ, sâqocne bapa muŋareeŋgopieŋ, i beherâ juku Anuture iiqic dameŋko eehâmo gie-ŋeŋicte erâ Anutu muteŋkenʒepieŋ.
ʒoɋac-nanere erâ kikefuŋ jaŋere râsi epo, sâcmutâc dâŋ sâcko tiŋne juju â bahacmâc jupo.
Mupie ɋiɋic qawec dameŋ irec mu indiŋ ejareme mumbiŋ: “Jacne ʒoaŋ ʒâʒâŋiŋ ŋehame ira hucticne âke niniŋkejec.”

Eme Judaŋic jaŋe teuŋko raʒimbiŋte ʒiŋuc mumbiŋ: “Tomâcko sabata hombaŋ sâkoo ŋic jopakicne jaŋere qâŋɋâŋ maripoŋko mi domazejec.” Iŋuc murâ Pilato âzâcnepie momori jaŋe ŋic siec-jeŋic qazurâ qâŋɋâŋ-jeŋic bataraniŋte Judaŋic mana-jarewec.
Dâŋ i manarâ Pilatozi Jesu akickezo mume Judaŋic jaŋe owa ruruckerâ mumbiŋ: “Go ŋic e akickerâ Sisare âgo mocwâc mi jucmu. Moc e jahacnere ŋicwofuŋ muhuc Sisa âkehockeocmu.”
“Ŋoŋe fâfârerâ maŋŋeŋic mi gâckezejec. Anutu manasiŋkehuc no mâmâc manasiŋnunʒepieŋ.
Keketeŋ epie kisâfâc-ŋeŋic hâhâwic heŋarepie hâbi-ŋeŋic mi goroŋkezejec. Iŋuc epie Anutuzi jaŋe behec-jopaocmu â ŋoŋe rocŋopaocmu irec fuŋne bataniŋkeocmu.
ŋoŋe no mi rowosâecnumbiŋ, noni ŋoŋe rowosâec-ŋopapo, erâ ra juhuc fârine bâfuaniŋte muŋarepo. Eme fârine bâfuapie fofonehec ezejec. Iŋuc erâ nore ʒâŋe bajuhuc Mamac numucnepie sâc ŋareocmu.

Mamanasiŋhec juhuc Abezi Anutu bâzi rikecneme honeme sâckeha Kaiŋte qikiŋnewec. Mamanasiŋ-ticnere hâcne Anutuzi honeme kiŋfâsâc eme bâzi-ticne rohuc fuŋne-ticne bataniŋkewec. E mamanasiŋhec juwecte manapene hâmokicnezi sifu dâŋ nâzâkac ekac.
Ŋoŋe nâŋere manapie Kristore kiŋaŋ qaqa â Anutu boreŋ ʒeŋaŋ-ticnere soŋaŋ ezejec.
Á bâpiŋ jaŋe mâŋâŋzi nemuja qâmârâŋkeme wahaekac, iŋuc sambâŋkonec mârâŋkerâ wahambiŋ.
Irec hâcne, âgofâc-nane, ŋoŋe nemu qaŋgec wiacte geŋkerâ junʒepieŋ.
Sâqocnezi go mi bawahacguzejec. Aricne, go wiac biaŋne ehuc sâqocne bawahazemec.
Go dâŋ i heɋâre-jarerâ Anuture maio mujomirehuc jaza sanaŋketec dâŋ racnere mu iigoc mi enʒepieŋ. I wiac fârimâc, iŋuc ehuc miti mamana sipiric-jopaniŋmu.
