Ŋoŋe Anutu maickepie eki wâc maic-ŋopaocmu. Sâqocne bapa, maŋŋeŋic ra qa ware qa eekac, ŋoŋe meŋeŋic ʒurerâ maŋŋeŋic baɋaɋackenʒepieŋ.
Á ŋic sâctiri ejareniŋmu, ine bahac bâfuapie sâcmutâc dâŋzi qaqatara ŋic eŋgopieŋ irec fuŋne bataniŋkeocmu.
Maŋwânâŋhec junaŋte aricne, maŋɋaɋac junaŋte Anutuzi hefârec-nâpowec.
Ŋiczi ine Anutu qamaserâ sindaŋ ehuc kike hata-ticne hesifuckeeŋgopieŋte kimbeŋ ticnezi sambâŋkonec fua taniŋkeekac.
Jorocfâc-nane, nâŋâc maŋjauŋ eec enʒepeneŋ. Maŋjauŋ i Anuturaonec. Eme moc e maŋjauŋhec juomu, e Anuturaonec fuakicnezi Anutu mana maŋ eekac mucnezo.
Eme ŋic moc e âgo-ticne qaisockeekaczi “no tatamacko jukopac” muocmu, ere dapâcko juweczi jukac muzo.
Ŋoŋe Kristo ʒâŋe biŋe-ticnere musoc qâsoriŋ-ŋopapie manapie ʒerine ezejec. Wiac i eŋarepie tatamacte maqâreŋ, Anuture Mâro hâcne, ŋoŋerao waha juocmu.
Fisipie Paulozi mejeŋicko barâ, Anutuzi neŋgoc ŋesiŋ ŋecnehame qâpuc jaŋerao miti gie bame fârine fuawec, irec dâŋ binaŋ ninic jaha ejarewec.
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi sâcne nore bahac moc muocmu? Eme no sâc iŋucnezi dâŋ fâri qizecne ŋazape wemocte mi mana ʒakieeŋgopieŋ?
Erâ ʒuhuckekac, “No kiŋjeŋic behe-jarepemu â sindaŋ-jeŋicte mocwâc mi manasupemu.”
E miti mumure aafec â mamana fuŋne fuŋne aameo tahac-ŋopawec.
Âgofâc-nane, no Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere erâ â Mârore Jauŋte erâ hazec qâuŋ ŋazakopac, ŋoŋe nore erâ Anutu numucnehuc juju gie-nanere baficnunʒepieŋ.
Mume ŋic omane sâko jaŋe mumbiŋ, “Go demoŋzi maŋge bâsifuckekac. Mozi guzo mukac?”

Eki mume Jesu e socticnezi sâqocne-nâŋecte erâ taha bawec, eme e manasiŋkeniŋmuzi taha i biŋeckeniŋmu. Sâqocne ewarehuc jukicne irec kiŋ i Anutuzi buuruc-ticnere râeme fowarehuc juwecte Jesu hâmocko râewecko tiŋnere fuŋne bataniŋkewec.
Eme kiŋaŋ motec â momori jaŋe mâmâteŋte ʒoc ruqerâ ruahuc domahapie Petoro e ŋondeŋ-jeŋicko rarâ iŋuc jaha ʒoc ruawec.
Erâ Anuturaonec sându maro ʒika wiac ro barâ juhapie Sataŋzi rucko râsi fisi-ŋareme hâbi-ŋeŋic rorâ jâpenʒepieŋ.
Eme Petorozi ʒiŋuc muwec: “Wofuŋ, no wemocte ʒiŋuczia sâcne mi fâpemu? No gore erâ juju-nane sâcne qikiŋnepemu.”
Eme Anuture wama e ŋic mamana sirickeekaczi maŋ mamanasu-ŋeŋic qâzuckeme Kristore fosanaŋkeocmu.
Nameŋ-nâŋeczi Wofuŋ Mamac muteŋkeeŋgopeneŋ, erâ nameŋzia ŋic Anuture hawarifâc sâwec-jopaeŋgopeneŋ.
i ŋic qâpuczi sasecŋic me bâkiri bapa â fiuc serereŋhec me bawe qaŋgec wiac babaju jueŋgopieŋ jaŋere mi mupo. Jaŋe mâreŋ behehuc behec-jopazo i sawa fokac.
Erâ no nahacnere mupe, no Jesu Nazarete haeonec ere ʒâŋe biŋe imackepe sifuckeocte gie-nane ewec.
ʒâŋe-jeŋiczi sasec ʒâŋe fifi, sâqocne gapecmâc ee, ŋic biric borocne wiac iŋucnere doc babac-jopa, moneŋ mafare harac eku maŋjeŋic ekicne, ŋic iŋucnezi hârâcte biŋe hâcne¡
Soŋaŋ jabane, lama ru jeŋic mi juekaczi ine kâte qâto fisime honerâ lama behec-joparâ wiseocmu. Ehame kâte qâtozi lama ki bâtâtiec ejareocmu.
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane, mananiŋ. Ŋiczi dâŋ mamanare afeckenʒepeneŋ, dâŋ mumure â aaricte ine ŋemâckenʒepeneŋ.
Eme Wofuŋ e Biŋebiaŋ mumu ŋic nâŋe iŋuc jaha Biŋebiaŋzi sahacte dope wiac kifua-nâreocte muwec.
No ʒoc tatamaczi mâreŋko wahapo, eme moc e no manasiŋnuocmuzi dapâckonec wefuocmu.
Izi ʒâhec Jesuzi ŋic e taha ufuŋko bâfuarâ uŋ ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Go sahacge biaŋkejec, eme wiac ŋemâc bâmâcne jâmbâŋ fua-garezacte sâqocne mocwâc mi bazemec.”
Erâ wiac sasawa maŋjauŋhec enʒepieŋ.
Maŋŋeŋic nore qikiŋneeŋgopieŋko micnane reŋkeniŋmu.

Ŋoŋe dâŋ ŋazaekac e râpeckenʒipiŋte ruc bahuc junʒepieŋ. Mârâc jaha mâreŋko waharâ dâŋ jazame qikiŋnepie okacne fisi-jarewec. Eme ʒi sambâŋko juhuc dâŋ nâzâekac, e râpeckerâ wemocko okac tâmiric junaŋmu.
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha Anuture kâuc bahuc nemu, Wofuŋ fârine mi jujune, jaŋe kiŋaŋ qajare jumbieŋ.
Ŋoŋere hâcne Anutuzi qanaŋ manasurâ Ŋokâ-ticne soreme waha fuawec, i ŋoŋe sasawa sindaŋ hata-ŋeŋickonec bârisiec-ŋopahuc jambuŋ-ŋopaocte iŋuc hâcne ewec.”
Eme Judaŋic nâŋere mâreŋko â Jerusalem haeo wiac muwec bawec i nâŋe hone manac efârembeŋ. Ehame juku maripoŋko qapie hâmowec.
Âgofâc-nane, no Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ʒâŋe-ticnere erâ uŋdâŋ ʒi mupe mananiŋ: Ŋoŋe dâŋ fuŋne fuŋne â fâfâuc mi bâfuanʒepieŋ, aricne. Maŋ mamanasu-ŋeŋic bâturepie mocjaha eha junʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha Anutu râpeckerâ nâme nikecne erâ sâqocne fuŋne fuŋne bahuc maŋʒârâhec jujumbieŋ.

Socɋârizi wiac fuŋne fuŋnere andac eeŋgopieŋ i bâec bazemec. Ehuc maŋjeŋic biaŋkekicnezi Wofuŋ mu wâwâsic ecneeŋgopieŋ jaŋe bafic-jopatec tiŋke biaŋ eere â mamanasiŋte â maŋjauŋte â wamare henʒiriŋnenʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe Kristo fafahare-ticnao ʒuhuckembiŋko ine faic Anuture maŋfuŋko Kristo jukacko wiac fokac, irec henʒiriŋnehuc junʒepieŋ.
Ehuc aŋelo namba wâŋ eki qeŋ qame hoe sanaŋ â ʒoc sochec bâsifuckekicne izi mâreŋko hewec. Heme mâreŋ tucne ʒoczi ʒawec â jâc tucne â sopâc kecɋaŋ sasawa ʒoczi ʒafârewec.
“Wofuŋ Anutu bapafâre, jumeŋzi juekic, nâŋe go daŋge mumuteŋ egareŋgopeneŋ. Go tâpiri sâkoge qaratietec fuakac, ehuc Wofuŋ giege fuŋkerâ bataniŋkekic.
Eme Jesuzi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Go Anutu jauŋ-ticnere fuŋne â opâre gazakopac nore fuŋne mâmâc kâuc bakic. Mana tararâ muzac numu-naretec opâ fifisine garezapo.”
Juku Kristo e juju runâŋeczi fua taniŋkeme ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha ehec mâmâc tatamac huririnao fua taniŋkeniŋmu.
Qâreŋkekicne mac kecʒi ine ʒiŋucte qâreŋkekicne: Ŋoŋe wose manac erâ Jesu e Kristo, Anuture ŋokâ, dâŋ i mana ʒakienʒepieŋ, erâ e jahacne manasiŋkehuc ʒâŋe biŋe-ticnere erâ juju sanaŋhec enʒepieŋ.

Nâŋâc ine Anuturaonec, eme moc e Anutu hone ʒâŋitac eekaczi dâŋnâŋec manaekac. Anuturaonec mi fuakicnezi ine dâŋnâŋec qikiŋneekac. Dâŋ fâri qizecnere mâro â bâbâsifuc mâro jahere fuŋne iŋucko hâcne ʒâŋitaeŋgopeneŋ.

Ŋic i jaŋe hâcne nânâ qowire harac ehuc fisi tutumaŋ-ŋeŋic hehegâpârene, mimi tâmiric nâ areŋ eene, karorac hoe mi hehuc mâc mâŋâŋzi ficneme rame arictac eekac irec sâcko jujune, jâc garaŋ garaŋne, fâri tâmiric, hâsi fâri hâmokicne, qâqâfiene, ŋic iŋucne tinac hâcne,
Erâ wâc âgofâc-jeŋic huc ʒâichec hatao fofo â kanʒe faio kecʒiŋuc muhuc râec-jopambiŋ: Petorozi rac warec eme nâkumuc-ticnezi foninipec-jopazejec.
Erâ neŋgocne sâko ine mamanasiŋzi maro-ŋeŋic eme dameŋ sâc he bâfeŋnerâ domahapie sâqocne runere ʒoc tepe moteczi kisowarierâ hâpozejec.
Gie-ŋeŋic sasawa i ŋic jaŋere erâ mâcne, Wofuŋte erâ aafec faio banʒepieŋ.
Erâ ŋoŋeraonec moczi Esaure hata mi âtehuc sasecŋic â ŋic araŋ bapa tâmiric mi ezejec. E nânâ mocjaha mac irec erâ mârâc fufuare merâfâc qikiŋnewec.
Eme jaŋe harierâ owackehuc mumbiŋ: “Aricne, e mâcne, Baraba akicke-nârec.” Baraba e ine ʒikaŋic.
docbapa, enʒaŋaucne, pepecne, sasecte aŋac kâcɋene bajuhuc Anuture aŋac mi mamana,
Iŋuc ewecte Anutuzi bafehuc fekicne sâko âkendâŋnewec. Âkendâŋnerâ ʒâŋe biŋe-ticne fuŋmoc izi haŋ bahuc ŋic ʒâŋe biŋe getâcke-fâreocte mucnewec.
Nâŋe Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo tâpiri-ticnere â fifisi-ticnere dâŋ ŋazambeŋ, i nemu binaŋ ŋic mamanao fuakicne mi ŋazambeŋ, nâŋe bapa fuŋfuŋ domahuc Wofuŋ tatamac-ticne fuame honembeŋ.

E papia qâreŋkehuc sâc dâŋ i mufua rawec. Papia-ticnao dâŋ gâcne fokac irec fuŋne qame hukicne. Eme dâŋ iŋucne i ŋic mutucne â biric borocne jaŋe musifuckeeŋgopieŋ. Erâ i ere papiare sawa mâcne, miti papia gâcnere mâmâc ehuc sisipiric maickeeŋgopieŋ.
Eme aposolo jahec Banaba â Paulo jahe i manarâ fâfâre sâqorehuc hemâtâc-jofame ŋic bâfâuc bâfâuc-jopa
No kecʒiŋucte ŋazakopac: Anutu e mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec biŋedâŋ mujâmbâŋkehuc jazawec i fârinehec eocte Kristozi mahec nâŋere kiŋaŋ qaqa ewec.
Moc e mitio jukopac muekaczi micbipic-ticne mi soŋaŋkehuc maŋticne eatuckeekac, ŋic iŋucnere mitio juju i racne eocmu.

No dâŋ moc kecʒiŋuc ŋazapo irec manasunʒepieŋ: Kiŋaŋ qaqazi bomboŋ-ticnere sâc sirickerâ jujune mi fokac. Jaŋe no râsi enarembiŋko ŋoŋe râsi jaha eŋareniŋmu, jaŋe nore dâŋ mana maŋ embiŋko ŋoŋere dâŋ iŋuc jaha mana maŋ eniŋmu.
Eme e manasiŋkembiŋ Judaŋic jaŋe hâcne ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Ŋoŋe nore dâŋko juhuc ine motec fuŋfuŋfâc-nane eniŋmu.
Âkendâŋneme juhame roroc fuarâ Aigita â Kanaaŋ mâreŋko qarâ suriŋkerâ fome hae mâreŋ hâŋkewec. Eme mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec jaŋe nânâre hâmohuc jumbiŋ.
Naru motecfâcge gâcne Mamaczi sâcmutâc dâŋticne nâzâwec reŋkehuc dâŋ fâri qizecne sâcne bajueŋgopieŋ, fuŋne-jeŋic iŋuc manarâ bunane boc biaŋkewec.
Moc e wiacfâcne â soctofafâcne hone jauŋ kime dopec mi ejareocmu e miti beherâ qâpuc sanaŋ ewec mucnezo.
Irec nâŋâc mamanasiŋzi maŋnâŋec baafeckeha siocmâc mai ecnehuc junʒepeneŋ. Ine qanaŋ maŋnâŋec kiŋzi hegâpârekicne i socticnezi ruacneme taniŋkeha â sahac-nâŋec opâ ɋaɋaczi ʒureha iŋuc sâcne enaŋmu.
Jaŋe nore biŋedâŋ ʒiŋuc sawa manambiŋ: “Nâpo jâpec enârehuc miti ima qaocte muweczi ŋic miti i hâcne jazahuc juekac.”
Irec ʒi nânâ nâniŋte ŋazape mi qataraniŋ. Nânâ nâqiŋnerâ sâcne tiŋko ferâ juniŋmu. Qizec susuc-ŋeŋic moc mi waharâ sifuckeocmu.”
Erâ sasanaŋhec juhuc nore erâ ʒârâ hâriŋ faio tatakic tâmiric jumeŋ.
Ehuc mutec ŋic kâcɋene jaŋe sowa bâtâc â metâne â wama ruaine jupie mamanasiŋ â maŋjauŋ â maŋuruc furu fojarezejec.
Qâpuc juwefuhapie hone akic eŋare warehuc juwec, irec dameŋ tarawec. Ʒi ine mâreŋ sâc ŋic mâmâc sasawa maŋjeŋic bârisieniŋte mujarekac.
Momori jaŋe iŋuc hâcne embiŋ. Jesure maripoŋ fuŋko ine ʒiŋuc domambiŋ: Neŋgoc-ticne â neŋgoc-ticnere qo, erâ Maria Kelopa ere ŋonâŋ, â Maria Madala haeonec.
Mâc gâcne ŋoŋe mana jaŋgeŋkehuc nâeŋgopieŋzi âgofâc-ŋeŋic miti afecne fojareekac jaŋe maŋ bâsifuc ejarenʒipiŋte manabâc enʒepieŋ.
Jesu bâɋâreme faharewec e ʒâhec hâhâmo i mocwâc mi bâfuaocmu, irec Anutuzi dâŋ kecʒiŋuc muwec: ‘No Dawidi biŋe qacnepo irec fârine fofo sanaŋ i hâcne tahacke-ŋarepemu.’
Dameŋ ira, Mamaczi no maŋnuekac â noni ŋoŋe maŋŋopaekopac, â ŋoŋe no maŋnueŋgopieŋ i mana taraniŋmu.
Anutu mana maŋ eeŋgopeneŋ, ine sâcmutâc dâŋticne mana rereŋ epene fuŋne jaŋgeŋkeme mananaŋmu.
No irec hâcne ŋazakopac: ŋoŋe sâqocne-ŋeŋichec juku hâmoniŋmu. No jukopac ʒi fuŋne-nane ŋazaekopac i mi mana ʒakieniŋmuo, sâqocne-ŋeŋic foŋarehame hâmoniŋmu hâcne.”
Eme ŋokac e tiriŋic â Jesure mumutaniŋfâc jaŋere soc nâku maŋne bibiriwame honepo. Honerâ bipic tatara enarewec.
Ŋoŋe ere manaeŋgopieŋ, e ʒâhec jambuŋ rozo mume sakarecnekicne. E wiac ewec i suame arictac eocte kio-bipiehuc emâmâŋkewec.
Á ŋic omane sâko jaŋe ere dâŋ bocjaha mufembiŋ. Ehuc gâcnezi mumbiŋ, “E ŋic biaŋne,” â gâcnezi qatararâ mumbiŋ, “Aricne, e ŋic maŋ bâsifuc ejareekac.”
Eme Wofuŋzi tâpiri sicne-jarehame jazapie ŋic guru sâko jaŋe manarâ maŋjeŋic bârisierâ Wofuŋte biŋe embiŋ.
Anutuzi honec-nâpome sâckeme Biŋebiaŋ muromackenaŋte betoŋ-nâpowec irec sâc mueŋgopeneŋ. Ŋiczi mana-nârepie biaŋkeocte aricne, Anutu e maŋ hohonezi mana-nâreme biaŋkeocte mocjaha mueŋgopeneŋ.
Anutu e Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ecneme jujure tâpiri bâfua-nâreekacte muteŋkenʒepeneŋ.
Hozec fârine ine e jahackoaŋ juhuc Anuturao roweckeekac, ehuc ŋafe furec nunumu wâwâsic ecneekac.
Juwarembiŋ ira nore ʒâŋe bajuhuc mi numu jumbieŋ. Ʒi ine numurâ ropie bubiaŋ-ŋeŋiczi fua sawec erâ fufuse fozejec.
Go kiŋaŋ qaqa juhaŋtec hefârecguwecko manabâc tâmiric Juzemec. Mâc firuecguzo mupie mi qikiŋnezemec.
Ŋic iŋucnezi hâcne fâfâuc bâfuaeŋgopieŋ, erâ Mâro tâmiric maŋ qâŋɋâŋne jueŋgopieŋ.
Ŋoŋe Kristore aki anonocko râec-ŋopahuc hefârec-ŋopawec ehec jupie mi ʒoraha e râpeckehuc miti fuŋmoc irec hazec rârâe eŋgopieŋ, no irec wareckekopac.
Ŋoŋe ŋic mâmâc sasawa jaŋehec wamao jujure giene banʒepieŋ, erâ maŋfuru erâ juniŋte henʒiriŋnenʒepieŋ, maŋwânâŋhec juku Wofuŋ hohone i mi fokac.
Mupie ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Woke fâreopec wasaŋ behepie qowi jowaocmu.” Mume wasaŋ behepie qowi mâretec jâmbâŋ jowa susuckeme fâre-bipiembiŋ.
Mahec juju me ma tâmiric juju izi fârine mâcne, Anuture sâcmutâc dâŋ rereŋ izi fârine ekac.
Uŋsawaŋ dâŋ muekac e irec tâpiri focnekacko muzejec, bâmec gie baekac e maŋticne bawahahuc bazejec, moc e micne juocte mucnekicko ʒoɋachec juzejec, â moc e jauŋ gie baocmuzi buafec jaha bazajec.
wio-jarehuc muwec, “Ŋoŋe miti manahuc Tiri Mârohec embiŋ me mâcne?” Eme jaŋe mumbiŋ, “Aricne, Tiri Mâro jukac biŋene moc mi manambeŋ.”
Ʒi papiao dâŋ qâreŋke-ŋareŋgopeneŋ, i ŋic moczi qikiŋneme fuŋne-ticne mujaŋgeŋkerâ behepie buc juhuc mimiezejec.
Âgofâc, dâŋ moc ʒi mupe mananiŋ: Mâreŋ sahac-nâŋeczi Anuture uucmaŋ sâcne mi rauckeocmu, â wiac gârecke ʒaŋ eenezi wiac fofo sanaŋ mi wâc rauckeocmu.
Ŋoŋe gie banʒepieŋ, erâ nânâ sisirowenere mâcne, juju sanaŋte nânâ irec giene banʒepieŋ. Ŋic Fâri Wâtuŋne eki, Anutu Mamaczi kamac sarahuc âkendâŋnewecte, juju sanaŋte nânâ i sâcne ŋareocmu.”
Moc i numu-bipiehuc wiac mi roeŋgopieŋ, ine maŋŋeŋicko dâŋ sâqocne ʒiŋuc foha numueŋgopieŋte: “Wiac fua-nâreme samarierâ andac-nâŋecte fârine bâfuanʒepeneŋ.”
Erâ Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore erâ dameŋ sâc Anutu Mamac wiac fuŋne fuŋnere daŋge mumuteŋ ecnenʒepieŋ.
Abraham e iŋuc hâcne ecnekicne. E Anutu manasiŋkeme kiŋfâsâc mucnewec.
Erâ hae i mosa ʒoaŋzi mi âke tamaeekac, Anuture eri tatamaczi batamaeekac â Lamazi ʒoc tatamac-ticne eekac.
Anuture Mârozi maŋŋeŋicko fic hae ewecko ine maŋraŋɋaopec mâcne, Mâroraopec utuckerâ jueŋgopieŋ. Moc e Kristore Mâro tâmiric juocmuzi ere ŋicbiŋe mi juocmu.
Erâ wâc tieŋne raŋɋane jaŋe maŋsanaŋ-jeŋic beheniŋmuo Anutuzi mocwâc râe ʒuhuc ejarezo murâ sâcne ejareocmu.
Erâ micjeŋickonec burecdâŋ moc mi wahawec, jaŋe bahacmâc.

Erâ moc mufua-garepe manac: Hata ɋâri sureeŋgopieŋ i âteekopac mueŋgopieŋ, ine jâmbomac eekopac. Erâ jaŋere dâŋmiti bajuhuc sâcmutâc dâŋqâhâcko miti qâreŋkekicne fokac â porofete mu qâreŋ embiŋ i manape fârine ehame mimiŋnefâc-nâŋec jaŋere Anutu kiŋaŋ qacneekopac.
Wiac omanere tofa bazupie tarazejec, maŋjauŋte tofa mocjaha babazuc epie tatarane ine mi fokac. Maŋjauŋhec juekaczi sâcmutâc dâŋ reŋkekac muzo.
Eme ŋic jaŋe ʒoaŋ fâroroc-ticnezi boc rikec-jopame Anutu, micticnere wiac micne momori iŋuc fuawec, e ʒâŋe biŋe-ticne musâqorembiŋ. Erâ maŋjeŋic sifu mi bârisierâ Anutu mi sâsembiŋ.
Qânâsac sâko ʒoricnezi hae râreckekac. Sac i motâc-ticne 12, erâ motâc botâŋnao aŋelo moc moc doma rapie 12 jaha ekac, erâ wâc motâc sâc Israe ŋicguru 12 jaŋere ʒâŋe qâreŋ forakac.
Dâŋqâreŋ moc ʒiŋuc fokac: “Ŋic jâcko ɋetic-jopakicne jaŋe sâwecte biŋe.” Eme Kristo e nâŋâcnere iŋuc hâcne erâ sâwec hotâckewec, ehuc sâcmutâc dâŋte sâwec i bâsue-nârewec.
No mârâc jaha Judaŋic jaŋere guruo juhuc wiac epo, i ŋoŋe manaeŋgopieŋ. No Anuture kikefuŋfâc jopa jâpec ejarehuc mâretec sipiric-jopapo.
Erâ e oâ, homa raŋɋa, demoŋ micne Sataŋ hâcne, e rorâ kâpâcwâruzi bândeŋnerâ jara 1 tauseŋ niŋgiŋhec foocte mucnerâ
Eme hae ijaha qaŋgec bapa moc juwec, ʒâŋene Simoŋ. E jahacnere no ŋic fekicne muhuc qaŋgec gie bame Samaria ŋicguru jaŋe honepie bipinehec ewec.
Erâ no Kristo maŋzi hemiriŋkepe fafahare-ticnere tâpiri norao fuame ʒâic manawecko ʒuhuckerâ ehec manazepac. Eku hâmoc-ticnere hawari wâc bâfuazepac.
Go ŋic miti giere fâro ehuc biac mi jambuŋ-jopazemec, jaŋere kiŋzi gore faio fezacte. Gahacne maŋ sahac soŋaŋketec ɋaɋacnea fozejec.
Erâ ŋokac kâcɋene iŋuc jaha jazatec miti ŋokac fârine erâ gupe micko âkec tâmiric â nârâmbe tâmiric juhuc juju biaŋte qaqazu enʒepieŋ.
Irec ŋic moc e otâ-ticne ŋicne ŋicko râeme sâsâckecne eocmu, â moc e otâ-ticne sakareme ine sâcke-hâmoocmu.
Ŋoŋe mitidâŋte fârine bâfuanʒepieŋ, mâc hazecte nâpene sawa eme maŋŋeŋic eatuckeniŋmu.
Jerusalem haeonec Judaŋic jaŋe Jesu qaniŋte dâŋ qacnepie Judaia mâreŋ-jeŋic qikiŋnerâ Galilaia mâreŋko sawa rac warec ehuc juwec.
E mitio juju-ŋeŋicte bâbâfua i Kristo Jesu râe-nârewec. Kristo e hâcne Anutuzi maŋɋârâŋ dâŋte rowaŋ-nâŋec â kiŋroro-nâŋec â maŋɋaɋac bâbâfua-nâŋec â kikitâc-nâŋec râe-nârewec.
Erâ opâ râqâcko qame hume fuŋkerâ motecfâcne kike ʒure-jarewec. Ehuc gie qoruczi bâkereŋke-jarewec.
Ehuc miti ɋâricne ʒi omaeocte no râsi ecnehuc ŋic mecne ŋokac mecne mâmâc jaha niŋgiŋ-joparâ kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopahuc jupo.
Ŋic jaŋe Jesure iŋuc muhuc fâuckembiŋ.
Anuture lama guru soŋaŋ-jopaniŋte muŋarekicne, i jâiŋko mâcne, buafec jaha hone maiŋ ejarenʒepieŋ, erâ moneŋ mafa huhurere manasuhuc mâcne, giere buâkec eŋareha enʒepieŋ.
Sâqocnezi hâmocte ʒârâ ekac, â sâcmutâc dâŋte erâ sâqocnezi tâpirinehec ekac.
Manaŋgopieŋ, padi qaŋarepie gie furi sakare-jarembiŋ irec kiŋzi hohosâcne qakac, erâ qa roro ŋic jaŋere kio wâwâsiczi sambâŋ momori jaŋere Wofuŋte hazecko huwec.
Ŋoŋe sindaŋ â burec wiac â eeatuc â iiŋguuŋ â gupe micko âkec i hetara-fârenʒepieŋ.
Ŋokac moc e ŋowe-ticne juocmu sâc gâjoŋnao bohotarâ domazejec. Ŋowe-ticne hâmome ine ŋic moc me moc rozo murâ rozejec, erâ kosa ehuc mâcne, Wofuŋtao roweckehuc ezejec.
Jahe dâŋ fâri beherâ mukopirec, fafahare i biac fuawec. Iŋuc muhuc ŋic gâcne miti ba imac ejarekopirec.
Kristo Jesurao fisirâ mahec juju â ma tâmiric juju irec mâmâc jaha fârimâc muzo, mamanasiŋte qâreŋ maŋko fuame irec mocjaha fârine muzo.
Erâ wiac emataucke-fârerâ mume rereŋfâc-ticne sasawa jaŋere bâbâpiaŋ tatara tâmiric bâfuawec.
Mitiŋic jaŋere moneŋ râezo murâ ine Galatia mâreŋkonec kikefuŋ guru jaza mutâc epo ijaha enʒepieŋ.
Ŋonâŋ ŋoŋe Wofuŋte rereŋfâc juŋgopieŋ iŋuc jaha ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere junʒepieŋ.
Eme Jesuzi ŋic dâŋ moc ʒiŋuc ʒuhuckerâ jazawec: “No mâreŋ sâc ŋic ŋoŋere ʒoctamac. Eme moc e no bâjâpecnuocmuzi dapâcko mi rahuc juocmu. E jujure tatamac focnehame juocmu.”
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane, ŋoŋe ine Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo aposolofâc-ticne jaŋe qanaŋ dâŋ mumbiŋ, irec manasuhuc junʒepieŋ.
E ufuŋ ŋicmezi bakicne ira ŋeŋe juju mi eekac, erâ wâc wiac moc basame ŋiczi gie bacnehuc wiac bâbâfuacne mi fokac. I aricne, ekizia ŋic nâŋâc juju â mâro â wiac sasawa nâre-fâreekac.
Ŋiczi dâŋ dodopec ehuc mupie manapene jâmbomac eekac, â Anutuzi dâŋ moc dopeckeme ine fâri rarau jâmbâŋ eekac. Anuture dodopec dâŋ ine Ŋokâ-ticnere dâŋ dopeckewec i hâcne.
Wofuŋ Jesu Kristo e ŋaqi-ŋeŋic eme rojunʒepieŋ Erâ sahac-ŋeŋiczi sasec bâfuazacte mana manahuc jauŋ bacnenʒepieŋ.
Israe ŋic jaŋe mamanasiŋhec jumbiŋte Jeriko haesac orâŋkekuhapie ʒoaŋ gie bapa 7 eme hericke qawec.
Erâ Anutuzi Paulo neŋgoc ŋesiŋ ŋecnehame mâsi ʒâŋe furu-jeŋic bocjaha bawec.
Eme Jesuzi ʒiŋuc jazawec: “No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazakopac, moc e sâqocne baocmuzi sâqocnere kiŋaŋ qaqa eocmu.
Jorocfâc-nane, Anutu e maŋjauŋ iŋucne sâko enarewecte nâŋâc iŋuc jaha maŋzi jauŋ babac ehuc junʒepeneŋ.
Go jujure hata nowatumeŋ, maigao ʒeri bubiaŋ guru dindiŋ bâfua-narecmu.’
Woŋec-nane juhuc miti wose qazuc â jaza qâmoc ehuc juzemec.
Hume serereŋ faio juipiehuc sifu docke ʒaŋ mi eeŋgopeneŋ. Bebekâne juipiehuc sifu mi mana utuckeeŋgopeneŋ,
Gâcnezi ine aposolo mufec muriŋ ejarehuc mumbiŋ, “Jaŋe waiŋ opâ gapecmâc nâmbieŋte maŋjeŋic bibiriwakac.”
Haesac i qânâ ɋaɋacne, huririnehec izi bakicne, â hae ine goì fifimârâŋne kiruŋ ɋaɋacne iŋucne izi bakicne.
Aŋkeme aŋelo 7 wiac micne momori 7 bajumbiŋ, jaŋe ufuŋkonec wahambiŋ. Jaŋe ŋaqi ɋaɋacne qaŋqaŋ rojumbiŋ, â amec-jeŋicko umbika golzi bakicne fowec.
Ŋopa jâpec eŋareniŋmu jaŋe jambuŋ-jopanʒepieŋ. Micŋeŋickonec sâwecdâŋ mâcne, jambuŋdâŋ sawa wahazejec.
Kike jahec-ticne ine aeŋ ʒocko ʒahuc bâruŋkeekac iŋucne tinac â dâŋ hawari-ticne opâ sâro fânâŋ tinac.
No biŋedâŋge mutaniŋke-jarepo erâ mutaniŋke-jarehuc jupemu. Eme maŋjauŋ no enaremeŋ ijaha jaŋerao fome maŋjopahuc jupemu.”
E ŋokâ-ticne mi sakarehuc nâŋâcnere erâ qaisockeweczi ere erâ wiac sasawa mi sesi qeqeric jaha tahac-nâpoocmu me?
Jaŋe kecʒiŋuc ŋazahuc jumbiŋ: “Dameŋ bembeŋkeme ŋic âke sisicne fuarâ miti imackehuc sasec gie-jeŋicte heʒâkiriŋkerâ juniŋmu.”
go tieŋne raŋɋane mi mana pitiwac-jopahuc maŋfefe mi ezemec. Iŋuc ezicte ʒiŋuc manac: Go gâtâ gume hesiwiŋ mi ecnekomec, gâtâzi go egareekac.
Erâ nâŋe mitio ŋicbomboŋ eŋarenaŋte mi muŋgopeneŋ, mâc ŋoŋerao bubiaŋ fuaocte babaficko gie baeŋgopeneŋ. Ŋoŋe mamanasiŋko qiŋ herâ domaŋgopieŋ i manakopac.
Betania haeo ŋic moc juwec ʒâŋene Lazaro, e huc bame fowec. Maria â Mata jahe hahac qozi hae irecteaŋ.
Irec moc e dâŋ i bâsueocmu, e ŋic moc mâcne, Anuctu e jahacne bâsueocmu, Tiri Mâro maŋŋeŋicko râeekac e hâcne bâsueocmu.
Anuture Mâro e ʒiŋucko ʒâŋitazo: Mâro moc e Jesu Kristo ŋic fuawec i mutaniŋkeocmu, e Anuturaonec iŋuc mucnezo.
Eme sifu ŋic keci jaŋe wâc iŋuc jaha, guŋko jujune tinac erâ sahaczi mamakâc eeŋgopieŋ, erâ fekicne ro waha âte ejarehuc tatamachec jaŋe wâc musuac-jopaeŋgopieŋ.
Eme sâqocne râpeckerâ wiac biaŋne ezejec, erâ wamao juhuc irec giene fotarierâ bazejec.

Eme irec ŋoŋe mamanasiŋko qiŋ herâ domahuc, Biŋebiaŋzi woworic bâfua-ŋarewec i sifucke-ŋarezacte biric borocne mi enʒepieŋ. Biŋebiaŋ i ŋoŋe qazu-ŋarekicne, erâ ŋoŋe sawa mâcne, ŋicne ŋicne mâreŋ sâc jaza rakicne. Paulo no hâcne irec kiŋaŋŋic juekopac.
Iŋuc mume qânâ rorâ hezo epie e fosiroŋnerâ taha ufuŋkonec wahawec.
maŋɋâri hepie huzejec. I hâcne Anuture hawari iŋucne tiŋne â furu jâmbâŋ bâfuakicne.
Dameŋ ira hâcne Anuture sâcmutâc dâŋ reŋkehuc Jesure miti hâwicmâc bajueŋgopieŋ tiriŋic i jaŋe sasanaŋ bâfuanʒepieŋ.
Eme Anutuzi hâmockonec bâɋâreme faharewec.
“No soŋaŋ biaŋne. Soŋaŋ biaŋnezi lama jaŋere erâ juju-ticne qikiŋneocmu.
Ŋoŋe nore manambiŋ, Anutuzi uruc jauŋ-ticnere erâ ŋoŋerao miti gie bapemurâ munarewec.
Ŋic hâme âkefâucne moc uŋdâŋ mocjaha me jajahec âzâcnetecne qikiŋneme behetec buc juzejec.
Jesu e dâŋ iŋuc mume Judaŋic jaŋe manarâ mocwâc mu qaqatarac embiŋ.
Á dâŋticne mana maŋ ekac e Anutu mume sasanaŋ jukac dâŋ i dopeckekac.
Jorocfâc-nane, ŋoŋe wiac iŋucnere woŋec juhuc ere maio maŋfuru â bahacmâc juniŋte wawariehuc wamao jupie honec-ŋopame sâckezejec.
Âgofâc, dâŋ moc fokac mananiŋ: Nâŋere erâ numupie Wofuŋte dâŋzi fofotâc haŋ barame qâreŋ biaŋ-ticne ŋoŋerao fuawec iŋuc jaha fua razejec.
Ehuc ʒiŋuc manapaŋkeeŋgopeneŋ: Wofuŋ Jesu bâɋârewec eki nâŋe iŋuc jaha Jesuhec bâɋârec-nâporâ ŋoŋehec mâmâc erao râec-nâpoocmu.
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi huc foocmu, e kikefuŋte micne bapa hefârec-jopame fisirâ ere faio numunʒepieŋ, erâ Wofuŋte ʒâŋe muhuc wokemaŋ opâ ruacnenʒepieŋ.
“Juku jara-ticne 40 bazurâ Israe ŋic âgofâc-ticne hone manac ejareocte maŋne afeckeme rawec.
Momori jaŋe ŋic moc bafâŋgopieŋ e Judaŋic jaŋe qazo embiŋ. Eme noni e Romaŋic jâmbâŋ ere iŋuc manahuc momori jaŋehec rarâ mejeŋickonec batarambeŋ.

Dâŋ oowac sâko epie haeŋic mâmâc sasawa maŋjeŋic iŋneme kike saoŋ qajareme fisi qâture-fârerâ tutumaŋ toma-jeŋicko rafârembiŋ, ehuc Makedonia ŋic jajahec Paulo bâjâpepic, ʒâŋe-jekic Gaio â Aristako, jahe rocjofarâ fârec-jofa rambiŋ.
Ine hâcne Maŋɋaɋac â Tiŋne rune e qikiŋnehuc ʒika qaqaŋic akicke-ŋareocte mu bâuruec ecnembiŋ.
Jaŋe e manasiŋkepie maŋjeŋic ʒure bâpiaŋ ejarehuc nâŋâc enârewec sâc ijaha jaŋe ejarewec.
Irec moc e poroŋ â waiŋ nâzo murâ qanaŋ maŋticnere fuŋne hone manac ehuc bajaŋgeŋkerâ nâzejec.
Irec âgofâc-mae, ŋoŋe sanaŋkerâ qiŋ herâ domanʒepieŋ, ehuc Wofuŋ gie-ticnere dameŋ sâc henʒiriŋnehuc banʒepieŋ. Wofuŋte erâ gie bapie fârimâc mi eocmu, iŋuc manahuc banʒepieŋ.
Eme irec nore kike hata bâjâpehuc juniŋte hazec qâuŋ ŋazape mananʒepieŋ.
Eme Anuture maŋɋârâŋ dâŋbiri fua-bipieha ŋic jaŋe jaŋacne mamanazi Anuture fuŋne ʒâŋitaniŋte emâmâŋkembiŋ, irec Anutuzi maname sâckeme mitidâŋ mutucne i manarâ biaŋkenaŋte muwec.
Ŋokac ŋoŋere iŋuc jaha mupe, ŋoŋe ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere wahamicne junʒepieŋ. Eme ŋowefâc-ŋeŋic gâcne miti qiqikiŋ jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe dâŋ mi jajaza mâc rume-jarehuc maŋɋaɋac jupie
Irec nâŋe Kristore biŋe mumuzi Anuture mu baafec dâŋ ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ. Nâŋe Kristo âkehockehuc numu-ŋareeŋgopeneŋ: Anutuhec miriŋ babac enʒepieŋ.
E hâcne hâmoczi gozi kime Anutuzi gozi bacneme ɋârerâ faharewec. Hâmoczi e wemocko sakarezac.
Ehuc wâc ʒâŋe biaŋ fai-ŋeŋicko fewec e musoriŋkeeŋgopieŋ.
waiŋ opâ âmbâŋ mi nâzejec, ʒikafac aricne, urucne â wamane juzejec, moneŋ mafare mubâre mi ezejec,
â nore opâ ine gapecnehec, moc e i nâocmu, e opâre mocwâc mi hâmohuc mâc juraʒihuc juocmu. Noni opâ i ŋic moc râcnepe maŋticnao opâ ʒâŋe bâfuacneme juju sanaŋte ʒâkâŋko rahuc domaocmu.”
Moc e ine Anuture dâŋ mana rereŋ eocmu, e jâmbomac Anutu maŋjauŋ fârine ecneocmu. Iŋuc ehuc ine Anuturao qohotaeŋgopeneŋ irec fuŋne taniŋkeme mananaŋmu.
Eme no honehape oâre mickonec â qowi mimicnere mickonec â porofete burecne ere mickonec demoŋ repicne jahec â moc qaqec hawari tinac wefumbiŋ.
“Gahacnere egareekac sâc ijaha âgogere egarezejec”, sâcmutâc dâŋ neŋgocne iŋuc qâreŋkekicne fokac, i reŋkepie jâmbomac biaŋkeocmu.
Nâŋe miti muhuc nâŋe nâŋâcne dâŋ mi ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ, Jesu Kristo eki Wofuŋ â nâŋe ine Jesure erâ kiŋaŋ qaqafâc-ŋeŋic sawa juŋgopeneŋ, iŋuc ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ.
Moczi moc ba qâsoric eŋarenʒipiŋ ine¡ Kosa jujune jaŋerao qohotaocmu e eebapa biaŋne sifuckecneocmu.
Wama Anutu e lama soŋaŋ sâko Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu ʒâʒâfic fofo sanaŋ irec socte hâmockonec bârisiewec,

Mocjaha, ŋoŋe kikefuŋte maio Kristore furu Biŋebiaŋ irec sâcko junʒepieŋ. Erâ maŋ mocjaha ehuc ʒâʒâfic erâ keketeŋ domahuc Biŋebiaŋte juju gie bapie fârâ honec-ŋopazepac, me taicko juhuc biŋe-ŋeŋic manazepac.
Eme Anutuzi Wofuŋ bâɋârewec iŋuc jaha tâpiri-ticnezi nâŋâc bâɋârec-nâpozokac.
Eme no irec hâcne manasu-gararâ mupe: No menane qizecgao râepe Anutuzi jambuŋ tahacguwec i hehâroŋketec ʒocne fuazejec.
Eme fuŋne ʒiŋucte hâmokicne wâc Biŋebiaŋ jazakicne: Jaŋe ŋifec ŋic hata fokac irec sâcko sahaczi okacne roniŋte, â ŋifec Anuture hata fokac irec sâcko mârozi juniŋte.
Ŋoŋe furi-ŋeŋic rokicnere ŋic jaŋere kiŋaŋ qaqa mi enʒepieŋ.
Erâ kâroŋ wâc mi qanʒepeneŋ. Jaŋeraonec gâcnezi kâroŋ qapie sisipiric runezi sipiric-jopawec.

Nâŋe ŋic gâcnezi eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc mi eeŋgopeneŋ. Ŋic gâcne bocjahazi Anuture dâŋte manapie âbârâ gie-jeŋic eekac. Nâŋe ine maŋtaniŋ juhuc Anuture micte â Anuture maio Kristorao qohotahuc miti mueŋgopeneŋ.
Sanaŋheczi gegec dodocne âsi qataŋ ejarenʒepeneŋ, nâŋec nâŋâcnere mamanac mi junʒepeneŋ.
Erâ Wofuŋzi mana-nareme no nahac wâc mi ʒoraha ŋoŋerao fâpemu, iŋuc manakopac.
Eme no ʒâŋe firâ aŋelo 4 honec-jopapo, jaŋe mâreŋ tuturuŋne 4 ira doma rahuc mâreŋte mâŋâŋ 4 badomambiŋ. Mâreŋko me hâwecko me jâcko mâŋâŋ moc mi qaocte iŋuc embiŋ.

Juwicnao qâpuc wiac ʒiŋuc ehuc jumbiŋ: Wiac gapec tâmiric ee, sasec, opâ momori âmbâŋ nânâ, bec qowi âmbâŋ nânâ, tiwâ sisiricko nânâ, nemu burec kiŋaŋ qaqajare, wiac i hâcne ewarehuc jukupie micne qawec.
Ŋic moc e râsi ejactezo mume micjekickonec ʒoc waharâ ʒaocmu. Irec ŋic moczi râsi ejacterâ sipirickeocmu.
Mupie Paulozi ʒiŋuc muwec: “Âgo bureŋ, e taha bapa sâko jukac i mi manahuc dâŋepac. Mitio dâŋ kecʒiŋuc qâreŋkekicne: ‘Go micne bapa mi musâqorec-jopazemec. No dâŋ i manaekopac.”
Hae râpenao juniŋmu ine qâto â hafec qaŋgec bapa â sasecŋic â ʒika qaqa â nemuɋâŋ babaju erâ burec bajuhuc irec aŋac-jopaekac.

Erâ no gore manape piticne babahacnehec ekac. Gore haeo ŋic gâcne juŋgopieŋ, jaŋe Bileamte hata âteeŋgopieŋ. Bileam e Balakezi Israe bitiŋ râe-jareocte âzâcneme eki qafeŋ-jopame ɋâŋte ʒepec nâhuc sasecko sâqorembiŋ.

Âgofâc, maŋnâŋeczi jâiŋ-nâpome ŋoŋere erâ Anutu dameŋ sâc daŋge âzâcneeŋgopeneŋ. Mamanasiŋ-ŋeŋic boc fua ɋârâŋ eekac, â maŋjauŋ-ŋeŋic fua sawec eme qame qoŋgiŋ eeŋgopieŋ. Eme irec Anutu daŋge âzâcnepene i jâmbomac sâckeekac.
Ŋoŋe mârâc jaha qâpuc juhapie maŋʒoc fua-ŋarewec sâc nemuɋâŋ kâpâne jaŋerao ra qohota jumbieŋ.
Ŋowe ŋoŋe ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic maŋjauŋ ejarenʒepieŋ. Kristo e iŋuc jaha kikefuŋ-ticne maŋjauŋ ecnehuc ere due bawec.
Sâqocnere okac babazuc mi enʒepieŋ. Ŋic âgo ejareekac ijaha enʒepieŋ.
Anuture mesanaŋzi bâuruŋ-ŋopame dapenʒepieŋ. Iŋuc epie juku dameŋ-ticne maickeme ekizia bafaharec-ŋopaocmu.
Erâ qâoma mi eŋarewec, fuŋne-ticne mananiŋte âgo jauŋ eŋarehuc mume hoe ʒoaŋ sâckoa eme mâriri fuame nâ ʒeri ejumbieŋ.”
Ŋonâŋfâc-jeŋic jaŋe iŋuc jaha metâne junʒepieŋ, gupe micko âkec mi enʒepieŋ, maŋsowa juhuc wiac sasawa mu bac epie fâri fideteŋ efârezejec.
E maŋticne bârisieocte ʒâfo bacnepo, eme eki ine maŋticne bârisierâ sasec-ticne beheocte mi muekac.

Herode e dameŋ ira Tiro â Sidoŋ haeonec râsi ejarewec. Eme hae irec rune jaŋe qâturehuc fisirâ dâŋ mufâsâeniŋte ŋicwofuŋte ŋicbomboŋ, ʒâŋene Bilasto, mu bâmunaŋ ecnepie bafic-jopawec. Jaŋe wiac nareŋ gareŋ-jeŋic tâcnewecte i mocwâc ʒuhuckeniŋte iŋuc embiŋ.
Eme Jesuzi ʒiŋuc jazawec: “No demoŋzi mi enareekac, no Mamac-nane sâseekopac, ŋoŋe ine no ba jawa enareeŋgopieŋ.
Ehuc mâŋâŋ sanaŋne domame siri kâcɋene qame rambiŋ.
Sambâŋko Anutuzi eri aŋac bâfua-nâreocmu, i mâreŋko ʒâic busâqoc fokac ira sâc hepe mamakâc eocmu.
Naru motec ŋoŋe Jesu ʒâŋe-ticnere erâ sâqocne bâtâmire-ŋarekicnere dâŋ qâreŋke-ŋarekopac.
Eki hâcne bâpiaŋ-nâporâ tiridâŋ-ticnezi hefârec-nâpowec. I biaŋ-nâŋecte mâcne, e jahac maname fowecte aki anonoc-ticnere erâ iŋuc enârewec. I mârâc jaha jâmbâŋ Kristo Jesure erâ biŋe qanârekicne.
Eme taha bapa micne â ŋicfâc-jeŋic jaŋe honerâ dâŋ ɋeŋɋeŋnehec ehuc mumbiŋ: “Maripoŋko feoc, feoc.” Mupie Pilatozi micjeŋicko rorâ muwec: “No kiŋticne basakopacte ŋoŋe ŋaŋac rorâ maripoŋko qaniŋ.”
Bâbâpiaŋ i weniŋuc fuazokac, porofete jaŋe mârâc jaha iŋuc wiorâ gufu koparic ehuc jumbiŋ, ehuc ŋoŋerao aki anonoc fuaocte irec findaŋdâŋ muhuc jumbiŋ.
Manakomec, eeatuc ŋic bocjaha fuambiŋ juraŋgopieŋ, jaŋe Jesu Kristo e mâreŋ sahachec fuawec, dâŋ i mickeeŋgopieŋ. Ŋic iŋucne hâcne eeatuc ŋic â Kristore râsi ɋizec mucnezo.
Ŋic kecirec manapene boc sâqorekac, e sopa sâwec-ticnehec, Judaŋic mâreŋ sâc juraŋgopieŋ jaŋe maŋbâiŋ ejareekac, erâ Nazarete rune repicnefâc-ticne jaŋere qizec eki hâcne.

Miti-nâŋecte fuŋne qame hukicne mutaniŋkeeŋgopeneŋ i qeŋ bipinehec: E sahacko fua tâcnekicne, Mârozi fuŋne bataniŋkekicne, aŋelozi honekicne, qâpucko biŋene mukicne, mâreŋ sâc mana maŋ ekicne, eri tatamacko bafekicne.
Á sambâŋkonec hoe sanaŋ hewec, hândâŋne buse iŋucne, izi ŋic hecjopame Anutu musoriŋkembiŋ. Hoe i hâhâwicne jâmbâŋ, ima-ticnehec.
Nâŋâc ine sambâŋ ɋâricne â mâreŋ ɋâricne fuaocte biŋe qanârekicne, irec woŋec jueŋgopeneŋ, eme ira tiŋne jujuzi sâcke-fârerâ fozokac.
Á sambâŋ e ine papia bataforieeŋgopeneŋ iŋuc foforierâ sirowewec. Á tiki â nuc jaŋe ŋeŋe-jeŋic behembiŋ.
Irec Anuture micdâŋte erâ Jesu Kristo e sahac-ticnezi taha bame maŋfuru embeŋ, i arec mocjaha ekicnezi fofo sanaŋ.
Nâŋe dameŋ sâc ŋoŋere erâ Anutu daŋge âzâcneeŋgopeneŋ, erâ nunumu gie bahuc sâc ŋoŋere manasu-fâreeŋgopeneŋ.
Mume becâsic bâbâroŋ fuawec. Fainao ŋic ŋewec e mâreŋko wama bârârieme ŋic jaŋe qâqâmiziec eniŋte tâpiri râcnekicne. Erâ ʒika sâko mâmâc râcnekicne.
Kiŋaŋ qaqa juŋgopieŋ jaŋe sasawa bomboŋfâc-jeŋic sâsec-jopahuc rume-jarenʒepieŋ, Anuture ʒâŋe biŋe babawaha â miti susure fuazacte iŋuc enʒepieŋ.
Burec eec i wâc mi enʒepieŋ. Maŋraŋɋa-ŋeŋic mâsi qâqâreŋ-ticnehec heunucke behec erâ
Erâ no kecʒiŋucte gore manape bahacnehec ekac: Goki ŋokac Isebe mana qâoma ecnetec eki, no porofete ŋokac, muhuc ŋicfâc-nane dâŋ qazu-jarehuc qafeŋ-jopame sasec gie bahuc ɋâŋte ʒepec nâeŋgopieŋ.
Ŋic qâpuc jaŋe Anutu manasiŋkepie kiŋfâsâc bacjopaocmu, irec hâcne mârâc jaha manasuhuc Abrahamte Biŋebiaŋ dâŋ ʒiŋuc mume miti papiao qâreŋkembiŋ: “Qâpuc guru jaŋe gore jambuŋko raʒi-fâreniŋmu.”
Erâ dâŋ moc “ŋokâ” muŋarehuc faŋ qaŋarekicne fokac irec nikec-ŋopawec me? Dâŋ ʒiŋuc: “Ŋokâ-nane, Wofuŋzi bâtiŋgume manatec wawahane mi ezejec, â bâʒâicgume maŋge mi rokawezejec.

Micne bapafâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere dâŋ reŋkehuc sâsec-jopanʒepieŋ; jaŋe maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋic hone soŋaŋ eeŋgopieŋzi juku gie-jeŋicte fuŋne mutaniŋkeniŋmu. Irec gie-jeŋic bubiaŋko bapie sâckeocmu, busâqocko bahapie ŋoŋerao wiac sâcne mi biaŋkeocmu.
Erâ Kanaaŋ mâreŋko ŋicguru 7 bâsirowec-joparâ mume apafâc-nâŋec jaŋe mâreŋ i bâtâc barâ ru sâc erâ jumbiŋ. Ehame jara 450 tarawec.
Moc e dâŋ i âke sipurâ moc muhuc Wofuŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere dâŋbiaŋ qikiŋnehuc miti hatare sâcmutâc râpeckeekac ere ʒiŋuc muzo:
Ŋic moc e mu qaqazuc dâŋ i mi bajuekaczi iqic-ŋopazo mume fic sakarecnehuc âgo mi ecnenʒepieŋ.
Kristo e ʒâic manawec irec tofane nâŋerao ɋârâŋne fuaekac, iŋuc jaha bâbâmiriŋ-ticne ɋârâŋnea bâfua-nâreekac.
Jei, jaŋe juku wenac eniŋmu? Jaŋe Kaiŋte hata âteeŋgopieŋ, â moneŋ mafare harac ehuc Bileamte bâbâsifuc bâfuaeŋgopieŋ, â Kora pepec-ticnere sipirickewec iŋuc jaha pepec-jeŋicte sipirickeeŋgopieŋ.
Ŋic keci jaŋe ine wiac kâuc baeŋgopieŋ i kosa musua fâreeŋgopieŋ, â qowi jaŋere sâc tinac erâ mâc maŋjeŋiczi manaeŋgopieŋ ira ine sâqorerâ sipirickeeŋgopieŋ.

Noa e mamanasiŋhec juwecte Anutuzi wiac ʒâhec fuaocmu irec biŋe qanaŋ âzâcnewec. Âzâcneme araŋ bacnehuc wiacfâc-ticne ɋâricne juniŋte murâ woke bawec. Iŋuc ehuc ŋic kiŋjeŋicte fuŋne bataniŋkewec. Erâ mamanasiŋte erâ kiŋfâsâc ee irec fârine rauckewec.
Wiac iŋuc râepie fohame fic maŋne maine ira taha bapa jaŋe dameŋ sâc fec wahac ehuc gie-jeŋic bajumbieŋ.
“Râŋgeŋ qaŋqaŋne ŋoŋe, maŋ hazec-ŋeŋic mi uŋtokicne, mimiŋnefâc-ŋeŋic ejumbieŋ iŋuc jaha ŋoŋe ehuc Tiri Mâro jâpe hetapaic ecnehuc jueŋgopieŋ.
Fuŋne-ticne ine ʒiŋuc fokac: Sâcmutâc dâŋ i ŋic bahacmâc jaŋere biŋe mi ekac, ŋic sindaŋne, râŋgeŋne, araŋ bapa tâmiric, sâqocne bapa, maŋwânâŋhec, ʒaubacne, neŋgoc mamac sisipiric, ʒika qaqa,
No mârâc papia moc ʒiŋuc qâreŋke-ŋarepo: “Ŋoŋe sasecŋic jaŋehec wiac nâ nareŋ gareŋ â iiqic mi enʒepieŋ”,
Eme Anutu e qanaŋ neŋgoc bumaŋko hone wosâecnurâ uruc jauŋ-ticnere erâ hefârec-nuweczi maname sâckeme
No eebapa-nanere manape ririsi eekac. No wiac moc ezo enare-bipieme mi eekopac, â wiac sureekopac ine eekopac.
Ehuc Wofuŋ â bâbâpiaŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristo ere aki anonocko â fuŋne-ticne mana utuckehuc soka sanaŋ enʒepieŋ. E eri tatamac i ʒiŋuczia focnekac erâ juju sanaŋ dameŋko iŋuc jaha focne rahuc juzokac.
Nâŋe Kristore erâ ŋic mutucne embeŋ, ŋoŋe ine Kristorao ʒuhuckerâ mamana sâkohec embiŋ, nâŋe gegec dodocne, ŋoŋe ine sasanaŋhec, ŋoŋe fekicne, nâŋe ine waha qaqane.
Eme ŋoŋe mamanasiŋhec qiŋ herâ domahuc e hetapaickenʒepieŋ. Erâ ʒiŋuc mananʒepieŋ, âgofâc-ŋeŋic mâreŋ sâc jaŋerao ʒâic fâro ijaha fua-fârewec fokac.
Kiŋaŋ qaqa ŋoŋe mâreŋ ŋicbomboŋfâc-ŋeŋic jaŋere mic reŋke-fârenʒepieŋ, maizi qambaraŋ ejarepie ŋiczi sawa honec-ŋopapie sâckeocte mâcne, maŋsiocmâc Wofuŋ araŋ bacnehuc epie sâckeomu.
“Ʒuŋene 10 honemec i ŋicwofuŋ 10 jaha wâc, erâ jaŋe gie-jeŋic dameŋ ʒiŋuczia mi fuŋkembiŋ. Ŋicwofuŋ gie-jeŋic fuŋkerâ qowi mimicnehec dameŋ bembeŋne mac baniŋmu.
Eme nâŋe ŋickonec mâro i mi rombeŋ, nâŋe Anuturaonec miti kâdoc hone mana tarac enaŋte Anuturaonec Mâro i rombeŋ.
Ajoc, mafa mâririhec ŋoŋe ʒârâ hâriŋ fua-ŋareocmu irec qanaŋ ki mamakuc enʒepieŋ.

Go wiac ʒârâ hâriŋne mocwâc fua-gareocmu irec mi hâwicguzejec. Manakic, Sataŋ e eesâic fua-ŋareocte ŋoŋeraonec tucne kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopaocmu. Eme ŋoŋerao fific guguriŋ ʒoaŋ gie bapa 10 fuaocmu. Goki ine miti paŋʒâic jaha bajuku hâmotec juju sanaŋte eriduzi geroŋgupemu.
Anuture ŋic go wiac iŋucne geŋkezemec. Ehuc tiŋke biaŋ erâ mitihec â mamanasiŋhec â maŋjauŋhec â sasanaŋhec â buuruchec ecmurâ irec fotac qatariezemec.
Ŋoŋe mâreŋko wiac nâminʒiriŋkehuc mana aŋac embiŋ â okac dameŋ maickeha nâ areŋ embiŋ.
Erâ eri ŋeŋe sâko rârec rârec eri ŋeŋe gâcne 24 ŋerawec. Ŋeŋe irec faio ŋicqizec 24 ŋerambiŋ. Jaŋe ŋaqi qaŋqaŋ sasawa roŋembiŋ â eridu golzi-bakicne qizec-jeŋicko ŋerawec.

Ŋic ŋoŋere iŋuc jaha mupe; ŋokac e tâpirine wahakacte ŋonâŋfâc-ŋeŋic wiac mana manahuc ejarenʒepieŋ. Erâ juju sanaŋte biŋe mâmâc qajarekicnere sâsec-jopahuc junʒepieŋ. Eme nunumu-ŋeŋiczi ququŋke tâmiric qâfâsâerâ fezejec.
Ŋokaczi qaqazu gie baocte me ŋic qâhuc-jopaocte mi manacnekopac, e mâc rumerâ juzejec.
Anutu e Ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo, Wofuŋ-nâŋec hâcne, erao ʒuhuckeniŋte hefârec-ŋopaweczi mocmu mocmu-ticne mi fokac.
Âgofâc-nane, ŋoŋe niŋgiŋ tâmiric juniŋte hefârec-ŋopakicne, erâ niŋgiŋ tâmiric jujuzi âki eha sahacte dâŋ reŋkeniŋte mâcne, maŋjauŋko kiŋaŋ qaqac eniŋte irec hefârec-ŋopakicne.
Sâcmutâc dâŋ rambaŋko rârâec-nâpo izi juku fuŋne babataniŋ dameŋko rambaŋko râec-ŋopaocte wiac mana tarahuc mu bac enʒepieŋ.
mitire kiŋaŋ gie fuŋne fuŋne fokac, gie rune ine Wofuŋ mocjaha,

Á mimiŋnefâc-jeŋic jaŋe mitire fuŋqizecne jumbiŋ. Eme Kristozi ŋicsahac rohuc fuawec i jaŋere guruo fuawec. Wiac sasawa irec Wofuŋ jukac, Anutu hâcne, e mumuteŋheczi mumuteŋhec juraʒihuc juzejec sanaŋ. Jâmbomac.

Nâŋerao fific guguriŋ fuaekac, i ŋoŋerao bumâteŋ â bâbâpiaŋ fuaocte fua-nâreekac, â bâbâmiriŋ fua-nâreekac i wâc ŋoŋere erâ fua-nâreekac, ine bâbâmiriŋ izi ŋoŋerao fotâcnerâ dopec-ŋopahame fific guguriŋ nâŋerao fuaekac ijaha ŋoŋerao fuame irec ʒâic maŋuruc jaha mananiŋte.
Ŋoŋehec Kristorao râec-nâpo sanaŋkewec i Anutu eki hâcne.
Mume dâŋ harierâ ʒiŋuc fuawec: “Anutuzi muʒurekac i goki mi surec.”
Mume Jesuzi dâŋ ʒiŋuc bâtikiecnewec: “Moc e maŋjauŋ enareocmuzi dâŋnane mana rereŋ eocmu. Eme Mamac-nanezi e iŋuc jaha maŋjauŋ ecneocmu. Eme nâhe mâmâc erao fisirâ ŋeŋe juju enacmu.
Maŋjauŋte fuŋne ʒiŋuc fokac: Nâŋâc Anutu maŋjauŋ mi ecnembeŋ, ekizia nâŋâc maŋjauŋ enârehuc Ŋokâ-ticne soreme waharâ sâqocne-nâŋecte erâ kiwiric nâwoc rowec.
E jahacne tatamacko jukac iŋuc jaha wâc nâŋâc tatamacko junaŋmu, ine miriŋ babac sâcne enaŋmu, eme Ŋokâ-ticne Jesu Kristo ere soczi sâqocne-nâŋec ʒureme ɋaɋackenaŋmu.
Irec go kiŋaŋ qaqa-ticne mâcne, motec-ticne juekic. Erâ motec-ticne juhuc Anutu katucmâc-ticnere erâ merâfâc rune wâc juekic.
Ŋokâre ine ʒiŋuc mukicne: “Anutu go ŋicwofuŋ ŋeŋege i ŋeŋe sanaŋ ŋeraʒihuc juocmu, â ŋicwofuŋ gunuge i bâbâtiŋ gunu biaŋ.
Eme Judaŋic jaŋe micnao rorâ ʒiŋuc âzâcnembiŋ: “Gie biaŋne baekic irec mâcne, go ŋic jaha juekiczi Anutu âkehockehuc gahacnere Anutu muekic, irec qânâzi hecguzo muŋgopeneŋ.”

Eme ʒoczi ŋic iŋucne ʒâfitac-jopame irec hosâcne ŋezume ŋezu fehuc foocmu sanaŋ. Irec ŋic qowi mimicne â hawari-ticne dieŋzi hecnembiŋ jaŋe mecne, â ʒâŋe qâreŋ-ticne bajumbiŋ jaŋe mâmâc ʒâiczi mi behec-jopame ŋeŋe mana tâmiric ŋafe furec ʒuʒuhuc jaha mana rahuc juniŋmu.”
Wofuŋ e buafec-ticnere gie iŋucne munârewecte mi pârâweeŋgopeneŋ.
Irec nâŋâc hâbi-nâŋec rohuc ʒiŋuc munʒepeneŋ: “Wofuŋ e ŋeŋezic-nane, no mi hâwicnuzejec; ŋic jaŋe wemo enareniŋmu?”
Irec wiac kosa nâocmuzi âgo-ticne nâ bâtâc eekac ere maname wawahane mi ezejec, â nâ bâtâc eocmuzi âgo-ticne wiac kosa nâekac ere maname mi sâqorezejec. E Anuture ŋic jaha wâc.
Anutu e babasanaŋ â bâbaafec runezi eŋareme Jesu Kristore sâko maŋ mamanasu mocjaha erâ junʒepieŋ.

E taha bapa raŋɋane jaŋe iŋucne mâcne, e sindaŋ tâmiriczi wemocko ʒoaŋne ʒoaŋne qanaŋ e jahacne sindaŋte erâ taha bâzi rikerâ ʒâhec ŋic jaŋere rikezac, e jahacne maŋ sahac i taha bâzi-nâŋec mocjaha hâcne râeme tarawec.
Ŋic moc e nânâ mafa mâriri-ticne fohame âgo-ticne waha qaqane jume hone takirerâ bune bofackeocmu, ere muzo, maŋticnao Anuture maŋjauŋ mi fokac.
Erâ sifu mana afeckeeŋgopeneŋ. Ehuc sahachec mâreŋ jabao juju i beherâ mame sâko hae-nâŋecko Wofuŋhec juju irec aŋac-nâpoekac.
Âgo biaŋfâc-nane, no ŋazape mananiŋ, ŋoŋe mâreŋko jaba â ŋicmanac jueŋgopieŋzi sasec, maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋicte râsi hâcne, i getâckenʒepieŋ.
Ŋoŋe ŋic ʒeŋgoma sâsec-jopanʒepieŋ, âgofâc-ŋeŋic maŋjauŋ ejarenʒepieŋ, Anutu araŋ bacnenʒepieŋ, ŋicwofuŋ sâsenʒepieŋ.
Ehuc muwec, no âgofâc-nane Faraore meonec batarac-jopapemurâ Anutuzi gie bakac i mana taraniŋmu. Eme jaŋe ine mi mana tarambiŋ.
Ŋoŋe qâto jaŋere rucsoŋaŋ junʒepieŋ, miti gie bapa bâbâsifucne, sahac hehetâc ŋic jaŋere rucsoŋaŋ hâcne junʒepieŋ.
Jaŋe, Anuture fuŋne manaeŋgopeneŋ, miczi iŋuc muhapie eebapa-jeŋiczi ine mickeekac. Jaŋe ŋic mamakâcne â dâŋ qaqatara, â gie biaŋne moc bapanere sâc mâcne.
Jaŋe Anutu kiŋaŋ qacneniŋte ʒoɋac ehuc jueŋgopieŋ i honeekopaczi mukopac. Erâ i hatane kâuc bahuc eeŋgopieŋ.
Ehuc ʒârâ hâriŋ fuŋne fuŋne enâreme bâmiriŋ-nâpoekac. Eme Anutuzi bâmiriŋ-nâpoekac, bâbâmiriŋ izia nâŋe iŋuc jaha âgo gâcne ʒârâ hâriŋ fuŋne fuŋne maŋnao juhapie sâcne bâmiriŋ-jopanaŋmu.
Anutuzi mana-gareme sâckeocte ʒoɋachec juhuc giege bazemec, ehuc dâŋ fâri qizecne fâretiŋ jaha mujaŋgeŋkehuc jutec mimizi gieŋic gore faio mi fezejec.
Eme ʒâŋene Anutu me miti wiac mueŋgopieŋ i sasawa râsi ecnehuc qâhuckerâ ro waha âte ecne-fâreocmu. Erâ Anuture ufuŋko ferâ ŋehuc e jahacnere muocmu, “No Anutu.”
Mamac ŋoŋe naru motecfâc-ŋeŋic aaric bâfuanʒipiŋte wiac kosa mi ejarenʒepieŋ. Ŋoŋe mitio jaza bâtiŋ â uŋ sawaŋ ejarehuc soŋaŋ-jopahapie sokanʒepieŋ.
Erâ wiac iŋucnezi mi bâdoc-nâpoocmu, aricne, Jesure uruc jauŋko âtesiŋnehuc sasanaŋ fekicne bâfuarâ domaeŋgopeneŋ.
Eme nâŋe mâreŋko rândiŋke qarâ fohuc dâŋ wiwira moc Judadâŋko ʒiŋuc manambeŋ: ‘Saulo, Saulo, go wemocte nu jâpec enarehuc juekic? Go ʒârâ hewâcnetec âkecgume ʒâic manacmu.
Go fific guguriŋ faio qafec qawahac juekic, i manakopac. Erâ go mâririgehec. Á Judaŋic gâcnezi dâŋ gâgâpâcne gazaeŋgopieŋ, i wâc manakopac. Erâ jaŋe Judaŋic jâmbâŋ mâcne, jaŋe Sataŋte ŋicfâc.
sâqocnezi haŋ bame busâqoc manaocmu, â mitizi haŋ bame bubiaŋ manaocmu;
Irec ŋoŋe maŋwânâŋ â râŋgeŋ bârâŋgeŋ hetararâ urucko juhuc maŋŋeŋicko mitidâŋ râekicne i âgo ecnenʒepieŋ. Izi hâcne maŋ qâqâtâc-nâŋec bâpiaŋkeocte tâpiri focnekac.
No he sarac epo, Apolo e hofâ gie bawec, â Wofuŋzi ine jambuŋkeme fârine fuawec.
Iŋuc murâ rame râpefuŋnao aŋelo moczi warerâ ʒiŋuc wirawec: “Babe hae sâko tâtiekac, tâtie-jâmbâŋkekac, hae irec rune mâreŋ sâc ŋicne sasecte waiŋ opâ momori gumec-jopahuc jumbiŋ hâcne.”
Gie muŋareekopac i bapie honec-ŋopape âgofâc-nane eniŋmu.
Naru motecfâc-mae, wofuŋ jawane jaŋere rucgereŋ-ŋeŋic banʒepieŋ.
Ŋic mukopac jaŋeraonec tucnezi kamierâ ficbiri juhuc ŋokac kosane, bahac fuŋne fuŋne bâfuambiŋ â saseczi ejareme ra qa ware qa eeŋgopieŋ, iŋucnezi jaŋere eniŋte mu bâdoc ejareeŋgopieŋ;
Aricne, nâŋâc dâŋfâri paŋʒâic bajupene maŋjauŋ-nâŋeczi fua sawec ehame qizec-nâŋec Kristo erao ʒuhucke sanaŋkenʒepeneŋ.
Erâ Mâro e wamare muczi qâzuc-ŋoparâ dâtâc-ŋopawec, i qâtâcnenʒipiŋte ruc babac ehuc junʒepieŋ.
Mume Saulozi wiohuc muwec, “Wofuŋ go mo?” Eme muwec, “Nu jâpec enarehuc juekic Jesu no hâcne.
Maŋŋeŋic ba emasaŋ epie Kristo e tiri Wofuŋ juŋarezejec. Erâ maŋzi wiac worickehuc jueŋgopieŋ irec mu indiŋ eŋarepie afeckerâ fuŋne mutaniŋkenʒepieŋ.
Domame Wofuŋzi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: ‘Mâreŋ âtekomec i tiri mâreŋ, irec kikehuhuge heunuckec.
Fuŋnaonecteaŋ mitidâŋ mana warehuc jumbiŋ i hâcne maŋke junʒepieŋ. Mitidâŋ i maŋke jupie Ŋokâ â Mamac jahe iŋuc jaha maŋŋopahuc junicmu.
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape mananiŋ: Moc e nore dâŋ bajuocmuzi hâmoc moc mi maicke-jâmbâŋkeocmu.”
Eme no eri ŋeŋe kâcɋene qaŋqaŋ moc honepo. Fainao ŋewec ere maionec sambâŋ â mâreŋ wise tâmirepic.
Nânâ qowizi hobure biŋe â hobuzi nânâ qowire biŋe. Juku Anutuzi e â e mâmâc imac-jofame arictac enicmu. Sahaczi ine sasecte biŋe mâcne, i Wofuŋte biŋe, Wofuŋ e sahacte ru.
Eme ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha ŋaŋacnere manapie sâqocne hâmocnembiŋ ehuc Jesu Kristo ehec Anutu jucneŋgopieŋ ezejec.
Opoŋ, Anutu e Kristore gieŋicfâc-ticne nâŋe saoreŋ qahuc bataniŋ-nâpoekac, ehuc enâreme miti-ticnere âsu aŋac biaŋ bâiŋnepene ŋezurâ mâreŋ sâc raekac, irec mumuteŋ sâko ecnezo.
Dâŋ biŋe Jesuraonec kecʒiŋuc manambeŋte ŋazaeŋgopeneŋ: Anutu e tatamac, dapâc i erao moc mi fohuŋgaŋkekac.
Mamaczi nareekac i jaŋe norao fisi-fâreniŋmu, â norao fisiocmu e mi bâsuepemu.
Qoqomâzi jauŋ babac eeŋgopieŋ i ŋoŋerao mi wahazejec.
Irec ere ŋesiŋko Anutu maickeeŋgopieŋ jaŋe sâcne bâbâpiaŋko râe basanaŋ ejareekac, e juju sanaŋ jukaczi hâcne dameŋ sâc roroŋ sasape ejareekac.

Mume jaŋe owa ruruckerâ mumbiŋ: “E arictac eoc, e arictac eoc, maripoŋko feoc.” Eme Pilatozi muwec: “Hâc, eme ŋicwofuŋ-ŋeŋic mupe maripoŋko hâmoocte muŋgopieŋ me?” Mume taha bapa micne jaŋe dâŋ ʒiŋuc bâtikiecnembiŋ: “Nâŋe ŋicwofuŋ-nâŋec moc aricne, Sisa mocjahazi junarekac.”
Eme dameŋ ʒi iŋuc jaha Anutuzi aki anonoc-ticnere erâ ŋic tiwâne rowosâec-jopawec juŋgopieŋ.
Mâreŋne mâreŋne ŋic jaŋe ehec sasec eec eeŋgopieŋ â mâreŋ sâc ŋicwofuŋ jaŋe eraonec hâcne sasec-ticnere waiŋ opâ nârâ maŋsifuc ejareekac.”
Ŋoŋe ââgo fârine junʒepieŋ, erâ sâsâsec eniŋte sisiric efârenʒepieŋ.
Anuture Mârozi de âsic ejareha jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe hâcne Anuture naru motecfâc.
E iŋuc ehuc domahame mâsi qâreŋ moc sambâŋkoa fuawec. Ine oâ sâko moc fowec, hawarine bâbâroŋ jâmbâŋ, qizecne 7 â ʒuŋene 10, â qizec-ticne sâc ŋicwofuŋ du jaha ŋerawec.
Naru motecfâcne juŋgopeneŋzi Anuture huhure wâc rauckenaŋmu, Kristohec mâmâc wirec rauckenaŋmu. Ʒira mâreŋko ehec ʒârâ hâriŋ faio junaŋmuo ehec eri tatamac biaŋko mâmâc jaha junaŋmu.
Soŋaŋzi gie-jeŋic bapie biaŋkeme wiac bafehuc ehâmo-jarezo, ine miti mumu â qaqazu gie paŋʒâic baeŋgopieŋ jaŋe hâcne iŋuc ejarezo.
Ŋic gâcne jaŋe ine fuŋne iŋuc sâcne mi mana-hâmoŋgopieŋ. Eme iŋucnezi nemu e wiac fârine muwarehuc juku maŋjeŋic ewecte tiwâ ʒepec e araŋ bacnehuc manabâcko nâpie maŋjeŋic hegâpâreekac.
Tieŋne moc norao foipiehuc fârinehec mi eme qâtâcne behec eocmu, â tieŋne moc fârinehec fome gie bacneme soka biaŋ eocte soŋaŋkeocmu.
Erâ wâc ŋicbomboŋ ejarehuc mâcne, lama micne bajarehuc miti hata bânie-jarenʒepieŋ.
Âgofâc, ŋoŋe hâmokicne jaŋere kâuc bârâ, miti tâmiriczi maŋjeŋic ʒickeme ki mamakuc eeŋgopieŋ iŋuc enʒipiŋte ŋazapene mananiŋ:
Eme Israe ŋic jaŋe mamanasiŋhec jumbiŋte Hâwec Bâbâroŋko tiŋko rara tinac rahuc fotâcnembiŋ. Aigita ŋic jaŋe i jaha ezo mupie hâweczi ɋâcjopawec.
Dameŋ ira hâcne Mose fuawec. Motec e Anutuzi honeme biaŋne jâmbâŋ ewec. Eme mamac-ticnere ficko soŋsoŋ barâ juhapie mosa jahec â moc ewec.
Taha bapa iŋucne e jahac ŋic dodocne jukacte ŋic mutucne â qâsoriekicne sâcne urucne ejareekac.
Ŋafe tarazo ekacte hae fureocte furic râekac. Irec dapâcte wiac hetararâ tatamackonec sându maro menâŋecko raʒizejec.

Erâ ŋicbomboŋ ŋoŋe kiŋaŋ qaqafâc-ŋeŋic iŋuc jaha ehâmo-jarenʒepieŋ, ehuc mu imac mi ejarenʒepieŋ. Erâ ʒiŋuc mananʒepieŋ: Kiŋaŋ qaqa â ŋicbomboŋ ine sambâŋko Wofuŋ wirec-ŋeŋic jukac, e ra rowec ware rowec mi focnekac.
Bubiaŋ eniŋmu jaŋe qâtec-joparâ bubiaŋ enʒepieŋ, kioniŋmu jaŋe qâtec-joparâ kionʒepieŋ.
Go maŋsanaŋ erâ maŋge mi bârisiehuc ʒocfiki bafeku seroŋ batec ʒoc ʒaza dameŋko Anuture mumutara dâŋ fârine fua taniŋkeme ʒâhâmocguocmu.
Eme ira juhapire Antiokia haeonec â Ikonioŋ haeonec Judaŋic fisirâ ŋic mu bâdoc ejarepie babafic erâ Paulo qânâzi hembiŋ. Erâ hâmokac muhuc hae râpeo fâre rambiŋ.
Jesu e dâŋ iŋuc murâ bu ʒaʒamaŋne fâuckezo eme mutaniŋkerâ ʒiŋuc jazawec: “No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ mupe mananiŋ, ŋoŋeraonec moczi no doc bacnuocmu.”
Ŋic mâmâc sasawa sâqocnere niŋgiŋko jueŋgopeneŋ, fuŋne-nâŋec iŋuc hâcne miti papiao mufuakicne. Eme irec hâcne Jesu Kristo manasiŋkehuc mitihec erâ biŋedâŋte fârine ronaŋmu, i sawa fokac.
Eme miti mumutaniŋ dameŋ-jekic tarame hârâckonec qowi mimicnezi wefurâ râsi ejacterâ jofame hâmonicmu.
Nâŋâc Kristore miti kâdoc babaju, ine fuŋkehuc manasiŋkembeŋ mamanasiŋ i paŋnea bajuku mao fisinaŋmuzi eŋgopeneŋ.
Kristozi maŋŋeŋicko jukacko sahac-ŋeŋiczi sâqocnere erâ hâmoc ruckekac, â maŋ qâqâtâc-ŋeŋiczi ine kiŋfâsâc bacŋopakicnere juju ruckekac.
Mimiŋnefâc-ŋeŋic jaŋe mo porofete mo akickembiŋ me? Aricne, tiŋne rune fuaocte findaŋdâŋ mumbiŋ ŋic i jaŋe wâc mâmâc jopambiŋ. Juku e jahacne doc bahuc qaqa, ine ŋoŋe hâcne embiŋ.
mu kâroŋ, opâ momori me bec qowi âmbâŋ nânâ, erâ wiac gâcne. Wiac iŋucnere mârâc jaha ŋazapo erâ ʒi mocwâc ŋazape: Sâqocne i baniŋmuzi Anuture uucmaŋko mi raʒiniŋmu.
Irec ʒoctamac foŋarehame maŋzi sakarehuc kikefuŋfâc-ticne enʒepieŋ.” Jesu e dâŋ iŋuc murâ ra soŋsoŋko juwec.
Eki gie runere mume rereŋ juwec, Mosezi Anuture ficko juwec irec sâc juwec hâcne.
E bâbâpiaŋ-nâŋec Jesu Kristore erâ Tiri Mâro afecne mi qoŋgiŋke-nârewec.
Eme ŋic moc juwec ʒâŋene Josefe, aposolo jaŋe ʒâŋene moc Banaba mumbiŋ, nâŋâcne dâŋko Bâmiriŋmotec, e Lewire ɋâric, Kipiro nucko fuawec.
Wiac biaŋne i rorokac tâmiric enʒepeneŋ, eme mi betaŋkenaŋmuo juku dameŋ-ticnao mâriri bâfuanaŋmu.
Á sâcmutâc dâŋzi nume hâmocnepo i Anutu jucnepemurâ epo.
Eme moczi gunusâc narehuc ʒiŋuc nazawec: “Go fahare Anuture ufuŋ â alata sâc barâ maŋnao numuhuc jueŋgopieŋ jaŋe wosec-jopazemec.
Jaŋe hâcne ŋokacko mi sâqorehuc maŋɋaɋac jaha jumbiŋ; jaŋe hâcne Lama jume ju ecneeŋgopieŋ; jaŋe hâcne mâreŋŋic gâcne jaŋeraonec Anuture â Lamare qaqasune bâbâni rocjopakicne.
Ɋirikiŋ jaŋe ine becâsic hawari, momori jaŋe ʒikao raniŋte becâsic wiac bâmocke-jareeŋgopieŋ hawari iŋucne hâcne. Qizec-jeŋicko du golzi bakicne tinac ŋewec, ʒâŋe mai-jeŋic ŋic ʒâŋe mai tinac.
Ŋoŋe goroŋ-ŋopakicnere rambaŋ juŋgopieŋ, erâ juju izi sâqocnere tapa mi ezejec, rambaŋ juhuc Anuture kiŋaŋ qanʒepieŋ.

Irec fârine hâcne ronaŋte gie amec fâfâuc baeŋgopeneŋ, ine mumusoriŋzi fai-nâŋecko feipieha Anutu jujune ere mamanacko juhuc eeŋgopeneŋ. E hâcne mâreŋ sâc ŋic jaŋere bâbâpiaŋ juekaczi mamana hec nâŋâcne ejâmbâŋkeekac.
Eme ŋic moc e Anuture Ŋokâ ro waha âte ecnehuc, ʒâʒâficte soc ruarâ maŋfuru ewec i mana suahuc aki anonoc rune Mâro musoriŋkeocmu, e okacne mo iŋucne fisicneocmu muŋgopieŋ?
Eme harierâ jazawec: “Wama ŋoŋerao fozejec. Mamaczi no sorecnuwec iŋuc jaha noni ŋoŋe sorec-ŋopakopac.”
Ŋic izi mu qâtimbucne, isoc qaisocne, sasec fuŋne fuŋnere heʒâkiriŋkerâ jujune, pepecdâŋ mumune, ŋic moneŋ mafare mu bâmiriŋ eejarene, iŋuc hâcne jueŋgopieŋ.

Wiac iŋucne fuame mâreŋ sâc ŋicwofuŋ â ŋicbomboŋ, erâ momori micnefâc-jeŋic â mafa mâririhec â tâpirihec, ŋic fekicne â wahakicne mâmâc sasawa mâreŋ â qânâ hawecko soŋkerâ tiki â hârâc wâsic-jopahuc ʒiŋuc mumbiŋ:

Hâwic bâroŋ â miti qiqikiŋ â wâwânâŋhec â ʒika qaqa â sasecŋic â hafec qaŋgec ŋic â nemuɋâî babaju â siocdâŋ babaju sasawa, ŋic i jaŋere ŋeŋe lambe opâre riqiczi ʒoc ʒahuc foekac ira mukicne. Izi hâmoc namba tu.”
Eme ʒi weniŋuc mâc jutec ʒoraocmu? Go faharerâ Jesure ʒâŋe riwasecketec Miti Opâ rua-garepe sâqocnege tâmirezejec.’
Kanʒaŋ-jeŋic ʒoricne, ŋokac qizec gere-jeŋicte sâc. Micjeŋic laioŋte mic iŋucne.
Wofuŋte kiŋaŋŋiczi mu hehefaric mi ezejec, e ŋic sasawa âgo ejarehuc miti micafec qazu-jarezejec, â pepecne ecnepie wiac aaricko mi ejarezejec;
No sahac-nanezi wiwicko juekopac, maŋnanezi ine ŋoŋehec juhuc ŋoŋe Kristo manasiŋkehuc ʒiʒimic erâ sosoŋaŋko domapie honec-ŋoparâ bunane biaŋkekac.
Wofuŋ e ŋic tiŋne jaŋerao ʒâŋe fihuc mu wâwâsic-jeŋicte hazec râeekac, sâqocne bapa jaŋe ine Wofuŋzi hone qikiŋ ejareekac.”
Âgofâc-nâŋec, Wofuŋte jorocfâc, ŋoŋe Mârozi baɋaɋac-ŋopame dâŋ fâri qizecnao qohotahuc biaŋkeniŋte Anutuzi mârâc jaha rowosâec-ŋopawec, irec daŋge hati âzâcnenaŋte maŋnâŋeczi jâiŋ-nâpoekac.
Irec sâqocne bapa e sâqocne bazo murâ bazejec, â maŋwânâŋheczi maŋwânâŋhec juzo murâ juzejec, â mitio juekaczi ine mitioa juzejec, â maŋfuru juekaczi maŋfuru jaha juzejec.”
Mupie Petorozi ʒiŋuc jazawec: “Ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic bârisierâ Jesu Kristo ʒâŋene biŋeckehuc Miti Opâ ruapie sâqocne-ŋeŋic tâmirezejec, eme Anutuzi Tiri Mâro tahacke-ŋareocmu wâc.
Sâqocnere okac babazuc enʒipiŋte sosoŋaŋ enʒepieŋ. Ŋaŋackoaŋ â ŋic gâcne sasawa jaŋehec eehâmoc erâ erahuc junʒepieŋ.
Á ŋic jaŋe iŋuc jaha ŋowe ŋonâŋ juju qikiŋnerâ maŋjeŋicko sasecte ʒocsâko ʒame jaŋe jaŋackoaŋ mamakâc fuŋmoc bâfuambiŋ. Erâ bâbâsifuc-jeŋicte okacne maŋ sahac sisipiric rombiŋ.
Á ŋoŋe iŋuc jaha ʒeri ehuc nohec bubiaŋ mananʒepieŋ.
Irec ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic bârisierâ juju raŋɋa-ŋeŋic râpeckepie kiŋŋeŋic tâmirezejec. Eme Wofuŋte maio nanaŋ ʒurec ʒurec juju irec dameŋ maicke-ŋarezejec.
Hae i moc mi ŋafeocmu, irec sac motâcne i ʒoaŋkore aaŋ sasawa doma-fâreocmu.
Moc e nore biuc â soc nâocmuzi juju sanaŋhec eocmu, eme noni dameŋ sâkoo bâɋârezokopac.
Eme Jesuzi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Mâc muzac go nore dâŋ wemocko munʒaŋ, nore dâŋ mumure faicnec tâpiri qikiŋne-ŋarekicnere mukomec hâcne. Irec gorao râecnukac ŋic ere kiŋzi gore jâurukac.”
Irec mamanasiŋ bucticne, fârine eehâmo gie mi fuaocmuo, hâmo mâteŋ ekicne muzo.

Sâcmutâc dâŋ e maŋraŋɋa-nâŋeczi tâpirine bawahame nâŋâcnao gie bâipiewec. Irec Anutu e ʒiŋuc ehuc maŋraŋɋa sâqocne-ticnere tâpiri qame wahawec: Ŋokâ-ticne soreme sâqocne bapa nâŋâcne sahac hawari rorâ sâqocnere due bawec.
Me juju bapa tiŋnere erâ fific guguriŋ faio feniŋmu, ine manapie bubiaŋnehec ezejec. Ʒika hâhâwic eŋarepie ɋarac ɋarac mi qanʒepieŋ â hâbi gogoroŋ mi enʒepieŋ.
Mamac ŋoŋe naru motecfâc-ŋeŋic hâwic sahac enʒipiŋte aaricko wiac mi ejarenʒepieŋ.
Burecŋic i more muzo? Jesu e Kristo aricne, ŋic moczi iŋuc mume ere burecŋic muzo. Mamac â Ŋokâ mic bacjofaocmu, ŋic ere muzo, e Kristore râsi qizec.
Irec moc e poroŋ â Wofuŋte waiŋ i enʒaŋauc ecnehuc nâocmu, e Wofuŋ fâri â socticne nâsifuckeme kiŋnehec eocmu.
Ŋic maŋtac go mamanasiŋ eehâmo gie tâmiriczi wiac jawane ekac irec fuŋne ʒi manac.
Eme ira hâcne juhapie Judazi kiaraonec momori erâ taha bapa micne â farisaio ŋic jaŋeraonec motec rocjopame waha lambe â ʒika barâ rambiŋ.
Wofuŋzi ine mume sasanaŋ, irec hume keteŋ eŋarehuc sâqocne runere roroŋ sasapec eŋareocmu.
Eku behepie Farao otâ-ticnezi bâfuarâ motec bawec.
Aŋelo e iŋuc erâ alataonec ʒoc kine rorâ râqâc-ticne bâfuserâ mâreŋko hoŋkeme huwec. Hume ɋuŋ parandaŋ â bâbâric â homeŋ fuawec.
Eme iŋuc epore Judaŋic jaŋe taha ufuŋko rocnurâ qâhâmocnuzo embiŋ.
Ehuc mitidâŋ fârine râpeckerâ nemu binaŋko qohotaniŋmu.
Eme ŋoŋeraonec tucnezi ine mana maŋ mi eeŋgopieŋ.” Jesu e miti-ticne qikiŋneniŋmu jaŋe mârâcko mana tarac-jopawec, â doc baocmu e mâmâc mana tarawec, irec dâŋ iŋuc jazawec.
Eme Jesuzi muwec, “Poroŋ sicko âke uruckerâ râcnepe nâocmu ere hâcne mukopac.” Iŋuc murâ poroŋ sicko âke uruckerâ Simoŋ ŋokâ-ticne Juda, Karioto haeonec, e râcneme nâwec.
O Timoteo, go merâfâc garekicne i soŋaŋkehuc bajuzemec. Erâ dâŋ jawane â fârimâc, ŋic gâcnezi bajuhuc ʒâŋene “dâŋ qame hukicne” mueŋgopieŋ, i qikiŋnezemec.

Eme ŋic bocjahazi miti manapie Judaŋic jaŋe mana sâqorerâ ŋic otec ɋeticne â râŋgeŋne henusuc-joparâ mu ojowa sâko erâ Jasoŋte ficko Paulo â Sila ŋepicko tumaŋne-fârembiŋ. Tumaŋne-fârerâ ŋicjahec hâcne rocjofarâ ŋichofao râec-jofazo mumbiŋ.

Ŋic moc e âgo-ticnezi sâqocne bame honeocmu, sâqocne hârâcte niŋgiŋ sanaŋ-ticnehec i mâcne, ine honerâ ere erâ numume Anutuzi juju hatao râeocmu, ine sâqocne hârâcte niŋgiŋ sanaŋ-ticnehec mi baniŋmu jaŋe iŋuc ejareocmu. Sâqocne hârâcte niŋgiŋ sanaŋ-ticnehec i fokac wâc. Iŋucnere nunumu gie baocte mi mukopac.
No jâmbomac jâmbâŋ ŋazape, moc e gie muŋarekicne ŋoŋe hezu hewâneŋ eŋareocmuzi gie rune no hezu hewâneŋ enareocmu, â moc e no enareocmuzi sorecnuwec e hezu hewâneŋ ecneocmu.”
Nâŋâc uucmaŋ moc qiriŋmâc fofo sanaŋ rauckenaŋmu, irec Anutu mucne bacnenʒepeneŋ, ehuc rumerâ araŋ bacnehuc, jahac maname biaŋkeekac irec sâcko kiŋaŋ qacnenʒepeneŋ.

Ehame Judaŋic riuc bapa gâcne mâreŋ râreckehuc domambiŋ jaŋe penaroŋ erâ Wofuŋ Jesure ʒâŋezi riuc ripa-jeŋic eocte manasuhuc ŋic demoŋhec ʒiŋuc jazambiŋ: “Jesu ʒâŋe biŋe-ticne Paulozi muekac ere micte wisezemec.”
Paulo e ine Sila rowosâeme opâ ruac jaŋe Wofuŋte jauŋko ŋec-jofahuc mâzoc-jofapie rapic.
Gie bapene ŋoŋerao fârine fuawec, i sifucke-ŋarezacte soŋaŋ babac ehuc junʒepieŋ. Eme juku fârine ŋemâcne ronʒepieŋ.

Ŋic jahe hoere motâc henicte tâpiri jactekicne, irec mupire hoe mi hehe mâc fohame findaŋdâŋ muhuc junicmu. Erâ mupire opâzi soc eocte irec tâpiri fojacteocmu, erâ mâreŋko wiac micne momori fuaocte mupire sâc fuaocmu.
Anutuzi maŋsiocge honekacte tâpiri ʒizi moc mi hehuŋgaŋguhame mâc jâmbâŋ jucmu.
Nore biŋezi gore biŋe â gore biŋezi nore biŋe. Eme maŋjeŋicko huriri qâreŋ-nane fuawec fokac.
Jaŋe qâsoriekicne sasawa, ʒeŋgoma repirembiŋ; moczi moc wiac biaŋne mi eekac, arictac jâmbâŋ.
Ŋoŋe hehefaricko â sahac mumuteŋko wiac mi enʒepieŋ, moc e jahacne maŋ bawahahuc âgofâcne jaŋere maname fezejec.
Lambe ŋondeŋko moc domame honepo, e hawarine ŋic hawari tinac. Ŋaqi-ticne ʒoricne waha domawec, â amecnao umbika golzi bakicne fowec.
Hae ira wiac sâwechec mi foocmu. Anutu â Lama ere ŋeŋe hae ira hâcne fuame ŋicfâc-ticne jaŋe kiŋaŋ qacnehuc juniŋmu.
Wiac sasawa irec dameŋ bembeŋkekac. Irec ŋoŋe maŋsowa â pectâc juhuc nunumure afeckenʒepieŋ.
Ira hurâ wokeo ferâ raku Antiokia haeo fisipic. Hae ira hâcne opâ ruac jaŋe Wofuŋte jauŋko râec-jofahuc gie mujactepie fuŋkerâ barapic.
Me ŋokac rozo murâ rotec wâc mi sâqoreocmu, â naru ʒeŋoŋ moczi ŋic rome wâc mi sâqoreocmu. Erâ iŋucnezi sahackopec wiacte hume serereŋ juniŋmu. No ine i tâmiric mac juniŋte enareha mukopac.

Ŋoŋe manaŋgopieŋ, nâŋâc râsi sahac biuchec jaŋehec ʒika qaqa mi eeŋgopeneŋ, aricne, ŋicbomboŋ sâko â momori sanaŋ, dameŋ ʒi dapâc fokac irec guriŋ bapa, demoŋ sâqocne sambâŋ rurumaŋko jueŋgopieŋ, jaŋe râsi enâreeŋgopieŋ.
Ŋoŋeraonec moczi maŋɋârâŋ basarâ Anutu numucnezejec. Eme e ŋic sasawa, dâŋ mi munârehuc, wiac maŋhumuc nâreekaczi bâfuacneocmu.
Mârore ʒoc mi hehâponʒepieŋ.
Mitire qoruc boze hâcne kecʒiŋuc bambiŋ: Maŋne moc maine, ʒâŋene Furufic mukicne, ira kendo kikenehec domawec erâ tebo ŋewec fainao poroŋ furu mukicne i fowec.
Irec go gazape manac: Go noraonec ʒuŋe kizukicne furine barâ boreŋhec ezemec, â ŋaqi qaŋqaŋ furine barâ hetec huŋ mimige sâockezejec, erâ ʒâŋere wokemaŋ furine barâ ʒâŋege ruacnerâ fiɋaɋackezemec.
No dâŋ i ŋoŋe kecʒiŋuc mananiŋte qâreŋke-ŋarekopac: Anutu Ŋokâ-ticne manasiŋkeeŋgopieŋ ŋoŋe juju sanaŋ foŋarekac.
Moc e jahacnaonec manasurâ muocmu, e sahac mumuteŋte hata âteocmu, â moc e gie runere mumuteŋ fuaocte gie baocmu, ere ine sahac fefe tâmiric siocmâc jukac muzo.
Tâpiri ʒâkâŋ i nâŋerao mâcne, Anuturao fokac, irec fuŋne taniŋkeocte boreŋ ʒeŋaŋ-ticne kuʒi mâreŋzi bakicne nâŋerao duckekicne.
Âgofâc, kiŋŋeŋic ŋaŋac mi batarahuc Wofuŋ kimbeŋ-ticnere biŋe râepie fozejec. Dâŋ ʒiŋuc hâcne qâreŋkekicne fokac: “Kiŋ babatara i nore gie, â okacne babazu i no nahac epemu, Wofuŋ e iŋuc mukac.”
Mupie Jesuzi ʒiŋuc jazawec: “No nahac sahac-nane bafepe mi sâckeocmu. Mamac-nane jukac, e Anutu-nâŋec mucneeŋgopieŋ, eki ine muafecnuekac.
Go nânâre erâ Anuture gie ima mi qazemec. Nânâ qowi i biaŋne sasawa, moc e ine, nârâ maŋbâiŋ gie bapemu, iŋuc manahuc sifu nâme sâqorecneocmu.
Jesure qâŋɋâŋ ruacnerâ qoruc qaŋqaŋzi râpâckepic. Judaŋic jaŋe qâŋɋâŋfâc-jeŋic iŋuc hâcne ejare jumbieŋ.
Ŋoŋe âgofâc-ŋeŋic kâpâcwâru ficko fepie jaŋere erâ buheric fua-ŋarewec, â moneŋ mafa ŋowac ropie ine mafa fârine fofone fonârekac muhuc manapie bubiaŋnehec ewec.
Eme Dawidi ɋâricfâc-ticne jaŋeraonec Israe ŋic nâŋâcne bâbâpiaŋ moc fuaocte biŋedâŋ mukicne i fârinehec eocte Anutuzi mume Jesu hâcne fuawec.
Irec dâŋqâreŋ fokac ine ʒiŋuc: “Ʒâŋezi mi honekicne â hazeczi mi manakicne, â ŋicmaŋ moczi moc mi manasukicne, Anutuzi maŋjauŋ ecneeŋgopieŋ jaŋere biŋe bâmockewec i hâcne.”
Eme Jesu hâmockonec bâɋârewec Anutu hâcne, ere Mârozi maŋŋeŋicko ŋeŋe juju ekacko, Kristo Jesu hâmockonec bâɋâreweczi maŋŋeŋicko Mâro-ticne jukac ere erâ sahac-ŋeŋic hâmocne i iŋuc jaha bâɋâreocmu.
Nâŋâc Anuture naru motecfâc jueŋgopeneŋ, dâŋ i Mârozi maŋnâŋecko musokame manaeŋgopeneŋ.
Anutu mu qâtimbuc ecnepie mâc foocmu, iŋuc moc mupie. I aricne jâmbâŋ, ŋic moc gie baocmu e irec fârine juku ijaha roocmu.

Irec go buuruc-ticnere mecne â fâro-ticnere mecne mi nikecguzejec. Fâro-ticnere fârine i miti râpeckembiŋ jaŋerao fuawec, â buuruc-ticnere fârine i gorao fuawec. Eme go erao qohotahuc jutec fârine i sâcne fogareocmu. Iŋuc mi etec ine go wâc hetâcne behec egareocmu.

Âgofâc-nane, ŋoŋe Wofuŋ fisiocte woŋec tatakic tâmiric junʒepieŋ. Manaŋgopieŋ, gie rune moczi iŋuc jaha nânâ he sarac erâ fârine fua biaŋ eocte woŋec juekac, ehuc hoe ʒoaŋ sâckoa bacneme fua sokac eocte mamanac juekac.
Wofuŋ e Onesiforo ere wiacfâc maŋuruc qajarezejec. Mamac-jeŋiczi kâpâcwâru ŋic nore mi takickeha bubiaŋ hati qanarehuc juwec.
Naru motecfâc-nane, ŋoŋe Kristo maŋnao junʒepieŋ. Eme juku fua tâcneme qacfiric domanʒepeneŋ, ehuc fifisi-ticnao mimiʒu qâʒuʒu ehuc wise ŋeŋe uruŋ mi enʒepeneŋ.
Erâ ine ʒiŋuc mukopac: Ŋoŋe Mârore tâpirio siŋkerâ junʒepieŋ, iŋuc ehuc maŋraŋɋare sasec gie mi baniŋmu.
Jesu Kristo e sâqocne bapa bâpiaŋ-nâpoocte mâreŋko wahawec, dâŋ i fârine jâmbâŋ â mâmâc sâko ro maŋ eenere sâc. Sâqocne bapa jaŋere micne no hâcne.
Mutarahuc mupe: Wofuŋtao roweckepie tâpiri sâko-ticnezi ŋoŋerao fotâcneme qaboc-ŋeŋichec junʒepieŋ.
Irec hâcne moc e jahacnere maname sasanaŋ eekaczi dockezacte rumehuc juzejec.
Maŋfuru eere hatao juŋgopieŋ jaŋere taha mocjaha bahuc bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋicte gie batarawec.
Iŋuc mume Judaŋic jaŋe qânâ ameckerâ hezo embiŋ.
Eme ʒi moc mupe mananiŋ, Kristo e ŋicte kâcɋene, ŋic e ŋokacte kâcɋene, Anutu e Kristore kâcɋene.
Ŋic tucne jaŋe maric maŋgâpâc â qa imac ejarekicne, â tucne jaŋe me kike-jeŋic qarâ kâpâcwâru ficko râec-jopakicne.
Biŋe qanârekicne irec fârinezi juju-nâŋecte aŋga sanaŋne â tâtâcne tâmiric iŋucne ekac, erâ aŋga izi faic qoruc ââketâc irec râpenao râekicne fokac.
Gâcnezi dapâcte wiac jawane epie mi qâsuec-jopanʒepieŋ, aricne. Ŋoŋe irec tapa qararuŋkehuc qatara-jarenʒepieŋ.
Âgofâc-nane, ŋoŋe mumusâqoc mi enʒepieŋ. Moc e âgo-ticne musâqorerâ okacne dâŋko râeocmu, e sâcmutâc dâŋ musâqorehuc hetâtieocmu. Go ine sâcmutâc dâŋ hetâtiecmuo rereŋŋic mi ehuc mumutara ŋic ecmu.
Sacmotâc 12 i kubu furi sâko 12 izi bakicne, motâc moc i kubi moczi bakicne, motâc moc i kubu moczi, iŋuc sasawa. Hae hata i goì ɋaɋacnezi bakicne, kiruŋ iŋucne fifimârâŋne.
Kristo e ine ŋokâzi fic rune jukac. Ficticne nâŋâc hâcne. Erâ i mâc mâcne, wiac biŋe qanârekicne irec mamanac paŋʒâic â bubiaŋko juhapene taraocmu, ine ficticne eŋgopeneŋ muzo.
Jauŋ babac i sahaczi sawa mi enʒepieŋ. Wiac sâqocnere mamakâc-ŋopazejec â wiac biaŋnao qohotanʒepieŋ.

Eme dameŋ ijaha sambâŋko fepire izia homeŋ sâko bawec. Bame hae sâkoo fic gâcne, teŋkonec wâŋ irec sâc, herickehuc ŋic 7 tauseŋ jopame hâmombiŋ. Eme ɋâricne jumbiŋ jaŋe hâwic-jopame Anutu sambâŋ rune muteŋkembiŋ.
Ŋicwirec moczi ŋic mocjahare mâcne, bocjaha jaŋere qâqâhâc domaocmu. Anutu eki ine mocjaha.
Iŋuc eme Pilatozi ʒiŋuc âzâcnewec: “Go dâŋ mi nazakomec me? Noni mupe jucmu me mupe maripoŋko hâmocmu irec tâpiri râe-narekicne, i mi manakic me?”
Dâŋqâreŋ wosewec ine kecʒiŋuc: “Lama moc qa hezuc eniŋte baraeŋgopieŋ, me kanʒaŋ bâbâtâc ŋic erao fâsâerâ foekac, iŋuc hâcne micticne moc mi aŋkewec.
Eme ŋicwofuŋte mupie Anutuzi Benjamiŋte ɋâricfâc jaŋeraonec Kisi ŋokâ-ticne Saulo âkendâŋne-jareme jara 40 micne bajarehuc juwec.
Ŋic bocjahazi râŋgeŋne â dâŋ racne mumu â eeatuc-jeŋichec juŋgopieŋ, Judaŋiczi opâ ruac jaŋerao wemo afecnezi iŋuc juŋgopieŋ.
Maŋnao qowi â homa wiac â wipe fuŋne fuŋne fowec.
Nâhâc maŋ mocjaha juekoperec, iŋuc jaha jaŋe maŋ mocjaha erâ junʒepieŋ. Iŋuc juniŋte hâcne huriri qâreŋ naremeŋ ijaha jarepo.
Dâŋ fârine irec biri-ticne qazu-garepo ijaha bâjâpezemec, i Kristo Jesu manasiŋkehuc â maŋzi jauŋkehuc iŋuc ezemec.
Eme fic ira opâ pake 6 ŋewec. Judaŋic jaŋe me sahac-jeŋic gâbâ ʒure jumbieŋte fic sâc opâ pake iŋuc ŋerawec. Pake i piticne mâcne, kâcɋene sâko.
Ŋoŋe maŋŋeŋic ɋâreme pectâc juhuc sâqocne geŋkenʒepieŋ. Ŋoŋeraonec gâcnezi Anuture kâuc baŋgopieŋ, i manarâ mimieniŋte mukopac.
Ehuc maŋhuhuŋ â buuruc â bumâteŋ juhuc maŋjauŋko dedec ââsic enʒepieŋ.
Á gâcne jaŋere busâqoc manarâ rucŋeŋic bahuc bafic-jopanʒepieŋ, ehuc qoruc-jeŋic sâqocnezi hegâpârekicne i wâc bâec banʒepieŋ.
Nâŋâc manaŋgopeneŋ, Anutu maŋzi jauŋkeniŋmu jaŋe wiac izi me izi fua-jarehuc bâbâpiaŋ-jeŋic dopecke-fâreocmu, ine eki hefârec-jopaocte maname fowecte hefârec-jopawec jaŋe hâcne.
Miti mana rereŋ-ŋeŋicte biŋe i hae sâc rafârewec. Eme no irec ŋoŋere bubiaŋ manahuc kecʒiŋuc eniŋte ŋazape: Wiac biaŋnere maŋafec junʒepieŋ â wiac sâqocnere ine maŋ ŋeŋemâc enʒepieŋ.
Ira hosâc ririke alata golzi bakicne ŋewec, erâ ʒâʒâficte qorac tapa katapa golzi ɋorockekicne i ŋewec, erâ Aroŋte gunu ɋârerâ gitec hekicne i â qorac tapa mâmâc râekicne.
Eme mumuteŋ-nâŋec moc fokac me? Aricne, mumuteŋ-nâŋec hetâtiekicne. Wemozi hetâtiewec? Eehâmo giere hatazi me? Aricne, mamanasiŋte hatazi.
Mamaczi no maŋnuekac â noni Mamac maŋkeekopac i mi mana ʒakiekic me? Dâŋ ŋazaekopac i nahacne maŋte mi ŋazaekopac, Mamaczi nore maŋko juhuc gie-ticne baekac.
Eme ŋic guru sâko domambiŋ jaŋe aaric mana-jactehuc râsi ʒâŋe honec-jofapie kiazi ŋaqi-jekic heuc qâunuckerâ mume kâcbiŋzi jofambiŋ.
Eme ʒi sâcmutâc dâŋ ɋâricne ŋazape: Maŋjauŋ eec enʒepieŋ, noni maŋjauŋ eŋare warehuc jupo iŋuc jaha ŋaŋackoaŋ maŋjauŋ eec enʒepieŋ.
Nâŋe ʒiŋuc manaŋgopeneŋ: Mâreŋte ficboze-nâŋec raruŋkeme Anutuzi sambâŋko ficsanaŋ moc bâfua-nâreocmu, fic i mezi mi bakicne, mâc qiŋ sanaŋ qaŋqaŋ qakicne.
Jesu e hahaŋne bahuc dâŋ ʒiŋuc muwec: “Moc e no manasiŋnuocmu, e no sawa mâcne, sorecnuwec e mâmâc manasiŋkeocmu.
Wofuŋ e dâŋ iŋuc muhuc âzâcneme Ananiazi ʒiŋuc muwec: “Wofuŋ, ŋic ere mâretec mupie manaekopac, e fuŋfuŋfâcge Jerusalem haeo ba imac wemo afecne ejareekac.
Ŋic kecʒiŋucne juniŋmu hâcne: Jaŋe jaŋacnere sawa manoniehuc juju, moneŋ sasec, ruruc bâbâcne, sahac mumuteŋ, musurecne, neŋgoc mamac dâŋ qaqatara, nâme nikecne, araŋ bapa tâmiric,
Eme ʒi socticnere erâ kiŋfâsâc embeŋte okac dameŋko roroŋ sasapec sâcne enâre-jâmbâŋkeocmu.
No Wofuŋ Jesuhec juekopaczi ʒiŋuc mana sanaŋkekopac: Nânâ i me i nâhuc wâwânâŋhec eene mi fokac. Á moc e, wiac kosa nârâ wâwânâŋhec ezo, iŋuc muhuc sifu nâocmu, e ine jâmbomac wâwânâŋhec eocmu.
Go opâ ruac dâŋ i jaza qâmoc ecmu, ine Jesu Kristore kiŋaŋŋic dâŋ rereŋhec jucmu, ehuc mamanasiŋte dâŋ â mitire dâŋfuŋne fârine mana rereŋ ewaremeŋ izi maŋgere nâqiŋ eha jucmu.
